K05bsu049_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9: (Vaidya 2) tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayate sma - pratibhātu
K05bsu049_u:10: te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā
K05bsu049_u:12: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat - kimayamāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira ātmīyena
K05bsu049_u:15: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya imamevarūpaṃ cetasaiva
K05bsu049_u:17: bhagavataḥ śrāvakā bhāṣante deśayanti upadiśanti udīrayanti prakāśayanti saṃprakāśayanti,
K05bsu049_u:21: tatra dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāste tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti dhārayanti,
K05bsu049_u:22: tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtya dhārayitvā yadyadeva bhāṣante,
K05bsu049_u:30: tathāgatadharmadeśanāyā eva āyuṣman śāriputra eṣa niṣyandaḥ yatte kulaputrā upadiśantastāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na virodhayanti //
K05bsu049_u:32: - pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā
K05bsu049_u:36: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaduta bodhisattva iti /
K05bsu049_u:37: tamapyahaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yaduta prajñāpāramitā nāma /
K05bsu049_u:38: so 'haṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ vā bodhisattvadharmaṃ vā avindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan,
K05bsu049_u:39: prajñāpāramitāmapyavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
K05bsu049_u:40: api tu khalu punarbhagavan sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne upadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:49: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvayatā evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yathā asau śikṣyamāṇastenāpi bodhicittena na manyeta /
K05bsu049_u:53: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam?
K05bsu049_u:54: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā acittatā,
K05bsu049_u:55: tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
K05bsu049_u:57: subhūtirāha - sacedāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
K05bsu049_u:58: api nu te yukta eṣa paryanuyogo bhavati yadāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha - asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti?
K05bsu049_u:59: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kā punareṣā āyuṣman subhūte acittatā?
K05bsu049_u:60: subhūtirāha - avikārā āyuṣman śāriputra avikalpā acittatā //
K05bsu049_u:61: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhvāyuṣman subhūte /
K05bsu049_u:62: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi /
K05bsu049_u:64: avirahitaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:66: prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:68: pratyekabuddhabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:70: bodhisattvabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:73: ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabodhisattvadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:75: anuttarāyām api samyaksaṃbodhau śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā
K05bsu049_u:78: ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabuddha dharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:80: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo 'haṃ bhagavan etadeva bodhisattvanāmadheyaṃ na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:81: prajñāpāramitām api na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi /
K05bsu049_u:83: prajñāpāramitām api avindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:86: yo 'haṃ vastvavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇa āyavyayaṃ kuryāṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti /
K05bsu049_u:87: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam /
K05bsu049_u:90: evaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam /
K05bsu049_u:91: sacedbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:95: adhimucyate 'dhyāśayena avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:98: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
K05bsu049_u:109: na hi abhisaṃskāre caran prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K05bsu049_u:124: evaṃ hyatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
K05bsu049_u:125: ayaṃ ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāparigṛhīto nāma samādhirvipulaḥ puraskṛtaḥ apramāṇaniyato 'sādhāraṇaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:130: tatra hi śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ sarvajñajñāne adhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:132: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
K05bsu049_u:145: so 'tra sarvatra śraddhānusārī sarvajñajñāne dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya evamadhimukta iti /
K05bsu049_u:150: iyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā yadrūpaṃ na parigṛhṇīte /
K05bsu049_u:155: tasmādiyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā //
K05bsu049_u:156: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evamupaparīkṣitavyamevamupanidhyātavyam - katamaiṣā prajñāpāramitā?
K05bsu049_u:158: kiṃ yo dharmo na vidyate nopalabhyate,
K05bsu049_u:160: sacedevamupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ evamupanidhyāyan nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:165: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā veditavyaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:167: evaṃ yadā vedanaiva saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva,
K05bsu049_u:171: (Vaidya 6) evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - etametadāyuṣman śāriputra evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:181: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tra śikṣiṣyate,
K05bsu049_u:183: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evametadāyuṣman śāriputra, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:188: evaṃ carata āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñatā āsannībhavati /
K05bsu049_u:192: evaṃ ca punarāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvajñatāyā āsannībhavati //
K05bsu049_u:211: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati /
K05bsu049_u:230: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati /
K05bsu049_u:236: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathaṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
K05bsu049_u:237: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
K05bsu049_u:246: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
K05bsu049_u:262: carāmi ca na carāmi ceti nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:263: naiva carāmi na na carāmīti nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:266: cariṣyāmi ca na cariṣyāmi ceti nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:272: anenaiva samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate //
K05bsu049_u:273: buddhānubhāvena āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha - vyākṛto 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:275: sa tam api samādhiṃ na samanupaśyati,
K05bsu049_u:276: na ca tena samādhinā manyate - ahaṃ samāhitaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:280: evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃvidyate //
K05bsu049_u:281: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamenāyuṣman subhūte
K05bsu049_u:287: tam api hi sa kulaputraḥ samādhiṃ na jānāti,
K05bsu049_u:289: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman subhūte vadasi?
K05bsu049_u:290: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman śāriputra vadāmi /
K05bsu049_u:292: avidyamānatvena tasya samādhestaṃ samādhiṃ na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
K05bsu049_u:293: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
K05bsu049_u:299: evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate //
K05bsu049_u:300: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo (Vaidya 8)
K05bsu049_u:302: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate //
K05bsu049_u:303: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ katamasmin dharme śikṣate?
K05bsu049_u:304: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣate /
K05bsu049_u:306: na hi te śāriputra dharmāstathā saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā aśrutavanto 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:307: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - kathaṃ tarhi te bhagavan saṃvidyante?
K05bsu049_u:313: te tān kalpayitvā dvayorantayoḥ saktāḥ tān dharmānna jānanti na paśyanti /
K05bsu049_u:315: kalpayitvā dvāvantāvabhiniviśante abhiniviśya tannidānamupalambhaṃ niśritya atītān dharmān kalpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:317: pratyutpannān dharmān kalpayanti te kalpayitvā nāmarūpe 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:319: te tānasaṃvidyamānān sarvadharmān kalpayanto yathābhūtaṃ mārgaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti /
K05bsu049_u:322: tena te bālā iti saṃjñāṃ gacchanti /
K05bsu049_u:324: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśante //
K05bsu049_u:325: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate?
K05bsu049_u:326: bhagavānāha - evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyām api na śikṣate /
K05bsu049_u:327: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate /
K05bsu049_u:328: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:331: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan evaṃ paripṛcchet - kimayaṃ māyāpuruṣāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate,
K05bsu049_u:334: tasya bhagavan evaṃ paripṛcchataḥ kathaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ syāt?
K05bsu049_u:335: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tena hi subhūte tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi /
K05bsu049_u:339: bhagavānetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte anyā sā māyā,
K05bsu049_u:348: na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadrūpam /
K05bsu049_u:351: na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyā sā vedanā,
K05bsu049_u:352: anyā sā saṃjñā anye te saṃskārāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:356: na bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadvijñānam /
K05bsu049_u:359: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte atraiṣāṃ saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu yaduta bodhisattva iti?
K05bsu049_u:362: tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena māyāpuruṣeṇeva śikṣitavyaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K05bsu049_u:364: sa eva hi bhagavan māyāpuruṣo dhārayitavyo yaduta pañcopādānaskandhāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:366: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ rūpamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
K05bsu049_u:367: yacca rūpaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:368: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā uktāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:369: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ vijñānamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
K05bsu049_u:370: yacca vijñānaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:371: mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
K05bsu049_u:372: bhagavānāha - yadi subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pāpamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:374: atha cetsubhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:376: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kāni punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni?
K05bsu049_u:377: bhagavānāha - ya enaṃ pāramitāsu avavadanti anuśāsati /
K05bsu049_u:382: imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
K05bsu049_u:383: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - imāni subhūte
K05bsu049_u:387: tatra bodhisattva iti bhagavan kaḥ padārtha?
K05bsu049_u:388: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - apadārthaḥ subhūte bodhisattvapadārthaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:390: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saktatāyāṃ śikṣate /
K05bsu049_u:391: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nubodhanārthena asaktatāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
K05bsu049_u:392: bodhyarthena tu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
K05bsu049_u:394: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate?
K05bsu049_u:395: bhagavānāha - mahataḥ sattvarāśermahataḥ sattvanikāyasya agratāṃ kārayiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:397: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - mamāpi bhagavan pratibhātiyenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
K05bsu049_u:398: bhagavānāha - pratibhātu te śāriputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
K05bsu049_u:399: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - mahatyā ātmadṛṣṭyāḥ sattvadṛṣṭyāḥ jīvadṛṣṭyāḥ pudgaladṛṣṭyāḥ (Vaidya 10)
K05bsu049_u:403: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
K05bsu049_u:404: bhagavānāha - pratibhātu te subhūte yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
K05bsu049_u:406: yad api tadbhagavan bodhicittaṃ sarvajñatācittamanāsravaṃ cittamasamaṃ cittaṃ asamasamaṃ cittamasādhāraṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:412: tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
K05bsu049_u:413: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:414: subhūtirāha - acittatvādāyuṣman śāriputra tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:415: śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam?
K05bsu049_u:416: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
K05bsu049_u:418: subhūtirāha - tadyadi āyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
K05bsu049_u:419: tatkathamāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha - asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti?
K05bsu049_u:420: śāriputra āha - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
K05bsu049_u:421: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi //
K05bsu049_u:422: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
K05bsu049_u:425: tasmātsa mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
K05bsu049_u:426: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃnaddha iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
K05bsu049_u:427: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho bhavati ?
K05bsu049_u:428: bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - aprameyā mayā sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
K05bsu049_u:430: na ca te santi yairye parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
K05bsu049_u:432: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:435: yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākaro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyamabhinirmimīte /
K05bsu049_u:437: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tatra kenacitkaściddhato vā mṛto vā nāśito vā antarhito vā?
K05bsu049_u:441: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:442: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśamevaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ śrutvā notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:443: iyatā ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho veditavyaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:444: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
K05bsu049_u:445: tathā asaṃnāhasaṃnaddho batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:449: akṛtā hi subhūte sarvajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā /
K05bsu049_u:461: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - rūpamāyuṣman subhūte abaddhamamuktamiti vadasi /
K05bsu049_u:464: rūpatathatāpi āyuṣman subhūte abaddhā amukteti vadasi /
K05bsu049_u:467: atha katamattadāyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yadrūpamabaddhamamuktamiti vadasi?
K05bsu049_u:472: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte rūpatathatā yā rūpatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
K05bsu049_u:473: evaṃ katamā sā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā?
K05bsu049_u:474: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte vijñānatathatā yā vijñānatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
K05bsu049_u:475: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputrametadavocat - yadāyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpaṃ tadabaddhamamuktam /
K05bsu049_u:480: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
K05bsu049_u:481: evaṃ yā māyāpuruṣasya vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā /
K05bsu049_u:482: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya vijñānatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
K05bsu049_u:487: ayaṃ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya mahāsaṃnāho 'saṃnāhaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:489: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (Vaidya 12)
K05bsu049_u:497: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - mahāyānamiti subhūte aprameyatāyā etadadhivacanam /
K05bsu049_u:499: yad api subhūte evaṃ vadasi - kathaṃ vā tatsaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:513: nāpi kaścittena mahāyānena niryāto nāpi niryāsyati nāpi niryāti /
K05bsu049_u:518: evamavidyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati?
K05bsu049_u:519: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati //
K05bsu049_u:520: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāyānaṃ mahāyānamiti bhagavannucyate /
K05bsu049_u:523: evameva bhagavan asmin yāne aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmavakāśaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:524: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāyānamidaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
K05bsu049_u:528: evamasya bhagavan mahāyānasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate,
K05bsu049_u:533: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
K05bsu049_u:538: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānamupadeṣṭavyaṃ manyate /
K05bsu049_u:539: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - nāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānamavocam /
K05bsu049_u:543: api nu khalu punarbhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:555: evaṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvadharmamanupalabhamāno nāhaṃ bhagavan taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasyaitannāmadheyaṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti /
K05bsu049_u:558: so 'haṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ taṃ dharmamanupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ dharmaṃ katamena dharmeṇa katamasmin dharme 'vavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
K05bsu049_u:572: na cānyatra bhagavan anabhinirvṛttitaḥ sarvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā upalabhyante,
K05bsu049_u:574: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ deśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:575: nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:576: evaṃ veditavyam - caratyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām /
K05bsu049_u:581: yasmin hi samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imān dharmān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyupaparīkṣate,
K05bsu049_u:586: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
K05bsu049_u:592: tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam /
K05bsu049_u:598: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
K05bsu049_u:599: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
K05bsu049_u:605: evaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ tasmin samaye na rūpamupaiti,
K05bsu049_u:609: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
K05bsu049_u:615: tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam /
K05bsu049_u:621: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
K05bsu049_u:622: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
K05bsu049_u:628: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tena hi yathāhamāyuṣmataḥ subhūterbhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
K05bsu049_u:630: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ kiṃ bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati?
K05bsu049_u:631: yāni vā tāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo duḥkhānyutsahate pratyanubhavitum?
K05bsu049_u:632: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra
K05bsu049_u:633: icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantam nāpi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05bsu049_u:636: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ janayitvā śakyo 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kartum /
K05bsu049_u:638: sarvasattvānāmantike mātṛsaṃjñāṃ pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā strīpuruṣeṣu /
K05bsu049_u:639: evametāḥ saṃjñāḥ kṛtvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati /
K05bsu049_u:640: tasmānmātṛsaṃjñā pitṛsaṃjñā putrasaṃjñā duhitṛsaṃjñā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike yāvadātmasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:641: yathā ātmā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:642: evaṃ sarvasattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyā iti /
K05bsu049_u:643: evaṃ ca sarvasattveṣu saṃjñā utpādayitavyā - mayaite sarvasattvā na parityaktavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:645: na ca mayaiteṣu cittapradoṣa utpādayitavya antaśaḥ śataśo 'pi chidyamāneneti /
K05bsu049_u:646: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittamutpādayitavyam sacedevaṃcitto vihariṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:649: punaraparamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - yathā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvamātmā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
K05bsu049_u:650: evaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /
K05bsu049_u:655: yadapyāyuṣman śāriputra evamāha - anutpādo bodhisattvo iti /
K05bsu049_u:658: śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattva evānutpādaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:660: subhūtirāha - bodhisattvadharmā api āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvadharmā evānutpādaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:667: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte sarvajñatādharmā evānutpādaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:670: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte pṛthagjana evānutpādaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:673: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:679: nanvāyuṣman subhūte anuprāptaiva ayatnena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvajñatā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:680: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptimicchāmi,
K05bsu049_u:683: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate,
K05bsu049_u:684: utāho utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate?
K05bsu049_u:685: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anutpanno dharma utpannaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:687: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte utpāda eva dharmo 'nutpādaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:689: āha - utpādo dharmo 'nutpādo dharma ityāyuṣman śāriputra na pratibhāti jalpitum /
K05bsu049_u:690: āha - anutpādo 'pi te āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti jalpitum /
K05bsu049_u:695: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - dhārmakathikānāmāyuṣmān subhūtiragratāyāṃ sthāpitavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:697: tathā hyāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripraśnīkriyate,
K05bsu049_u:701: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - dharmataiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāmaniśritadharmāṇām /
K05bsu049_u:708: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
K05bsu049_u:712: iti hi yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmevaṃ deśyamānāyāmevamupadiśyamānāyāṃ na bhavati cittasya
K05bsu049_u:716: veditavyamayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti // (Vaidya 16)
K05bsu049_u:717: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:719: yadi hyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:721: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:723: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte manasikāreṇāvirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:725: evaṃ sati sarvasattvā apyavirahitā bhaviṣyanti prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
K05bsu049_u:728: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra /
K05bsu049_u:730: artha eva tvāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:738: anena āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃrūpeṇa manasikāreṇa icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ viharantamanena vihāreṇeti //
K05bsu049_u:742: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt catvāriṃśatā trāyastriṃśatkāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
K05bsu049_u:743: catvāraś ca lokapālā viṃśatyā cāturmahārājakāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
K05bsu049_u:745: pañca ca śuddhāvāsānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇānyabhūvan /
K05bsu049_u:748: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - imānyārya
K05bsu049_u:749: subhūte saṃbahulāni devaputrasahasrāṇi asyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇāni āryasya
K05bsu049_u:754: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tena hi kauśika upadekṣyāmi te buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā buddhādhiṣṭhānena /
K05bsu049_u:758: na te bhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum /
K05bsu049_u:761: abhavyā hi te punaḥ punaḥ saṃsaraṇāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum /
K05bsu049_u:765: viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyāḥ //
K05bsu049_u:766: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
K05bsu049_u:769: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kṛtajñairasmābhirbhagavan bhagavato bhavitavyaṃ nākṛtajñaiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:771: paurvakāṇāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike 'smadarthe bhagavān yathā brahmacaryaṃ bodhāya caran pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva san,
K05bsu049_u:774: evaṃ bhagavan asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigrahītavyā anuparivārayitavyāśca,
K05bsu049_u:777: asmābhir api hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītā anuparivāritāśca,
K05bsu049_u:779: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma - tena hi kauśika śṛṇu,
K05bsu049_u:780: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
K05bsu049_u:781: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /
K05bsu049_u:782: śūnyatāyāṃ kauśika tiṣṭhatā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /
K05bsu049_u:786: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
K05bsu049_u:853: srotaāpannāḥ saptakṛto bhavaparamā iti na sthātavyam /
K05bsu049_u:855: sakṛdāgāmyapariniṣṭhitattvātsakṛdimaṃ lokamāgamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti na sthātavyam /
K05bsu049_u:856: anāgāmī dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam anāgāmī anāgamya imaṃ lokaṃ tatraiva parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
K05bsu049_u:858: arhannihaiva anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
K05bsu049_u:860: pratyekabuddho 'tikramya śrāvakabhūmimaprāpya buddhabhūmiṃ parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
K05bsu049_u:866: buddhabhūmau sthitvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena
K05bsu049_u:868: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat - yadi buddho 'tikramya pṛthagjanabhūmimatikramya
K05bsu049_u:872: buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvāsyati
K05bsu049_u:876: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
K05bsu049_u:877: āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra kva tathāgato
K05bsu049_u:879: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - na kvacidāyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:882: sa naiva saṃskṛte dhātau sthito nāpyasaṃskṛte dhātau sthito na ca tato vyutthitaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:883: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evameva āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam,
K05bsu049_u:884: evaṃ śikṣitavyam - yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kvacitsthito nāsthito na viṣṭhito nāviṣṭhitaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:890: yathā tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti susthito 'sthānayogeneti evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyamevaṃ śikṣitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:891: evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti //
K05bsu049_u:892: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhūt - yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣabhāṣitāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni,
K05bsu049_u:894: na punaridaṃ vijñāyate yatsubhūtiḥ sthaviro bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayatyupadiśati /
K05bsu049_u:895: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva
K05bsu049_u:896: cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - na vijñāyate na vijñāyate idaṃ devaputrāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:899: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ punarevaitadabhūt - uttānīkariṣyati bata ayamāryasubhūtiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:904: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena punar api teṣāmeva devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate (Vaidya
K05bsu049_u:905: sma - tena hi devaputrāḥ yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptukāmaḥ srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:915: atha khalu punar api teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - kiṃrūpā asya āryasubhūterdhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:916: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
K05bsu049_u:917: tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - māyānirmitasadṛśā hi devaputrā mama dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:919: tathā hi te naiva śroṣyanti na ca sākṣātkariṣyanti //
K05bsu049_u:920: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - kiṃ punarārya subhūte māyopamāste sattvā na te māyā?
K05bsu049_u:921: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat - māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:923: iti hi māyā ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram,
K05bsu049_u:924: iti hi svapnaś ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
K05bsu049_u:930: arhann api arhattvam api māyopamaṃ svapnopamam /
K05bsu049_u:935: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - samyaksaṃbuddho 'pyārya subhūte māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti vadasi?
K05bsu049_u:937: subhūtirāha - nirvāṇam api devaputrā māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi,
K05bsu049_u:939: te devaputrā āhuḥ - nirvāṇamapyārya subhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi?
K05bsu049_u:940: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - tadyadi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt,
K05bsu049_u:942: iti hi devaputrā māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
K05bsu049_u:943: iti hi svapnaś ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram //
K05bsu049_u:949: anye ca mahāśrāvakā anekairbodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhamāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayante
K05bsu049_u:950: sma - ke 'syā āyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti?
K05bsu049_u:951: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandastān sthavirānetadavocat - te khalvāyuṣmanto veditavyā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā (Vaidya 21)
K05bsu049_u:955: ye 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti //
K05bsu049_u:956: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavirastān sthavirānetadavocat - nāsyā āyuṣmantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ kecitpratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:958: tathā hi - atra na kaściddharmaḥ sūcyate,
K05bsu049_u:964: tathaivāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyā na kaścitpratyeṣako bhaviṣyati //
K05bsu049_u:965: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - asya dharmaparyāyasya āryeṇa subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇasya pūjārthaṃ yannvahaṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āryaṃ subhūtimabhyavakireyamiti /
K05bsu049_u:966: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasyāṃ velāyāṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimabhyavākirat /
K05bsu049_u:967: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya śakraṃ devānāmindramanuvyāharaṇāyaitadabhūt - na khalu punarimāni puṣpāṇi mayā trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pracaranti dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi,
K05bsu049_u:973: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataḥ subhūteścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - anirjātānyetānyārya subhūte puṣpāṇi /
K05bsu049_u:977: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yattvaṃ kauśika evaṃ vadasi - anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇi,
K05bsu049_u:981: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyamāryaḥ subhūtiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:986: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametadārya subhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:987: evaṃ cātra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yathā āryasubhūtirupadiśati /
K05bsu049_u:988: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:990: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na srotaāpattiphale śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:1003: evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
K05bsu049_u:1006: yo na rūpasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya /
K05bsu049_u:1007: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
K05bsu049_u:1008: yo na vijñānasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya,
K05bsu049_u:1009: sa na rūpasya parigrahāya śikṣate notsargāya /
K05bsu049_u:1010: (Vaidya 22) evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
K05bsu049_u:1017: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:1019: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:1021: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:1023: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:1025: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmān subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:1027: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evametadāyuṣman śāriputra, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:1028: ya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:1030: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:1034: evaṃ cāyuṣman śāriputra śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:1036: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - prajñāpāramitā ārya śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:1037: śāriputra āha - prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ parivartādgaveṣitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:1038: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kasyaiṣa ārya śāriputra anubhāvo veditavyaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:1040: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśika anubhāvo veditavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:1041: tathāgatasyaitadadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate /
K05bsu049_u:1042: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - kasyaiṣo 'nubhāvo veditavyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1043: kasyaitadanuṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate iti?
K05bsu049_u:1046: yad api kauśika evaṃ vadasi - prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyeti?
K05bsu049_u:1047: prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpādgaveṣitavyā nāpyanyatra rūpādgaveṣitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:1048: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārebhyaḥ na vijñānādgaveṣitavyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1053: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:1056: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - mahāpāramiteyamārya subhūte yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:1067: rūpamahattayā hi kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:1089: kathaṃ punaḥ kauśika ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
K05bsu049_u:1090: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi kauśika yato nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate,
K05bsu049_u:1092: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:1094: na teṣāmanto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate,
K05bsu049_u:1097: rūpasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
K05bsu049_u:1099: vijñānasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
K05bsu049_u:1100: anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
K05bsu049_u:1103: na hi sattvasyānto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vopalabhyate /
K05bsu049_u:1105: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
K05bsu049_u:1106: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - na hi kauśika gaṇanāyogena vā gaṇanābahutvena vā sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
K05bsu049_u:1107: śakra āha - kathaṃ tarhīdānīmārya subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta (Vaidya 24)
K05bsu049_u:1109: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkaṃ manyase kauśika katamasyaitaddharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti?
K05bsu049_u:1110: śakra āha - naitadārya subhūte dharmasyādhivacanaṃ na adharmādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
K05bsu049_u:1114: anārambaṇametannāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
K05bsu049_u:1115: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkiṃ manyase kauśika kācidatra sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā?
K05bsu049_u:1117: subhūtirāha - yatra kauśika na kācitsattvaparidīpanā kṛtā,
K05bsu049_u:1119: sacetkauśika tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nantavijñaptighoṣeṇa gambhīranirghoṣeṇa svareṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān api vitiṣṭhamānaḥ sattvaḥ sattva iti vācaṃ bhāṣeta,
K05bsu049_u:1120: api nu tatra kaścitsattva utpanno va utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā,
K05bsu049_u:1121: niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā?
K05bsu049_u:1125: subhūtirāha - anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa evaṃ sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:1126: evaṃ ca punaḥ kauśika sattvānantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā //
K05bsu049_u:1127: atha khalu sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇāstrirudānamudānayanti sma - aho dharmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1131: sa āryeṇa subhūtinā sthavireṇa subhāṣiteneha sūcyate deśyate prakāśyate prabhāvyate /
K05bsu049_u:1132: tathāgataṃ taṃ vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadyāgreṇa dhārayiṣyāmo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:1133: yo 'pi ca anena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihariṣyati //
K05bsu049_u:1134: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān sendrakān sabrahmakān saprajāpatikān sarṣinaranārīgaṇānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:1135: yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyāmantarāyaṇamadhyagato 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito 'bhūvam,
K05bsu049_u:1136: tadāhaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K05bsu049_u:1137: - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato
K05bsu049_u:1139: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti /
K05bsu049_u:1140: atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
K05bsu049_u:1142: yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñatāyā āhārikā anuparigrāhikā ceti //
K05bsu049_u:1146: atha khalu bhagavān ye tatra devaputrāḥ parṣadi saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāścābhūvan,
K05bsu049_u:1148: tān devaputrān saṃnipatitān saṃniṣaṇṇāṃś ca viditvā,
K05bsu049_u:1149: tāś ca sarvāścatasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāś ca viditvā,
K05bsu049_u:1150: kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān brahmakāyikāṃś ca devaputrān ābhāsvarāṃś ca parīttaśubhāṃś ca akaniṣṭhāṃś ca devaputrān sākṣiṇaḥ sthāpayitvā,
K05bsu049_u:1151: śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān mahābrahmapramukhāṃś ca brahmakāyikān
K05bsu049_u:1152: devaputrānābhāsvarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - yo hi kaściddevaputrāḥ kulaputro
K05bsu049_u:1153: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:1154: na tasya māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraprekṣiṇyo 'vatāragaveṣiṇyo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
K05bsu049_u:1155: nāpi tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
K05bsu049_u:1156: nāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati //
K05bsu049_u:1157: punaraparaṃ devaputrāḥ ye devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1158: yaiś ca devaputrairiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā nodgṛhītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā na pravartitā,
K05bsu049_u:1159: te devaputrāstaṃ kulaputra vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K05bsu049_u:1160: tasya ca kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasyāntikācchroṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:1161: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:1162: na ca khalu punardevaputrāstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato
K05bsu049_u:1163: dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasya araṇyagatasya vā vṛkṣamūlagatasya
K05bsu049_u:1164: vā śūnyāgāragatasya vā abhyavakāśagatasya vā pathi gatasya vā utpathagatasya vā aṭavīgatasya
K05bsu049_u:1165: vā mahāsamudragatasya vā tatra tatropasaṃkrāmato vā caṃkramyamāṇasya vā sthitasya
K05bsu049_u:1166: vā niṣaṇṇasya vā vipannasya vā bhayaṃ vā bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:1169: atha khalu catvāro mahārājāno bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yadimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇan
K05bsu049_u:1170: dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan pravartayan sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yānatraye sattvān vinayati,
K05bsu049_u:1172: vayaṃ bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1173: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati //
K05bsu049_u:1174: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - aham api bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:1175: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati //
K05bsu049_u:1176: brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmakāyikairdevaputrairbhagavantametadavocat - aham api bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
K05bsu049_u:1177: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati //
K05bsu049_u:1178: (Vaidya 26) atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan
K05bsu049_u:1179: yadimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan pravartayan sa kulaputro
K05bsu049_u:1180: vā kuladuhitā vā imān yato dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān pratilabhate parigṛhṇāti,
K05bsu049_u:1181: kiṃ punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti?
K05bsu049_u:1182: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:1183: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kauśika udgṛhītāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:1184: punaraparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ dhāritāyāṃ vācitāyāṃ paryavāptāyāṃ pravartitāyāṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti /
K05bsu049_u:1186: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
K05bsu049_u:1188: sādhu bhagavanniti śakro devānāmindro bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K05bsu049_u:1189: bhagavānetadavocat - tatra kauśika ye mama dharmaṃ vigrahītavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K05bsu049_u:1192: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāmutpannotpannā vigrahā vivādā virodhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1195: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:1197: evaṃ hyetatkauśika bhavati - ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udgrahīṣyati
K05bsu049_u:1198: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
K05bsu049_u:1201: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:1202: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K05bsu049_u:1203: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpnoti pravartayati deśayati upadiśati uddiśati svādhyāyati /
K05bsu049_u:1204: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika maghī nāmauṣadhī sarvaviṣapraśamanī /
K05bsu049_u:1205: tatra āśīviṣeṇa jantunā bubhukṣitena āhārārthinā āhāragaveṣiṇā kaścideva prāṇakajāto janturdṛṣṭo bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:1207: atha sa prāṇakajāto yena sā madhī nāmauṣadhī tenopasaṃkramet,
K05bsu049_u:1209: atha sa āśīviṣastasyā oṣadhyā gandhenaiva pratyudāvarteta /
K05bsu049_u:1211: tathā hi tasyā oṣadhyā bhaiṣajyaguṇaḥ sa tādṛśo yastasyāśīviṣasya tadviṣamabhibhavati /
K05bsu049_u:1213: evameva kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
K05bsu049_u:1214: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
K05bsu049_u:1215: tasya kauśika yāni tānyutpannotpannānyadhikaraṇāni vigrahā vivādā virodhā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:1216: te prajñāpāramitāyāstejasā balena sthāmataḥ prajñāpāramitābalādhānena kṣipraṃ tata evoparaṃsyanti upaśamiṣyanti antardhāsyanti na vivardhiṣyante
K05bsu049_u:1224: śakraś ca devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāpatiḥ sarve ca buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāś ca rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti,
K05bsu049_u:1225: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyatiḥ uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati
K05bsu049_u:1226: ayaṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇaḥ parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati //
K05bsu049_u:1227: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati
K05bsu049_u:1228: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
K05bsu049_u:1243: evaṃ carato 'sya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā smṛtirmaitrī cotpadyate /
K05bsu049_u:1251: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K05bsu049_u:1252: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
K05bsu049_u:1253: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yatheyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paridamanāya pratyupasthitā anunāmāya bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām //
K05bsu049_u:1254: bhagavānāha - punaraparaṃ kauśika ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K05bsu049_u:1255: vā udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati
K05bsu049_u:1257: sacetkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmevamudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan
K05bsu049_u:1258: paryavāpnuvan pravartayan deśayan upadiśayan uddiśan svādhyāyan saṃgrāme vartamāne
K05bsu049_u:1260: tasya saṃgrāmamavatarato vā avatīrṇasya vā atikrāmato vā saṃgrāmamadhyagatasya vā
K05bsu049_u:1261: tiṣṭhato vā niṣaṇṇasya vā asthānametatkauśika anavakāśo yattasya kulaputrasya vā
K05bsu049_u:1262: kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ manasi kurvato vā udgṛhṇato vā dhārayato vā vācayato
K05bsu049_u:1263: vā paryavāpnuvato vā pravartayato vā deśayato vā upadiśato vā uddiśato vā svādhyāyato
K05bsu049_u:1267: sacetpunastasya kaścitkauśika tatra śastraṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā anyadvā kṣipet,
K05bsu049_u:1278: vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
K05bsu049_u:1281: atra hi kauśika vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
K05bsu049_u:1283: tena so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ cittāni vyavalokayiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:1285: atra hi kauśika vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na tatkiṃcidasti,
K05bsu049_u:1286: yanna prāptaṃ vā na jñātaṃ vā na sākṣātkṛtaṃ vā syāt /
K05bsu049_u:1288: ayam api kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇaḥ parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:1289: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //
K05bsu049_u:1290: punaraparaṃ kauśika yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā antaśo likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṃgamaṃ sthāpayitvā na satkariṣyate,
K05bsu049_u:1300: na tatra kauśika sattvānāṃ manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā avatārārthiko 'vatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam /
K05bsu049_u:1301: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti //
K05bsu049_u:1302: punaraparaṃ kauśika tadyathāpi nāma ye bodhimaṇḍagatā vā bodhimaṇḍaparisāmantagatā vā bodhimaṇḍābhyantaragatā vā bodhivṛkṣamūlagatā vā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā,
K05bsu049_u:1304: yāvanna te śakyā manuṣyairvā amanuṣyairvā viheṭhayituṃ vā vyāpādayituṃ vā āveśayituṃ vā sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam /
K05bsu049_u:1306: tatra hi atītānāgatapratyutpannāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante abhisaṃbudhyante ca,
K05bsu049_u:1308: evameva kauśika yatra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati
K05bsu049_u:1309: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
K05bsu049_u:1310: tatra hi kauśika sattvā na śakyā manuṣyairvā amanuṣyairvā viheṭhayituṃ vā vyāpādayituṃ vā āveśayituṃ vā,
K05bsu049_u:1313: anayaiva hi kauśika prajñāpāramitayā pṛthivīpradeśaḥ sattvānāṃ caityabhūtaḥ kṛto vandanīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyo 'rcanīyo 'pacāyanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo
K05bsu049_u:1314: trāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ layanaṃ parāyaṇaṃ kṛto bhaviṣyati tatropagatānāṃ sattvānām /
K05bsu049_u:1315: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti //
K05bsu049_u:1316: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā
K05bsu049_u:1318: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet arcayet apacāyet,
K05bsu049_u:1320: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya śarīrāṇi stūpeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet parigṛhṇīyāt dhārayeddhā,
K05bsu049_u:1323: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet arcayet apacāyet,
K05bsu049_u:1324: katarastayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K05bsu049_u:1325: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - tena hi kauśika tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi /
K05bsu049_u:1328: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika yo 'yaṃ tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvajñatātmabhāvo 'bhinirvartitaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1329: sa katamasyāṃ pratipadi śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvajñatā pratilabdhā abhisaṃbuddhā?
K05bsu049_u:1330: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - ihaiva bhagavan bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:1331: śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvajñatā
K05bsu049_u:1333: bhagavānāha - tasmāttarhi kauśika nānenātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhena tathāgatastathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
K05bsu049_u:1334: sarvajñatāyāṃ tu pratilabdhāyāṃ tathāgatastathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
K05bsu049_u:1337: eṣa ca kauśika tathāgatasyātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyanirjātaḥ san sarvajñajñānāśrayabhūto bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:1338: enaṃ hyāśrayaṃ niśritya sarvajñajñānasya prabhāvanā bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:1343: caityabhūto vandanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyo 'rcanīyo 'pacāyanīyaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:1344: evaṃ ca mama parinirvṛtasyāpi sataḥ eṣāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ pūjā bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:1345: tasmāttarhi kauśika yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ vā kṛtvā sthāpayet,
K05bsu049_u:1346: enāṃ ca divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet arcayet apacāyet,
K05bsu049_u:1347: ayameva kauśika tayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet /
K05bsu049_u:1349: sarvajñajñānasya hi kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:1350: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ pustakagatāyāṃ vā satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ pūjāṃ ca vividhāṃ kuryāt,
K05bsu049_u:1353: sarvajñajñānasya hi kauśika tena pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:1355: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - ya ime bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na likhiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:1357: na vācayiṣyanti na paryavāpsyanti na pravartayiṣyanti na deśayiṣyanti nopadekṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti,
K05bsu049_u:1366: kiṃ nu te bhagavan na jñāsyanti evaṃ mahārthikā bhagavatoktā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyatīti?
K05bsu049_u:1367: kiṃ nu te bhagavan na vetsyanti - evaṃ mahānuśaṃsā evaṃ mahāphalā evaṃ mahāvipākā bhagavatoktā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyatīti?
K05bsu049_u:1372: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase kauśika kiyantaste jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā te buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1375: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - alpakāste bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1378: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:1379: alpakāste jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1388: tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāste ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya taṃ cittotpādaṃ bṛṃhayanti /
K05bsu049_u:1389: tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāste ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya upabṛṃhayitvā ca ārabdhavīryā viharanti /
K05bsu049_u:1392: tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto ghaṭamānā avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmāvavatiṣṭhante /
K05bsu049_u:1393: tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto ghaṭamānā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
K05bsu049_u:1394: tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto ghaṭamānā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
K05bsu049_u:1395: te te kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitvā
K05bsu049_u:1397: ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇānāṃ ghaṭamānānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupadiśanti ca uddiśanti /
K05bsu049_u:1398: te codgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti paryavāpnuvanti pravartayanti upadeśayanti upadiśanti uddiśanti svādhyāyanti /
K05bsu049_u:1399: tāṃ caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1401: satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti arcayanti apacāyanti /
K05bsu049_u:1402: santi khalu punaḥ kauśika aprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1406: teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ kauśika aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhāya caratām api yadyeko vā dvau vā avinivartanīyāyāṃ (Vaidya 31)
K05bsu049_u:1410: tasmāttarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
K05bsu049_u:1411: iyameva prajñāpāramitā sukhaṃ abhīkṣṇaṃ śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā
K05bsu049_u:1412: paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā paripraṣṭavyā /
K05bsu049_u:1414: tathā hi sa evaṃ jñāsyati - atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran śikṣitaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:1417: tiṣṭhato vā kauśika parinirvṛtasya vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ prajñāpāramitaiva pratisartavyā /

K05bsu049_u:1742: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro yāvanmātro bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśaḥ udgṛhītaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1746: atha te 'nyatīrthāḥ parivrājakā dūrāddūrataraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva dvāreṇa tenaiva mārgeṇa punareva niṣkrāntāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:1748: - kimatra kāraṇaṃ yena ime 'nyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā dūrāddūrataraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva dvāreṇa tenaiva mārgeṇa punareva niṣkrāntāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:1749: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
K05bsu049_u:1750: āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - śakreṇa śāriputra devānāmindreṇa teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ
K05bsu049_u:1751: parivrājakānāmupālambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ cittāni vyavalokya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā smṛtyā
K05bsu049_u:1753: teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ nivartanārtham,
K05bsu049_u:1754: yathā asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā ete 'nyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā nopasaṃkrāmeyuriti,
K05bsu049_u:1758: nāhaṃ śāriputra teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāmekasyāpi śuklaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi /
K05bsu049_u:1759: sarve te śāriputra upālambhābhiprāyāḥ pratihatacittā upasaṃkramitukāmā abhūvan //
K05bsu049_u:1760: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasya etadabhūt - imāstathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāstathāgatasya saṃmukhībhūtāḥ
K05bsu049_u:1761: ime ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:1764: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃścaturaṅgabalakāyamabhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
K05bsu049_u:1765: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - māro batāyaṃ pāpīyāṃścaturaṅgabalakāyamabhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
K05bsu049_u:1767: nāyaṃ rājño bimbisārasya caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1772: samanubaddho dīrgharātraṃ māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavato 'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī,
K05bsu049_u:1774: yannvahamimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāhareyaṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ pravartayeyamiti /
K05bsu049_u:1775: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma svādhyāyati sma pravartayati sma /
K05bsu049_u:1776: yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindra imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma svādhyāyati sma pravartayati sma,
K05bsu049_u:1777: tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyāṃstenaiva mārgeṇa punareva pratyudāvṛttaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:1778: atha khalu trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyāni māndārapuṣpāṇyabhinirmāya vihāyasā antarīkṣagatā yena bhagavāṃstenābhyavakiranti sma,
K05bsu049_u:1779: yena bhagavāṃstena tāni divyāni māndāravapuṣpāṇyabhiprakiranti sma,
K05bsu049_u:1780: evaṃ codānamudānayanti sma - cirasya bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmupāvṛtteti /
K05bsu049_u:1781: punareva ca divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenābhyavakiranti sma,
K05bsu049_u:1783: evaṃ cāvocan - ye kecidbhagavan sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyante bhāvayiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:1785: na teṣāṃ māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraṃ lapsyante /
K05bsu049_u:1786: na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena (Vaidya 40)
K05bsu049_u:1794: kaḥ punarvādo ye enāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
K05bsu049_u:1800: ato hi sarvajñatā gaveṣitavyā yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:1801: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan yāni kānicidratnāni mahāratnāni,
K05bsu049_u:1804: evameva bhagavan sarvajñatāmahāratnaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmahāsamudrādgaveṣitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:1805: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:1806: atonirjātaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatāmahāratnaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitāmahāsamudrāt //
K05bsu049_u:1807: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - na bhagavan dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K05bsu049_u:1814: api tu prajñāpāramitāyā evaikasyā bhagavān varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K05bsu049_u:1817: prajñāpāramitāyā evāhamānanda varṇaṃ bhāṣe nāmadheyaṃ ca parikīrtayāmi,
K05bsu049_u:1820: prajñāpāramitā hi ānanda pūrvaṃgamā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām /
K05bsu049_u:1821: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
K05bsu049_u:1823: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ śīlamapariṇāmitā kṣāntirapariṇāmitaṃ vīryamapariṇāmitaṃ dhyānam?
K05bsu049_u:1824: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda apariṇāmitā prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
K05bsu049_u:1826: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase tvamānanda acintyā sā prajñā yā kuśalamūlāni sarvajñatāpariṇāmena pariṇāmayati?
K05bsu049_u:1831: yā kuśalamūlāni sarvajñatāpariṇāmena pariṇāmayati bhagavānāha - tasmāttarhi ānanda paramatvātsā prajñā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate,
K05bsu049_u:1832: yayā sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmitāni kuśalamūlāni pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante /
K05bsu049_u:1833: tasmāttarhi ānanda sarvajñatāpariṇāmitakuśalamūlatvātprajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyikā /
K05bsu049_u:1834: anena yogena antargatāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmeva ānanda ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇādhivacanametadyaduta prajñāpāramiteti /
K05bsu049_u:1835: tasmāttarhi ānanda prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parikīrtitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parikīrtitā bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:1836: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda mahāpṛthivyāṃ bījāni prakīrṇāni sāmagrīṃ labhamānāni virohanti /
K05bsu049_u:1839: evameva ānanda prajñāpāramitāsaṃgṛhītāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhante /
K05bsu049_u:1842: tasmāttarhi ānanda prajñāpāramitaiva pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyakā //
K05bsu049_u:1843: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - na tāvadime bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarve guṇāḥ
K05bsu049_u:1844: yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parigṛhṇīte prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvā upadiśya uddiśya svādhyāyya /
K05bsu049_u:1845: atha hi mayā yo bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśa udgṛhītaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1848: na khalu punaḥ kauśika kevalaṃ yaḥ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati
K05bsu049_u:1850: yo 'pi kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati sthāpayiṣyati saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
K05bsu049_u:1852: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
K05bsu049_u:1853: tāṃ caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati
K05bsu049_u:1857: tasyāpyahaṃ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā enān dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān vadāmi //
K05bsu049_u:1858: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - aham api bhagavaṃstasyāpi kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:1859: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati sthāpayiṣyati saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
K05bsu049_u:1861: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
K05bsu049_u:1862: tāṃ caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati
K05bsu049_u:1866: kaḥ punarvādo yaḥ enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyati udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
K05bsu049_u:1872: tasya khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyato bahūni devaputraśatānyupasaṃkramiṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:1875: te ca devaputrā dharmaṃ śṛṇvantastasya dharmabhāṇakasya pratibhānamupasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante /
K05bsu049_u:1876: yadāpi sa dharmabhāṇako na jalpitukāmo bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:1877: tadāpi tasya te devaputrāstenaiva dharmagauraveṇa pratibhānamupasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K05bsu049_u:1878: yathā tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bhāṣitumeva chando bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:1879: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K05bsu049_u:1880: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //
K05bsu049_u:1881: punaraparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇasya
K05bsu049_u:1882: catasṝṇāṃ parṣadāmagrato nāvalīnacittatā bhaviṣyati - mā khalu māṃ kaścitparyanuyuñjīta
K05bsu049_u:1885: tathā hi tasya prajñāpāramitā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karoti /
K05bsu049_u:1886: sa upālambhān api prajñāpāramitāvihārī na samanupaśyati,
K05bsu049_u:1890: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā anena paryāyeṇa na kaścitparyanuyogo bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:1894: imān api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti,
K05bsu049_u:1895: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //
K05bsu049_u:1896: punaraparaṃ kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā priyo bhaviṣyati mātāpitṝṇāṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaśramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ hitānāṃ ca,
K05bsu049_u:1898: śaktaś ca bhaviṣyati utpannotpannānāṃ parapravādināṃ sahadharmeṇa nigrahāya,
K05bsu049_u:1900: imān api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti,
K05bsu049_u:1901: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati //
K05bsu049_u:1902: yatra khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṃgamaṃ sthāpayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:1903: tatra kauśika ye keciccāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1905: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:1906: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
K05bsu049_u:1907: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryāvāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya (Vaidya 43)
K05bsu049_u:1909: evaṃ ye kecitkauśika trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1911: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:1912: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /

K05bsu049_u:1914: ye 'pi kecitkauśika yāmeṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,

K05bsu049_u:1917: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /

K05bsu049_u:1919: ye 'pi kecitkauśika tuṣiteṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1921: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:1922: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /

K05bsu049_u:1924: ye 'pi kecitkauśika nirmāṇaratiṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1926: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti

K05bsu049_u:1929: ye 'pi kecitkauśika paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:1931: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyanti

K05bsu049_u:2019: bahūṃś ca bodhisattvāneva drakṣyati imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃgāyamānān prajñāpāramitāsaṃgītiratān - evaṃ sarvajñatā parigrahītavyā,
K05bsu049_u:2022: udāraṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmabhisaṃbodhiśabdaṃ śroṣyati - amuṣyāṃ diśi amuṣmin

K05bsu049_u:2028: yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imānevaṃrūpān svapnān drakṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:2031: ojaḥprakṣiptaṃ ca kāyaṃ sukhaṃ ca pratisaṃvedayiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:2035: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika bhikṣoryogācārasya samādhervyutthitasya manasikārapariṣyanditena cittena na balavatyāhāre gṛddhirbhavati,
K05bsu049_u:2037: evameva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā na balavatyāhāre gṛddhirbhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:2040: evaṃ hyetatkauśika bhavati - yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogānuyuktatvāttasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā tathā hyasya amanuṣyāḥ kāye oja upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante /

K05bsu049_u:2043: pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṃgamaṃ sthāpayet pūjayennodgṛhṇīyānna dhārayenna vācayenna
K05bsu049_u:2045: ayameva tataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /

K05bsu049_u:2052: antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā dhārayetsthāpayetsaddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
K05bsu049_u:2054: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /

K05bsu049_u:2066: antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā sthāpayitavyā pūjayitavyā saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
K05bsu049_u:2068: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /

K05bsu049_u:2077: punaraparaṃ bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma - sacetkauśika ayaṃ te jambūdvīpaḥ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ dīyeta,
K05bsu049_u:2079: tata ekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo 'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ katamaṃ tvaṃ kauśika bhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:2080: śakra āha - sacenme bhagavan ayaṃ jambūdvīpaḥ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ dīyeta,
K05bsu049_u:2082: tata ekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo 'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām /
K05bsu049_u:2088: mā khalu punarimaṃ bhikṣavaḥ satkāyaṃ kāyaṃ manyadhvam /
K05bsu049_u:2090: eṣa ca tathāgatakāyo bhūtakoṭiprabhāvito draṣṭavyo yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:2093: api tu khalu punarbhagavan itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto nirjātāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante /

K05bsu049_u:2097: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāmahaṃ yasmin samaye divye svake āsane niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi,
K05bsu049_u:2100: atha tasmin samaye yanmamāsanaṃ tatra devaputrā mama gauraveṇa tadāsanaṃ namaskṛtya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva prakrāmanti /

K05bsu049_u:2112: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvātpūjāṃ labhante /
K05bsu049_u:2113: tiṣṭhatu khalu punarbhagavan ayaṃ jambūdvīpastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:2116: tiṣṭhatu bhagavan dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:2119: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dvitīyo bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta /
