K05bsu049_u:2125: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni pūjāṃ labhante /
K05bsu049_u:2128: tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām /
K05bsu049_u:2129: na khalu punar me bhagavaṃsteṣu tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam /
K05bsu049_u:2131: api tu khalu punarbhagavan itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto nirjātāni tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante yaduta prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvāt /
K05bsu049_u:2132: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan anarghaṃ maṇiratnamebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ syāt /
K05bsu049_u:2134: tatra tatra manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraṃ na labheran /
K05bsu049_u:2135: yatra yatra vā amanuṣyagṛhītaḥ kaścidbhavet puruṣo vā strī vā,
K05bsu049_u:2136: tatra tatra tasmin maṇiratne praveśitamātre so 'manuṣyastato 'pakrāmet /
K05bsu049_u:2137: vātenāpi bādhyamānasya dhamyamāne śarīre tanmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta /
K05bsu049_u:2145: śleṣmaṇāpi parigṛddhe sarvato bādhyamāne śarīre sthāpyeta,
K05bsu049_u:2150: tasya tam api sāṃnipātikaṃ vyādhiṃ nigṛhṇīyāt,
K05bsu049_u:2154: uṣṇe cāpi vartamāne yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe sthāpyeta,
K05bsu049_u:2156: śīte cāpi vartamāne yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe sthāpyeta,
K05bsu049_u:2163: sacedbhagavan strī vā puruṣo vā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭo bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:2165: tasya sahadaṃśanenaiva maṇiratnasya tadviṣaṃ pratihanyeta vigacchet /
K05bsu049_u:2166: ebhiścānyaiś ca bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:2167: yeṣām api keṣāṃcidbhagavan akṣiṣvarbudaṃ vā timiraṃ vā akṣirogo vā paṭalaṃ vā bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:2169: teṣāṃ sthāpitamātreṇaiva te 'kṣidoṣā nirghātaṃ praśamaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
K05bsu049_u:2170: etaiś ca anyaiś ca bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:2175: evaṃ sacennīlena pītena lohitena māñjiṣṭhena eteṣāmanyeṣāṃ vā nānāprakārāṇāṃ vastrāṇāmanyatamena vastreṇa tanmaṇiratnaṃ veṣṭayitvā vā baddhvā vā udake prakṣipyeta,
K05bsu049_u:2176: tena tena vastrarāgeṇa tattatsvabhāvavarṇaṃ tadudakaṃ kuryāt /
K05bsu049_u:2178: ebhir api bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet //
K05bsu049_u:2179: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kiṃ punaḥ kauśika devaloka (Vaidya 50)
K05bsu049_u:2181: uta jāmbūdvīpakānām api manuṣyāṇāṃ tāni maṇiratnāni santi?
K05bsu049_u:2182: śakra āha - deveṣvāryānanda tāni maṇiratnāni santi /
K05bsu049_u:2183: api tu khalu punarjāmbudvīpakānām api manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni santi /
K05bsu049_u:2184: tāni tu gurukāṇi alpāni parīttāni guṇavikalāni,
K05bsu049_u:2186: tatteṣāṃ divyānāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopayānti,
K05bsu049_u:2194: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamante nopayānti /
K05bsu049_u:2197: yatra ca karaṇḍake tanmaṇiratnaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavati utkṣiptaṃ vā,
K05bsu049_u:2198: tata uddhṛte 'pi tasmin maṇiratne karaṇḍakāt spṛhaṇīya eva sa karaṇḍako bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:2200: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā ete guṇāḥ sarvajñajñānasya ca /
K05bsu049_u:2201: yena parinirvṛtasyāpi tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante - sarvajñajñānasyemāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanabhūtānyabhūvanniti
K05bsu049_u:2202: yathā ca bhagavan sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā prajñāpāramitānirjātatvātpūjyā,
K05bsu049_u:2204: yathā ca bhagavan rājapuruṣo rājānubhāvānmahato janakāyasya akutobhayaḥ pūjyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2205: evaṃ sa dharmabhāṇako dharmakāyānubhāvānmahato janakāyasya akutobhayaḥ pūjyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:2206: yathā ca dharmadeśanā dharmabhāṇakāś ca pūjāṃ labhante,
K05bsu049_u:2208: tasmāttarhi bhagavan tiṣṭhatu trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2210: te 'pi sarve tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇāścūlikābaddhā eko bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta,
K05bsu049_u:2211: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dvitīyo bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta /
K05bsu049_u:2212: tatra cenmāṃ bhagavan kaścideva pravārayedanyatareṇa bhāgena,
K05bsu049_u:2213: pravāryamāṇo 'nayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ - yaste bhāgo 'bhipretaḥ tamekaṃ bhāgaṃ parigṛhṇīṣveti,
K05bsu049_u:2214: tatra imāmevāhaṃ bhagavaṃstayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorbhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitām /
K05bsu049_u:2215: na khalu punarbhagavan mama teṣu tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam /
K05bsu049_u:2217: api tu khalu punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitā sarvajñatā,
K05bsu049_u:2219: tasmāttarhi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pūjitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjā kṛtā bhavati //
K05bsu049_u:2220: punaraparaṃ bhagavan ye 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanta etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:2221: tān dharmatayā draṣṭukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
K05bsu049_u:2224: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:2225: ye 'pi te kauśika abhūvannatīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2226: te 'pi kauśika imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:2227: (Vaidya 51) ye 'pi te kauśika bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2228: te 'pi kauśika imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
K05bsu049_u:2229: ye 'pi te kauśika etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:2230: te 'pi kauśika buddhā bhagavantaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:2231: aham api kauśika etarhi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:2232: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:2233: sarvasattvānāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaścittacaritāni samyak prajānāti saṃpaśyati /
K05bsu049_u:2235: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05bsu049_u:2236: tena sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samyak prajānāti saṃpaśyati //
K05bsu049_u:2237: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmeva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati nānyāsu pāramitāsu?
K05bsu049_u:2238: bhagavānāha - sarvāsu kauśika ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati /
K05bsu049_u:2239: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva atra pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ vā dadataḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2244: dharmān vā vipaśyataḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitaivātra pūrvaṃgamā /
K05bsu049_u:2245: na ca kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ viśeṣaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2247: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jambudvīpe nānāvṛkṣā nānāvarṇā nānāsaṃsthānā nānāpatrā nānāpuṣpā nānāphalā nānārohapariṇāhasaṃpannāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2248: na ca teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ chāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,
K05bsu049_u:2249: api tu chāyā chāyetyevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
K05bsu049_u:2250: evameva kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ na viśeṣaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2252: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāguṇasamanvāgateyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:2258: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K05bsu049_u:2265: antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā dhārayetsthāpayetsaddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
K05bsu049_u:2267: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca anugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
K05bsu049_u:2268: evamimaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā evaṃmahārthikā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
K05bsu049_u:2279: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ yo vā anyaḥ saṃpūjya parasmai cārthikāya chandikāya kulaputrāya kuladuhitre vā yācamānāya dadyādupanāmayenniryātayetparityajet,
K05bsu049_u:2281: katarastayorbhagavan kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet - yo vā parityāgabuddhiryo vā na parityāgabuddhiḥ?
K05bsu049_u:2282: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - tena hi kauśika tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi /
K05bsu049_u:2284: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śarīraṃ satkṛtya paricareddhārayet satkuryādgurukuryānmānayet pūjayedarcayedapacāyet svayameva /
K05bsu049_u:2285: yo vā anyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīraṃ svayaṃ ca satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyet,
K05bsu049_u:2287: dadyāt saṃvibhajet vaistārikī pūjā bhaviṣyatīti sattvānāṃ cānukampāmupādāya /
K05bsu049_u:2288: katarastayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K05bsu049_u:2289: kiṃ yaḥ svayaṃ ca pūjayet parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeddadyāt saṃvibhajet,
K05bsu049_u:2290: kiṃ vā yaḥ svayameva pratyātmaṃ pūjayet?
K05bsu049_u:2291: śakra āha - yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svayaṃ ca tathāgataśarīraṃ satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyet,
K05bsu049_u:2292: parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeddadyātsaṃvibhajet vaistārikī pūjā bhaviṣyatīti sattvānāṃ cānukampāmupādāya,
K05bsu049_u:2293: ayamevānayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
K05bsu049_u:2295: evametatkauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā udgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt pravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśetsvādhyāyet,
K05bsu049_u:2296: parasmai cārthikāya chandikāya kulaputrāya kuladuhitre vā yācamānāya dadyādupanāmayenniryātayetparityajedantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā /
K05bsu049_u:2298: kuladuhitrorvā parānugrahakaraḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parityāgabuddhistannidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
K05bsu049_u:2299: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yatra yatra bhājanībhūtāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā syuḥ asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2300: tatra tatra gatvā tebhyaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt,
K05bsu049_u:2301: ayameva kauśika tataḥ kulaputrātkuladuhiturvā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //
K05bsu049_u:2302: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ye jambūdvīpe sattvāstān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayet pratiṣṭhāpayet,
K05bsu049_u:2303: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K05bsu049_u:2306: bhagavānāha - ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K05bsu049_u:2307: yaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate,
K05bsu049_u:2310: prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya adhyāśayasaṃpanno 'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena
K05bsu049_u:2311: antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpyakilāsitayā saṃpādayet - udyukto 'muṃ grāhayet saṃdarśayet samādāpayet samuttejayet saṃpraharṣayet,
K05bsu049_u:2316: evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva /
K05bsu049_u:2317: atra hi tvaṃ śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /

K05bsu049_u:2889: yaś ca tebhyaḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,
K05bsu049_u:2891: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K05bsu049_u:2894: saṃkhyāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum /
K05bsu049_u:2895: gaṇanāpi upamāpi aupamyam api upanisāpi upaniṣad api bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum //
K05bsu049_u:2896: bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K05bsu049_u:2897: yasteṣāmavinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kṣiprataramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyāt,
K05bsu049_u:2900: iha ca tān prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadedanuśiṣyāt tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika jāmbūdvīpakebhyaḥ sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya
K05bsu049_u:2903: tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,
K05bsu049_u:2905: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2906: yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2908: tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā (Vaidya 67)
K05bsu049_u:2911: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2912: yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2914: tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,
K05bsu049_u:2916: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2919: tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,
K05bsu049_u:2921: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2922: yāvantaḥ kauśika gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2924: tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,
K05bsu049_u:2926: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K05bsu049_u:2929: saṃkhyāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum /
K05bsu049_u:2930: gaṇanāpi upamāpi aupamyam api upanisāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum //
K05bsu049_u:2931: bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro va kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K05bsu049_u:2932: yasteṣāmavinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kṣiprataramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,
K05bsu049_u:2936: sa evaṃ vadet - ahameteṣāṃ kṣiprataramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsya iti /
K05bsu049_u:2937: yastaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kṣiprābhijñataraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadedanuśiṣyāt,
K05bsu049_u:2938: ayaṃ tataḥ paurvakātkulaputrātkuladuhiturvā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //
K05bsu049_u:2939: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - yathā yathā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2943: teṣāṃ tān kārān kṛtān mahāphalān karoti mahānuśaṃsān /
K05bsu049_u:2946: evaṃ hyetadbhagavan bhavati - yadbodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ //
K05bsu049_u:2947: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kauśika yastvaṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmutsāhaṃ dadāsi anugṛhṇīṣe anuparivārayasi /
K05bsu049_u:2948: evaṃ ca kauśika tvayā karaṇīyam - ya āryaśrāvakaḥ sarvasattvānāmanugrahaṃ kartukāmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:2949: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutsāhaṃ vardhayati anugṛhṇīte 'nuparivārayati,
K05bsu049_u:2953: yadi hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā etadbodhicittaṃ notpādayeran,
K05bsu049_u:2954: na caite bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau śikṣeran,
K05bsu049_u:2957: yasmāttarhi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaśikṣāyāmāsu ṣaṭpāramitāsu śikṣante,
K05bsu049_u:2963: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayate
K05bsu049_u:2964: sma - yacca khalu punaḥ ārya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu,
K05bsu049_u:2968: idameva tato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu agramākhyāyate,
K05bsu049_u:2979: evamukte āyupyān subhūtiḥ sthaviraṃ maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat
K05bsu049_u:2980: - yatpunarayaṃ maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśadiśi loke sarvataḥ sarvatra gatayā
K05bsu049_u:2982: trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu atīte 'dhvani ekaikasyāṃ diśi ekaikasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre
K05bsu049_u:2990: etasminnantare yasteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaśca,
K05bsu049_u:3019: ye ca tatra dharmadeśanāsu buddhadharmeṣu pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu (Vaidya 70)
K05bsu049_u:3020: śrāvakadharmeṣu vā vinītāḥ śikṣitā adhimuktā niyatāḥ saṃbodhiparāyaṇāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3022: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3023: teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni,
K05bsu049_u:3024: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtāḥ pratyekabodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3032: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ upāsakānāmupāsikānām,
K05bsu049_u:3036: yaiś ca tatra teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatāṃ devairnāgairyakṣairgandharvairasurairgaruḍaiḥ
K05bsu049_u:3037: kinnarairmahoragairmanuṣyāmanuṣyairvā yaiś ca tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni,
K05bsu049_u:3038: yaiś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvāpayatām api kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni,
K05bsu049_u:3039: yaiś ca tatra teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānām api kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni,
K05bsu049_u:3040: buddhaṃ ca bhagavantamāgamya dharmaṃ cāgamya saṃghaṃ cāgamya manobhāvanīyāṃś ca pudgalānāgamya teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni,
K05bsu049_u:3041: tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ niravaśeṣāniravaśeṣamanavaśeṣamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā agrayā anumodanayā anumodeta,
K05bsu049_u:3042: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttarayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodeta /
K05bsu049_u:3043: evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta - anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /
K05bsu049_u:3046: api nu tāni vastūni tāni vā ārambaṇāni te vā ākārāstathopalabhyeran yathā nimittīkaroti?
K05bsu049_u:3047: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat
K05bsu049_u:3048: - na tāni bhadanta subhūte vastūni tāni vā ārambaṇāni te vā ākārāstathopalabhyante
K05bsu049_u:3050: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yadi so 'saṃvidyamānaṃ vastu asaṃvidyamānamārambaṇamārambaṇīkuryāt,
K05bsu049_u:3051: nimittīkuryāt tatkathamasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso na bhavet?
K05bsu049_u:3053: hi rāgo 'pyasaṃvidyamānaṃ vastu anitye nityamiti duḥkhe sukhamiti anātmanyātmeti aśubhe śubhamiti vikalpya saṃkalpya utpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:3055: athāpi yathā vastu yathā ārambaṇaṃ yathā ākārastathā bodhistathā cittam,
K05bsu049_u:3057: yadi ca yathā vastu yathā ārambaṇaṃ yathā ākārastathā bodhistathā cittam,
K05bsu049_u:3058: tatkatamairvastubhiḥkatamairārambaṇaiḥ katamairākāraiḥ katamaṃ cittamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati?
K05bsu049_u:3059: katamadvā anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu kva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati?
K05bsu049_u:3060: (Vaidya 71) atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat
K05bsu049_u:3061: - nedamārya subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyaṃ nopadeṣṭavyam /
K05bsu049_u:3063: yad api hi syāttasya śraddhāmātrakaṃ premamātrakaṃ prasādamātrakaṃ gauravamātrakam,
K05bsu049_u:3065: avinivartanīyasyedamārya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyamupadeṣṭavyam /
K05bsu049_u:3066: yo vā kalyāṇamitropastabdho sattvo mahāsattvo bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:3067: so 'tra nāvaleṣyate na saṃleṣyate na vipatsyati na viṣādamāpatsyate,
K05bsu049_u:3071: evaṃ ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayitavyam //
K05bsu049_u:3072: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yena maitreya cittenānumodya yatpariṇāmayati,
K05bsu049_u:3076: kathaṃ vā śakyaṃ cittena cittaṃ pariṇāmayituṃ yadā dvayościttayoḥ samavadhānaṃ nāsti,
K05bsu049_u:3078: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - mā khalvārya
K05bsu049_u:3079: subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ
K05bsu049_u:3081: kathaṃ cārya subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tadanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayitavyam?
K05bsu049_u:3082: kathaṃ ca anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu parigṛhṇatā anumodanāsahagataṃ cittaṃ pariṇāmayatā tadanumodanāsahagataṃ cittaṃ suparigṛhītaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ
K05bsu049_u:3083: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamārabhya maitreyaṃ
K05bsu049_u:3084: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate
K05bsu049_u:3085: sma - iha maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvasteṣāmatītānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3088: daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi
K05bsu049_u:3089: ekaikasmiṃś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau aprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3091: yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhitaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3092: etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kuśalamūlāni pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni,
K05bsu049_u:3093: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ kuśalamūlābhisaṃskāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3094: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ, (Vaidya 72)
K05bsu049_u:3100: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣitā adhimuktāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3102: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvāvyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3104: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtāḥ pratyekabodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3106: yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,
K05bsu049_u:3109: yaiś ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni,
K05bsu049_u:3112: yaiś ca tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3114: yaiś ca teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāpayatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni,
K05bsu049_u:3116: tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodeta /
K05bsu049_u:3117: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayate,
K05bsu049_u:3118: pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:3119: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - sacedārya subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati,
K05bsu049_u:3121: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:3122: yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti /
K05bsu049_u:3123: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3125: taccittaṃ saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3126: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3143: punaraparam ārya subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yathā atītānāmevamanāgatānāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3148: etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
K05bsu049_u:3149: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3154: ye ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:3155: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣiṣyante 'dhimokṣayiṣyanti pratiṣṭhāsyanti,
K05bsu049_u:3156: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vyākariṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3158: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikān pudgalān vyākariṣyanti pratyekabodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3160: yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,
K05bsu049_u:3163: ye ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:3165: ye ca tiryagyonigatā api sattvāstaṃ dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:3167: ye ca sattvāsteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāyatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:3169: tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumoditavyāni /
K05bsu049_u:3170: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayato
K05bsu049_u:3171: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:3174: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3175: sa yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ cittamiti,
K05bsu049_u:3176: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3177: atha yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati taccittaṃ saṃjānīte - idaṃ taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3178: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3179: sacetpunarbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaccittaṃ pariṇāmayati taccittamevaṃ saṃjānīte evaṃ samānvāharati,
K05bsu049_u:3193: (Vaidya 74) punaraparamārya subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3195: trisāhasra mahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānāṃ yāpayatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya
K05bsu049_u:3199: etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
K05bsu049_u:3200: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3205: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K05bsu049_u:3206: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣante 'dhimokṣayanti pratitiṣṭhanti,
K05bsu049_u:3208: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vyākurvanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3210: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikān pudgalān vyākurvanti pratyekabodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3212: yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,
K05bsu049_u:3215: ye ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,
K05bsu049_u:3216: ye ca devānāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā vā taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti,
K05bsu049_u:3218: ye ca tiryagyonigatā api sattvāstaṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti,
K05bsu049_u:3220: ye ca teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāyatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti,
K05bsu049_u:3222: tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumoditavyāni /
K05bsu049_u:3223: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayato
K05bsu049_u:3224: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:3227: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati - yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti /
K05bsu049_u:3228: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3229: atha yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati taccittaṃ saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3230: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3232: taccittamevaṃ saṃjānīte evaṃ samanvāharati - taccittaṃ samanvāhriyamāṇameva kṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇamityevaṃ saṃjānīte,
K05bsu049_u:3250: yāvacca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāḥ parinirvāsyanti parinirvānti ca,
K05bsu049_u:3251: yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca,
K05bsu049_u:3252: etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
K05bsu049_u:3253: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3258: yaiś ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirdharmo deśito deśayiṣyate deśyate ca,
K05bsu049_u:3259: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca,
K05bsu049_u:3263: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3265: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3267: yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,
K05bsu049_u:3270: yaiś ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
K05bsu049_u:3271: yaiś ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragairmanuṣyāmanuṣyairvā sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca,
K05bsu049_u:3273: yaiś ca tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca,
K05bsu049_u:3275: yaiś ca sattvaisteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvṛteṣu parinirvāsyatsu parinirvāyatsu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante
K05bsu049_u:3277: tāni sarvāṇyakato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamagrayā anumodanayā anumodeta,
K05bsu049_u:3278: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodeta /
K05bsu049_u:3279: evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta - anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /
K05bsu049_u:3280: tasya kathaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:3281: sacetpariṇāmayan evaṃ samanvāharati - te dharmāḥ kṣīṇā niruddhā vigatā vipariṇatāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3282: sa ca dharmo 'kṣayo yatra pariṇāmyate ityevaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ (Vaidya 76)
K05bsu049_u:3286: evaṃ bhadantaṃ subhūte pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3288: tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate /
K05bsu049_u:3289: sacetpunarevaṃ saṃjānīte - na cittaṃ cittaṃ jānāti,
K05bsu049_u:3297: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - so 'pi puṇyābhisaṃskāro viviktaḥ śāntaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3298: yadapyanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tad api viviktaṃ śāntamiti pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K05bsu049_u:3299: sacedevam api na saṃjānīte - sarvasaṃskārāḥ śāntā viviktā iti,
K05bsu049_u:3300: evamiyaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad api tatteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kuśalamūlam /
K05bsu049_u:3302: yenāpi tatpariṇāmitaṃ tad api tajjātikaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ tannikāyaṃ tatsvabhāvam /
K05bsu049_u:3306: na hi buddhā bhagavanto nimittayogena pariṇāmanāmabhyanujānanti /
K05bsu049_u:3310: yacca nopalabhyate tannaiva nimittaṃ na viṣayaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:3313: atha smṛtivaikalyena na nimittīkaroti na samanvāharati na manasi karoti smṛtivaikalyādanavabodhādvā,
K05bsu049_u:3317: evaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K05bsu049_u:3318: evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam - idaṃ tadbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:3321: atra copāyakauśalaṃ śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā
K05bsu049_u:3322: abhīkṣṇaṃ śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā
K05bsu049_u:3325: na hi prajñāpāramitāmanāgamya śakyeyamaśrutavatā prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmanākriyā praveṣṭum /
K05bsu049_u:3326: tatra ya evaṃ vadet - śakyamanāgamya prajñāpāramitāṃ tatpuṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumiti,
K05bsu049_u:3332: api tu khalu punaḥ sa pudgalo nimittīkṛtya vikalpya ca yathābhūtamayathābhūte yathābhūtasaṃjñī upalambhamanupalambhe pariṇāmayet,
K05bsu049_u:3333: tasya kuśalamūlaṃ buddhā bhagavanta evaṃ pariṇāmitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau nābhyanujānanti /
K05bsu049_u:3337: yatsa parinirvāṇam api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nimittīkaroti vikalpayati ca /
K05bsu049_u:3339: na copalambhasaṃjñinastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pariṇāmanāṃ mahārthakarīṃ vadanti /
K05bsu049_u:3342: tadyathāpi nāma praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ saviṣaṃ bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:3343: kiṃ cāpi tadvarṇataś ca gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś ca abhilaṣaṇīyaṃ bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:3344: api tu khalu punaḥ saviṣatvātparivarjanīyaṃ bhavati paṇḍitānām,
K05bsu049_u:3346: tadeva bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta /
K05bsu049_u:3347: tasya tadbhojanaṃ paribhuñjānasya varṇatasya gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś ca svādeṣu sukhakaraṃ pariṇāme cāsya duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3350: evameva ārya subhūte ihaike durgṛhītena durupalakṣitena duḥsvādhyātena subhāṣitasyārthamajānānā yathābhūtamarthamanavabudhyamānā evamavavadiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:3351: evamanuśāsiṣyanti - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham /
K05bsu049_u:3352: teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ yaistatra teṣvatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
K05bsu049_u:3353: yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca,
K05bsu049_u:3354: etasminnantare teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca
K05bsu049_u:3355: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānām,
K05bsu049_u:3356: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca,
K05bsu049_u:3357: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
K05bsu049_u:3358: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3359: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
K05bsu049_u:3360: ye ca śrāvakayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca śrāvakabodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3361: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
K05bsu049_u:3362: yāni ca pṛthagjanānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3363: bhagavatāṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā
K05bsu049_u:3364: niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
K05bsu049_u:3365: evaṃ sa pariṇāmo nimittayogena pariṇāmyamāno viṣatvāya saṃpravartate,
K05bsu049_u:3375: kathaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K05bsu049_u:3376: ihānena bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatamanabhyākhyātukāmena evaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamanumoditavyamevaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te (Vaidya 78)
K05bsu049_u:3377: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā buddhajñānena buddhacakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇam
K05bsu049_u:3378: yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate tathā anumode tatkuśalamūlam,
K05bsu049_u:3379: yathā ca te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhyanujānanti pariṇāmyamānaṃ tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05bsu049_u:3381: evamanumodamāna evaṃ pariṇāmayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'naparāddho bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3382: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samyaktvānumoditaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ ca bhavati tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
K05bsu049_u:3384: evaṃ cāsya pariṇāmo nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati adhyāśayena adhimuktyā pariṇāmayataḥ
K05bsu049_u:3385: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyam
K05bsu049_u:3386: - yacchīlaṃ yaḥ samādhiryā prajñā yā vimuktiryadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tadyathā aparyāpannaṃ
K05bsu049_u:3387: kāmadhātau aparyāpannaṃ rūpadhātau aparyāpannamārūpyadhātau nāpyatītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam /
K05bsu049_u:3394: evaṃ pariṇāmayatastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinaṣṭaḥ pariṇāmo bhavatyaparyāpanno nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3398: anayā dharmadhātupariṇāmanayā yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti,
K05bsu049_u:3399: yathā cābhyanujānanti tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitamevaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatīti,
K05bsu049_u:3401: evaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
K05bsu049_u:3402: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
K05bsu049_u:3408: asyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti paśyanti,
K05bsu049_u:3409: tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate,
K05bsu049_u:3413: atra yaḥ puṇyaskandho yaś ca gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3414: tān sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayetpratiṣṭhāpayet,
K05bsu049_u:3416: tato 'yameva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajaḥ puṇyaskandho 'gra ākhyāyate,
K05bsu049_u:3427: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu (Vaidya 79)
K05bsu049_u:3429: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3430: te sarve caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3432: tato 'yameva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmanāsahagataḥ puṇyaskandho 'gra ākhyāyate,
K05bsu049_u:3443: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ caturdhyānaniṣpādanasaṃbhūtaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3444: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3446: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu caturapramāṇalābhināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3447: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3449: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu caturārūpyasamāpattilābhināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3450: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3452: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu pañcābhijñānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3453: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu srotaāpannā bhaveyuḥ /

K05bsu049_u:3463: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3465: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ puṇyaskandhaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3466: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3467: te sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
K05bsu049_u:3468: ye sarve anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3473: etena paryāyeṇa tān sarvasattvānekaikaṃ parikalpya tāṃś ca sarvabodhisattvānekaiko
K05bsu049_u:3477: evamekaikasteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanena paryāyeṇa dānaṃ dadyāt,
K05bsu049_u:3479: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te bodhisattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ?
K05bsu049_u:3484: saṃkhyāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum,
K05bsu049_u:3485: gaṇanāpi upamāpi aupamyam api upanisāpi upaniṣad api bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum /
K05bsu049_u:3487: sa puṇyaskandho gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣv api trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu na māyet //
K05bsu049_u:3488: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmataṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:3489: yatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto 'nena dharmadhātupariṇāmena tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
K05bsu049_u:3491: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajasya asau pūrvaka upalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3492: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3493: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
K05bsu049_u:3495: tathā hi teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāmupalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ subahv api dānaṃ dattaṃ subahvity api parisaṃkhyātaṃ bhavati //
K05bsu049_u:3496: atha khalu cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ viṃśatisahasrāṇi prāñjalīni namasyanti
K05bsu049_u:3497: bhagavantametadavocan - mahāpariṇāmo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yaduta
K05bsu049_u:3499: yatra hi nāma teṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāvantaṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāramabhibhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3502: divyaiśchatrairdivyairdhvajairdivyābhirghaṇṭābhirdivyābhiḥ patākābhiḥ samantācca divyadīpamālābhirbahuvidhābhiś ca divyābhiḥ pūjābhirbhagavantaṃ satkurvanti sma,
K05bsu049_u:3503: gurukurvanti sma mānayanti sma pūjayanti sma arcayanti sma apacāyanti sma,
K05bsu049_u:3505: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo 'yaṃ dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3506: yatra hi nāma tatteṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraskandhamabhibhavati
K05bsu049_u:3509: bhagavantaṃ parameṇa satkāreṇa parameṇa gurukāreṇa paramayā mānanayā paramayā pūjanayā
K05bsu049_u:3510: paramayā arcanayā paramayā apacāyanayā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā arcayitvā
K05bsu049_u:3514: yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā
K05bsu049_u:3515: mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā
K05bsu049_u:3516: anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3517: te 'pyevamevāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantaṃ namasyanta etadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3518: yasteṣāmupalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāvaccirarātrasaṃcitamam api tathā mahāvistarasamudānītam api puṇyaskandhamabhibhavati //
K05bsu049_u:3519: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān śuddhāvāsakāyikān devaputrānādīn kṛtvā sarvāṃstān devaputrānāmantrayate
K05bsu049_u:3520: sma - tiṣṭhatu khalu punardevaputrā gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu
K05bsu049_u:3522: samyaksaṃbodheḥ pratilambhāya dānaṃ dadatāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ anena paryāyeṇa,
K05bsu049_u:3523: ye 'pi te devaputrā anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3524: te 'pi sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā bodhāya cittamutpādya
K05bsu049_u:3527: sukhasparśavihārairekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
K05bsu049_u:3528: evaṃ sarve 'pi yāvatte copalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadyuḥ /
K05bsu049_u:3529: etena paryāyeṇa tān sarvasattvānekaikaṃ parikalpya tāṃś ca sarvabodhisattvānekaiko
K05bsu049_u:3530: bodhisattvo yāvatsarve te bodhisattvā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhantastān sarvasattvāṃścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
K05bsu049_u:3534: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ
K05bsu049_u:3536: yaiś ca tatra anyair api sattvaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitānyavaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
K05bsu049_u:3537: tatsarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamagrayā anumodanayā anumodate /
K05bsu049_u:3538: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodanayā anumodate /
K05bsu049_u:3539: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati - anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /
K05bsu049_u:3540: asyānumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastunaḥ so 'pi paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3541: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3543: gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
K05bsu049_u:3545: tathā hi te bodhisattvāḥ sarve 'pyupalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadati //
K05bsu049_u:3548: ca atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ yannāma kuśalamūlaṃ tatsarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā
K05bsu049_u:3550: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodate iti /
K05bsu049_u:3552: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadi subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ
K05bsu049_u:3553: pudgalo 'tītāgatapratyutpannān gṛhṇīte na manyate nopalabhate na kalpayati na vikalpayati
K05bsu049_u:3557: nātra kaściddharma utpanno nāpi kaściddharma utpatsyate nāpi kaściddharma utpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:3558: nāpi kaściddharmo niruddho nāpi kaściddharmo nirutsyate nāpi kaściddharmo nirudhyate /
K05bsu049_u:3559: ityevametān dharmānupaparīkṣya yathaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathānumodate /
K05bsu049_u:3561: iyatā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya agrā anumodanā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3562: asya subhūte kuśalamūlapariṇāmasya teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāmupalambhasaṃjñināmupalambhadṛṣṭikāṇāṃ taddānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3563: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3564: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate //
K05bsu049_u:3565: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarveṣāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3579: yathā vimuktistathā teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye parinirvṛtāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3580: yathā vimuktistathā te dharmā ye 'tītā niruddhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3581: yathā vimuktistathā te dharmā ye 'nāgatā anutpannāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3582: yathā vimuktistathā te dharmā ye etarhi pratyutpannā vartamānāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3583: yathā vimuktistathā te 'tītā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3584: yathā vimuktistathā te 'nāgatā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3585: yathā vimuktistathā te pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3586: ye etarhyaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:3592: iyatā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya agrā anumodanā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3593: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte te 'pi ye 'nyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K05bsu049_u:3594: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthāya anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu
K05bsu049_u:3595: lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpādya sarve 'pyekaiko bodhisattvaḥ ekaikasmai
K05bsu049_u:3598: anena paryāyeṇa sarve 'pi te sarvebhya upatiṣṭhantaḥ upalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadyuḥ /
K05bsu049_u:3599: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3601: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān kāyasucaritaṃ vāksucaritaṃ manaḥsucaritamupalambhasaṃjñinaḥ śīlaṃ samādāya varteran /
K05bsu049_u:3602: anena paryāyeṇa sarve 'pi te bodhisattvā ekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān
K05bsu049_u:3603: kalpāṃstiṣṭhan gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān kāyasucaritaṃ vāksucaritaṃ manaḥsucaritamupalambhasaṃjñī
K05bsu049_u:3605: etena paryāyeṇa sarve 'pi te bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ śīlaṃ samādāya varteran /
K05bsu049_u:3610: kuśalamūlaṃ sarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate
K05bsu049_u:3612: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintayā anumodanayā anumodate /
K05bsu049_u:3613: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
K05bsu049_u:3614: asya subhūte anumodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvāna śīlamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3615: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3616: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
K05bsu049_u:3618: tathā hi te bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ śīlaṃ samādāya vartanta iti /
K05bsu049_u:3619: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3620: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān kāyasucaritaṃ vāksucaritaṃ manaḥsucaritaṃ śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3621: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3624: trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvairekaiko bodhisattva ākruṣṭo 'bhihataḥ paribhāṣitaḥ samāna eva,
K05bsu049_u:3625: sarve 'pi te upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya varteran,
K05bsu049_u:3626: yāvatsarve te bodhisattvāḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya vartamānāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3627: etena paryāyeṇa sarve te bodhisattvā ekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan
K05bsu049_u:3629: lokadhātuṣu sarvairākruṣṭo 'bhihataḥ paribhāṣitaḥ samānaḥ upalambhasaṃjñī kṣāntiṃ samādāya varteta /
K05bsu049_u:3630: evaṃ sarve 'pi te sarvairākruṣṭā abhihatāḥ paribhāṣitāḥ samānā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya varteran /
K05bsu049_u:3631: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto
K05bsu049_u:3635: ca atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā
K05bsu049_u:3637: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintayā anumodanayā anumodate /
