K05bsu049_u:3640: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3641: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
K05bsu049_u:3643: tathā hi te bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya vartante /
K05bsu049_u:3644: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvāḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ
K05bsu049_u:3646: lokadhātuṣu sarvairākruṣṭā abhihatāḥ paribhāṣitāḥ samānāḥ upalambhasaṃjñino gaṅgānadīvālukopamān
K05bsu049_u:3648: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3657: sarvasattvānāṃ ca atītānāgatapratyutpannānān kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārān sarvānekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate agrayā anumodanayā /
K05bsu049_u:3658: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttarayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodanayā anumodate /
K05bsu049_u:3659: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
K05bsu049_u:3660: asya subhūte anumodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vīryamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3661: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3662: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
K05bsu049_u:3664: tathā hi te bodhisattvāḥ sarve 'pyupalambhasaṃjñino vīryaṃ samādāya vartante /
K05bsu049_u:3665: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3669: ye 'pi te subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3671: te sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānupalambhasaṃjñinaścatvāri dhyānāni samāpadyeran /
K05bsu049_u:3672: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto
K05bsu049_u:3678: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttarayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodanayā anumodate /
K05bsu049_u:3679: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyatriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
K05bsu049_u:3680: asya subhūte anumodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3681: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K05bsu049_u:3682: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
K05bsu049_u:3684: tathā hi te bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñino dhyānāni samāpadyante iti //
K05bsu049_u:3688: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - sarvajñajñānapariniṣpattirbhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
K05bsu049_u:3705: pañcacakṣuḥparigrahaṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāṃ mārgadarśayitrī bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:3714: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāmupādāya mātā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:3721: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
K05bsu049_u:3724: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - yathā śāriputra śāstari,
K05bsu049_u:3726: tathaiva manasi kartavyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā yathā śāstā /
K05bsu049_u:3727: tathaiva namaskartavyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā yathā śāstā //
K05bsu049_u:3728: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - kuto nu bateyamāryasya śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā?
K05bsu049_u:3730: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kuta iyamāryasya śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā?
K05bsu049_u:3732: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ
K05bsu049_u:3733: kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'numodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃsteṣāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3736: yaś ca śīlamayo yaś ca kṣāntimayo yaś ca vīryamayo yaś ca dhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3739: api nu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṃgamā pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvajñatāmārgāvatārāya /
K05bsu049_u:3740: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jātyandhānāṃ śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā apariṇāyakamabhavyaṃ mārgāvatārāya,
K05bsu049_u:3741: abhavyaṃ grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā gantum,
K05bsu049_u:3742: evameva kauśika dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntivīryaṃ dhyānaṃ ca prajñāpāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate /
K05bsu049_u:3746: yadā punaḥ kauśika dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntirvīyaṃ dhyānaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:3748: tadā hyāsāṃ cakṣuḥpratilambho bhavati pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvajñatāmārgāvatārāya sarvajñatānuprāptaye //
K05bsu049_u:3749: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā?
K05bsu049_u:3750: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - rūpasya śāriputra abhinirhāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:3755: evamabhinirhāreṇa pañcānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirhāraḥ prajñāpāramitāyā abhinirhāro 'bhinirhāra ityucyate //
K05bsu049_u:3756: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evamabhinirhāreṇa abhinirhṛtā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā katamaṃ dharmamarpayati?
K05bsu049_u:3757: bhagavānāha - evamabhinirhṛtā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamarpayati /
K05bsu049_u:3760: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kimiyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatām api nārpayati?
K05bsu049_u:3761: bhagavānāha - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - kimiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatām api nārpayatīti?
K05bsu049_u:3767: śakra āha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati,
K05bsu049_u:3770: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - sacedevam api bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo saṃjñāsyate,
K05bsu049_u:3775: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:3782: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte paridīpitāyāṃ na rūpaṃ paridīpitaṃ bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3783: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:3791: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:3792: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte katamena paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
K05bsu049_u:3793: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - na bhagavan rūpaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti,
K05bsu049_u:3795: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
K05bsu049_u:3799: tāny api na balīkaroti na durbalīkaroti,
K05bsu049_u:3806: sacedevam api bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃjānīte,
K05bsu049_u:3809: kiṃ punarevaṃ saṃjānānaḥ - evamahaṃ sarvajñajñānasamanvāgata sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:3812: na hyeṣa prajñāpāramitāniṣyando ya imān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti sattvopalambhaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:3823: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
K05bsu049_u:3824: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3825: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhimokṣayiṣyati na kāṅkṣiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati na dhandhāyiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:3827: kiyacciracaritāvī ca sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3828: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmarthataś ca dharmataś ca arthanayataś ca dharmanayataś ca anugamiṣyati anubhotsyate 'nubodhayiṣyati ca?
K05bsu049_u:3829: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05bsu049_u:3830: 'nyebhyo lokadhātubhyaścyuto buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchya ihopapanno veditavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:3832: yaḥ kaścicchāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo lokadhātubhyaścyuto buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchaya (Vaidya 89)
K05bsu049_u:3834: sa imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ śṛṇuyāt,
K05bsu049_u:3835: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā atra śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmutpādayet - śāstā me saṃmukhībhūt iti,
K05bsu049_u:3840: ciracaritāvī sa śāriputra tathārūpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:3841: bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ sa śāriputra tathārūpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:3842: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - śakyā punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣyayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā?
K05bsu049_u:3846: anena vā ākāreṇa liṅgena nimitteneti śakyā nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā?
K05bsu049_u:3848: neyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā skandhaśo vā dhātuśo vā āyatanaśo vā śakyā nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā /
K05bsu049_u:3851: atyantaviviktatvātsubhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ na śakyā prajñāpāramitā nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā /
K05bsu049_u:3854: skandhadhātvāyatanameva hi subhūte śūnyaṃ viviktaṃ śāntam /
K05bsu049_u:3855: iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāraṃ śūnyatvādviviktatvāt /
K05bsu049_u:3859: yadā na bhavati saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:3861: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - kiyacciracaritāvī sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyo ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpatsyate?
K05bsu049_u:3863: syātkhalu punaḥ subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvā bahūni buddhaśatāni bahūni
K05bsu049_u:3864: buddhasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhaśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā teṣāmantike brahmacaryaṃ caritvā
K05bsu049_u:3867: pūrvam api teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikādasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmagauravatā abhūt /
K05bsu049_u:3873: te tatonidānaṃ dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitena ācitena upacitena
K05bsu049_u:3874: etarhy api gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmapakrāmanti /
K05bsu049_u:3875: agauravatayā aśraddadhānā anadhimuñcanto na kāyena na cittena sāmagrīṃ dadati /
K05bsu049_u:3876: te sāmagrīmadadānā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na jānanti na paśyanti na budhyante na vedayante /
K05bsu049_u:3884: te tena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitena ācitena upacitena duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmābhisaṃskariṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:3885: tena te duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena imāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3886: prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāṃ pratyākhyāsyanti pratikṣepsyanti pratikrokṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:3888: asyāḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pratyākhyānena pratikṣepeṇa pratikrośena atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā pratyākhyātā bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:3897: evaṃ te ātmasaṃtānānupahatya vivecya parasaṃtānānapyupahatya vivecya prajñāpāramitāmabhyākhyāsyanti /
K05bsu049_u:3903: evaṃ teṣāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:3904: te sattvānāṃ hitasukhopacchedakriyayā mahānirayavipākasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma upaceṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:3906: duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi
K05bsu049_u:3907: bahūni varṣakoṭīśatāni bahūni varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni
K05bsu049_u:3910: teṣāṃ tathā suciraṃ mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:3914: te tatra vikṣiptāsteṣu mahānirayeṣūpapannāḥ samānāstatrāpi mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:3915: teṣāṃ tatrāpi mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tatrāpi punareva tathaiva tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:3916: te tasyāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanyāṃ prādurbhūtāyāṃ tataścyutāḥ samānāḥ punareva anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayāstatra kṣepsyante /
K05bsu049_u:3919: teṣāṃ tatrāpi suciraṃ mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tatrāpi tathaiva tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:3920: te tasyāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanyāṃ prādurbhūtāyāṃ punareva tataścyutāstenaiva akṣīṇena sāvaśeṣeṇa karmaṇā ihaiva lokadhātau punaḥ kṣepsyante /
K05bsu049_u:3922: te punareva tāni mahānirayeṣu mahānti mahānirayaduḥkhāni (Vaidya 91)
K05bsu049_u:3929: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - pañca bhagavan ānantaryāṇi karmāṇi
K05bsu049_u:3930: kṛtānyupacitāni asya manoduścaritasya vāgduścaritasya ca na prativarṇikāny api na
K05bsu049_u:3931: anurūpāṇy api na pratirūpāṇy api bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:3933: pañcānantaryāṇi śāriputra karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitānyasya manoduścaritasya ca vāgduścaritasya
K05bsu049_u:3934: ca na prativarṇikāny api na anurūpāṇy api na pratirūpāṇy api asya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasya
K05bsu049_u:3936: ye kecidimāṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
K05bsu049_u:3943: te svasaṃtānān saviṣān kṛtvā parasaṃtānān saviṣān kariṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:3945: svayaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā anavabudhyamānāḥ parān api grāhayiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:3948: kutastaiḥ saha saṃvāsaṃ kuto vā lābhasatkāraṃ kutaḥ sthānam?
K05bsu049_u:3950: dharmadūṣakā hi te śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyā iti /
K05bsu049_u:3952: kṛṣṇānirjātikāḥ kṛṣṇāhijātikāste śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:3953: teṣāṃ śāriputra tathārūpāṇāṃ pudgālānāṃ ye śrotavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K05bsu049_u:3956: ime te śāriputra dharmadūṣakāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:3957: śāriputra āha - na bhagavatā tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamākhyātam /
K05bsu049_u:3958: bhagavānāha - tiṣṭhatu śāriputra tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam /
K05bsu049_u:3960: mā tathārūpasya pudgalasya tadātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ śrutvā uṣṇaṃ rūdhiraṃ mukhādāgacchet,
K05bsu049_u:3967: maiva mahāpratibhayaṃ tasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamaśrauṣīdyasyeme doṣāḥ saṃvidyante //
K05bsu049_u:3968: na bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karoti - iyattasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
K05bsu049_u:3969: dvitīyakam api tṛtīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ākhyātu me bhagavāṃstasya pudgalasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam /
K05bsu049_u:3970: paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyatianena vāṅbhanaḥkarmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitenopacitenopacitena evaṃ mahāntaṃ mahānirayeṣvātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇīteti
K05bsu049_u:3971: bhagavānāha - eṣa eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:3972: yadanena vāṅbhanoduścaritena akuśalena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena iyacciraduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti /
K05bsu049_u:3974: vyākhyātā, eṣa eva śuklāṃśikasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā saṃvego bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:3975: tataḥ sa tebhyo dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyebhyaḥ karmabhyo vinivṛtya puṇyābhisaṃskārameva kuryāt,
K05bsu049_u:3976: jīvitahetor api saddharmaṃ na pratikṣepsyati - mā bhūdasmākam api tādṛśairduḥkhai samavadhānamiti //
K05bsu049_u:3977: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - susaṃvṛtakāyakarmavākkarmamanaskarmaṇā bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bhavitavyam
K05bsu049_u:3979: yatra hi nāma bhagavan evaṃrūpeṇa vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
K05bsu049_u:3980: katamena punarbhagavan karmaṇā iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
K05bsu049_u:3981: bhagavānāha - evaṃrūpeṇa subhūte vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
K05bsu049_u:3982: ihaiva te subhūte mohapuruṣāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:3983: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
K05bsu049_u:3986: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca pratibādhitāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhabodhiḥ pratibādhitā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3987: buddhabodhau pratibādhitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā pratibādhitā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:3990: tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghe 'pi pratibādhite evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:3992: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ko 'tra bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yatsa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:3993: bhagavānāha - mārādhiṣṭhito vā subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:3994: duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena vā karmaṇā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nāsya śraddhā,
K05bsu049_u:3996: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ pāpābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyate /
K05bsu049_u:3997: punaraparaṃ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pāpamitrahastagato vā bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:4000: ātmotkarṣī pareṣāṃ paṃsako doṣāntaraprekṣī vā bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:4001: ebhirapi subhūte caturbhirākāraiḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:4002: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate iti //
K05bsu049_u:4006: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - duradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena kuśalamūlavirahitena pāpamitrahastagatena
K05bsu049_u:4008: duradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena parīttakuśalamūlena durmedhasā anarthikena
K05bsu049_u:4011: subhūtirāha - kiyadgambhīrā bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duradhimocatayā?
K05bsu049_u:4039: paramaduradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena /
K05bsu049_u:4042: paramaduradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena /
K05bsu049_u:4048: iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiś ca phalaviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
K05bsu049_u:4049: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito rūpaviśuddhī rupaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4054: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiś ca phalaviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
K05bsu049_u:4055: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito vijñānaviśuddhirvijñānaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4056: punaraparaṃ subhūte yā rūpaviśuddhiḥ sā sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4058: iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
K05bsu049_u:4065: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
K05bsu049_u:4068: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:4084: āha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:4086: āha - kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte?
K05bsu049_u:4087: bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
K05bsu049_u:4091: vijñānaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
K05bsu049_u:4094: āha - prajñāpāramitā bhagavan sarvajñatāyā nāpakāraṃ karoti,
K05bsu049_u:4097: āha - prajñāpāramitā bhagavan na kaṃciddharmaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K05bsu049_u:4100: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ātmaviśuddhito bhagavan rūpaviśuddhiḥ?
K05bsu049_u:4115: āha - ya evamasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhagavan avabodhaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4118: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - sā khalu punariyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nāpare tīre,
K05bsu049_u:4122: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evam api bhagavan saṃjñāsyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo riñciṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām /
K05bsu049_u:4127: nāmato 'pi hi subhūto saṅgo nimittato 'pi saṅgaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4128: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā svākhyātā sunirdiṣṭā supariniṣṭhitā,
K05bsu049_u:4129: yatra hi nāma bhagavatā ime 'pi saṅgā ākhyātāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4130: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katame te āyuṣman subhūte saṅgāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:4134: atīteṣu dharmeṣvatītā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4135: anāgateṣu dharmeṣvanāgatā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4136: pratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu pratyutpannā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4137: iyantaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasūyate bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prathamena cittotpādeneti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:4138: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamena ārya subhūte paryāyeṇa saṅgaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:4139: subhūtirāha - sacetkauśika tadbodhicittaṃ saṃjānīte - idaṃ tatprathamaṃ bodhicittamiti,
K05bsu049_u:4141: na ca cittaprakṛtiḥ śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā mahāyānasaṃprasthitena /
K05bsu049_u:4142: tasmāttarhi kauśika paraṃ saṃdarśayatā samādāpayatā samuttejayatā saṃpraharṣayatā
K05bsu049_u:4143: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhūtānugamena saṃdarśayitavyaṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ samuttejayitavyaṃ
K05bsu049_u:4146: buddhānujñātayā ca samādāpanayā paraṃ samādāpayati sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā /
K05bsu049_u:4148: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
K05bsu049_u:4150: tena hi subhūte anyān api sūkṣmatarān saṅgānākhyāsyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:4152: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
K05bsu049_u:4155: bhagavānetadavocat - iha subhūte śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nimittato manasi karoti /
K05bsu049_u:4160: iti hi so 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ye anāsravā dharmāstānanumode
K05bsu049_u:4161: ityanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti pariṇāmayati /
K05bsu049_u:4162: yā khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
K05bsu049_u:4163: na sā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
K05bsu049_u:4167: na sā śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ na nimittīkartuṃ nārambaṇīkartum /
K05bsu049_u:4181: tathā hi subhūte akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4182: subhūtirāha - tasmāttarhi bhagavan sarvadharmā anabhisaṃbuddhāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena?
K05bsu049_u:4183: bhagavānāha - tathāhi subhūte prakṛtyaiva na te dharmāḥ kiṃcit /
K05bsu049_u:4196: evametāḥ subhūte sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyo vivarjitā bhavanti //
K05bsu049_u:4200: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate /
K05bsu049_u:4202: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na cittena jñātavyā na cittagamanīyā /
K05bsu049_u:4205: āha - tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kathaṃ caritavyam?
K05bsu049_u:4206: bhagavānāha - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna rūpe carati,
K05bsu049_u:4208: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
K05bsu049_u:4232: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadevaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sasaṅgatā ca asaṅgatā ca khyātāḥ
K05bsu049_u:4233: bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti subhūte na carati,
K05bsu049_u:4240: evaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati,
K05bsu049_u:4251: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sasaṅgāsaṅgā iti na carati,
K05bsu049_u:4263: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe saṅgaṃ janayati,
K05bsu049_u:4264: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
K05bsu049_u:4271: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṅgaṃ janayati,
K05bsu049_u:4278: na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve saṅgaṃ janayati,
K05bsu049_u:4283: asaktā abaddhā amuktā asamatikrāntā hi subhūte sarvajñatā /
K05bsu049_u:4284: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvasaṅgasamatikramāya bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam //
K05bsu049_u:4291: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
K05bsu049_u:4293: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhannākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta,
K05bsu049_u:4296: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣo bhāṣyamāṇe 'pi varṇe nānunīyate na saṃkliśyate,
K05bsu049_u:4302: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na saṃsīdati notplavate /
K05bsu049_u:4309: ākāśena sārdhaṃ sa bhagavan saṃnaddhukāmo yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ badhnāti /
K05bsu049_u:4311: śūro bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhukāmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ
K05bsu049_u:4314: mahāvīryapāramitāsaṃnāhaprāptaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate
K05bsu049_u:4315: atha khalvanyatamo bhikṣuryena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai /
K05bsu049_u:4316: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati,
K05bsu049_u:4318: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya ārya subhūte atra prajñāpāramitāyāmeva yogamāpatsyate,
K05bsu049_u:4324: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - ājñāpayatu bhagavān /
K05bsu049_u:4325: tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karomi ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayati /
K05bsu049_u:4326: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyasi?
K05bsu049_u:4328: subhūtirāha - evaṃ kauśika sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyati,
K05bsu049_u:4331: lapsyante 'sya avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo manuṣyāś ca amanuṣyāś ca avatāram /
K05bsu049_u:4332: api ca kauśika ākāśasya sa rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,
K05bsu049_u:4333: yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4334: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika pratibalastvaṃ pratiśrutkāyā rakṣāvaraṇagupti saṃvidhātum?
K05bsu049_u:4336: subhūtirāha - evameva kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran viharan pratiśrutkopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti parijānāti /
K05bsu049_u:4340: te ca dharmā na vidyante na saṃdṛśyante na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante iti viharati /
K05bsu049_u:4343: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro mahārājānaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4348: (Vaidya 99) upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'tiṣṭhan /
K05bsu049_u:4352: sahāpatiś ca mahābrahmā buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhasahasraṃ samānvāharanti sma /
K05bsu049_u:4353: ebhireva nāmabhirebhireva padairebhirevākṣaraiḥ subhūtināmadheyaireva bhikṣubhiriyameva prajñāpāramitopadiṣṭā,
K05bsu049_u:4355: tatrāpi śakrā eva devendrāḥ paripṛcchanti sma,
K05bsu049_u:4356: paripraśnayanti sma - asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe iyameva prajñāpāramitā bhāṣitā /
K05bsu049_u:4357: maitreyo 'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe enāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate iti //
K05bsu049_u:4361: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - prajñāpāramiteti bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etat /
K05bsu049_u:4369: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
K05bsu049_u:4370: ebhireva nāmabhiḥ ebhireva padaiḥ ebhirevākṣaraiḥ asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate?
K05bsu049_u:4371: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tathā hi subhūte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ nityaṃ nānityaṃ na rūpaṃ baddhaṃ na muktam,
K05bsu049_u:4373: evaṃ nā vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
K05bsu049_u:4377: anena subhūte kāraṇena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
K05bsu049_u:4378: ebhireva nāmabhirebhireva padavyañjanairasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate //
K05bsu049_u:4379: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - pariśuddhā bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā?
K05bsu049_u:4392: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - sulabdhā bata lābhāsteṣāṃ bhagavan kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca,
K05bsu049_u:4394: prāgeva ya udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
K05bsu049_u:4396: na śrotrarogo na ghrāṇarogo na jihvārogo na kāyarogo bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:4399: bahūni caiṣāṃ devatāsahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:4400: aṣṭamīṃ caturdaśīṃ pañcadaśīṃ ca sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yatra yatra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
K05bsu049_u:4402: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:4403: bahūni subhūte tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā devatāsahasrāṇi (Vaidya 101)
K05bsu049_u:4405: bahūni ca devatāsahasrāṇi tatrāgamiṣyanti sarvāṇi dharmaśravaṇārthikāni /
K05bsu049_u:4406: tāni ca rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti tasya dharmabhāṇakasya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇasya /
K05bsu049_u:4408: sadevamānuṣāsurasya hi subhūte lokasya prajñāpāramitā anuttaraṃ ratnam /
K05bsu049_u:4409: ato 'pi subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:4410: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bahavo 'ntarāyā bhaviṣyanti asyā gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā
K05bsu049_u:4411: likhyamānāyā udgṛhyamāṇāyā dhāryamāṇāyā vācyamānāyāḥ paryavāpyamānāyāḥ pravartyamānāyā
K05bsu049_u:4414: tathā hi subhūte bahupratyarthikāni mahāratnāni bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:4416: anuttaraṃ cedaṃ subhūte mahāratnaṃ lokasya yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:4423: tathā hi subhūte sarve te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /
K05bsu049_u:4426: tathā hi subhūte rūpanirupalepatayā anupalipteyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:4429: sacedevam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte,
K05bsu049_u:4431: sā khalu punariyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasyāveśikā vā niveśikā vā saṃdarśikā vā nidarśikā vā āvāhikā vā nirvāhikā vā //
K05bsu049_u:4432: atha khalu saṃbahulāni devaputrasahasrāṇi antarīkṣe kilakilāprakṣveḍitena cailavikṣepānakārṣuḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4433: dvitīyaṃ batedaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ jambūdvīpe paśyāma iti cāvocan /
K05bsu049_u:4434: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - nedaṃ subhūte dvitīyaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ nāpi kasyaciddharmasya pravartanaṃ vā nivartanaṃ vā /
K05bsu049_u:4436: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavaṃstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
K05bsu049_u:4451: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:4452: na hi subhūte śūnyatā pravartate vā nivartate vā /
K05bsu049_u:4453: nāpi subhūte ānimittaṃ pravartate vā nivartate vā /
K05bsu049_u:4454: nāpi subhūte apraṇihitaṃ pravartate vā nivartate vā /
K05bsu049_u:4463: nāpyanayā dharmadeśanayā kaścitparinirvṛto nāpi parinirvāsyati nāpi parinirvāti /
K05bsu049_u:4465: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - asatpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan ākāśasattāmupādāya /
K05bsu049_u:4523: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4526: kaḥ punarvādo ya enāmevaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
K05bsu049_u:4527: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
K05bsu049_u:4530: na te avaramātrakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:4532: paripṛṣṭāḥ paripraśnīkṛtāśca te buddhā bhagavanto bhaviṣyanti kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiścaināmeva prajñāpāramitām /
K05bsu049_u:4535: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
K05bsu049_u:4540: ya etasyāmeva gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ nāvaleṣyante na saṃleṣyante,
K05bsu049_u:4545: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ caitasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
K05bsu049_u:4546: bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan ihaivaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4547: deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā abhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya
K05bsu049_u:4548: prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
K05bsu049_u:4556: na hi bhagavan parīttakuśalamūlenāparipṛcchakajātīyena aśrutvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ pūrvamacaritavatā ihaiveyamevaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā adhimoktuṃ śakyā /
K05bsu049_u:4558: pūrvāntato'pi bhagavaṃstaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā /
K05bsu049_u:4561: na hi bhagavan acaritavadbhiḥ pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śakyā adhimoktum /
K05bsu049_u:4562: ye'pi ca pratikṣepsyanti enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇām,
K05bsu049_u:4563: te'pyevaṃ veditavyāḥ - pūrvāntato'pyebhiriyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā /
K05bsu049_u:4564: tathā hyeṣāmasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāsti śraddhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4565: nāsti kṣāntirnāsti rucirnāsti cchando nāsti vīryaṃ (Vaidya 105)
K05bsu049_u:4567: na caibhiḥ pūrvaṃ buddhā bhagavanto buddhaśrāvakā vā paripṛṣṭāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4569: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - gambhīrā ārya śāriputra prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:4570: kimatrāścaryaṃ syādyadasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pūrvamacaritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nādhimucyeta?
K05bsu049_u:4571: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai /
K05bsu049_u:4575: sarvajñajñānasya sa kauśika namaskāraṃ karoti yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyai namaskāraṃ karoti /
K05bsu049_u:4577: atonirjātā hi kauśika buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā /
K05bsu049_u:4583: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito
K05bsu049_u:4585: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kauśika /
K05bsu049_u:4586: sādhu khalu punastvaṃ kauśika yastvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamenamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase /
K05bsu049_u:4588: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
K05bsu049_u:4590: yataḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
K05bsu049_u:4596: yataḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vijñāne na tiṣṭhati,
K05bsu049_u:4608: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:4614: yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati,
K05bsu049_u:4618: yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati,
K05bsu049_u:4621: yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:4625: yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:4627: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā avinivartanīyasya vyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:4630: na vicikitsiṣyati na dhaṃdhāyiṣyati na vivadiṣyati //
K05bsu049_u:4631: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sacetpunarārya śāriputra avyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purata iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyeta,
K05bsu049_u:4633: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - dūrataḥ sa kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato veditavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4634: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paripakvakuśalamūlaḥ sa kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4635: yo'vyākṛta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
K05bsu049_u:4636: śrutvā ca notrasiṣyati na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsamāpatsyate /
K05bsu049_u:4637: na cedānīmasau cireṇa vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4639: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo naikaṃ vā dvau vā trīn vā tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānatikramiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:4647: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - dūrataḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:4649: paripakvakuśalamūlo hi bhagavan sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4650: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
K05bsu049_u:4651: kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati
K05bsu049_u:4652: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evametacchāriputra, evametat /
K05bsu049_u:4653: dūrataḥ sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato veditavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4655: paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:4656: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
K05bsu049_u:4657: kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati
K05bsu049_u:4658: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - pratibhāti me bhagavan,
K05bsu049_u:4660: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan yo'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svapnāntaragato'pi bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdet,
K05bsu049_u:4664: evameva bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
K05bsu049_u:4665: kaḥ punarvādaḥ śrutvā codgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayituṃ deśayituṃ upadeṣṭuṃ uddeṣṭuṃ svādhyāpanāya /
K05bsu049_u:4668: vyākariṣyantyenaṃ buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāyeti /
K05bsu049_u:4669: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4671: kaḥ punarvādo'tra bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati
K05bsu049_u:4672: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
K05bsu049_u:4674: bhūyastvena hi bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaiḥ sattvāḥ karmopacayairavihitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4675: teṣāṃ bhūyastvena asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cittāni pratikūlāni bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:4677: na hyanupacitakuśalamūlāḥ sattvā asyāṃ bhūyastvena bhūtakoṭyāṃ praskandanti prasīdanti /
K05bsu049_u:4678: upacitakuśalamūlāḥ khalu punaste bhagavan sūpacitakuśalamūlāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca veditavyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4680: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan puruṣo yojanaśatikādaṭavīkāntārād dviyojanaśatikādvā triyojanaśatikādvā
K05bsu049_u:4682: sa niṣkramya paśyetpūrvanimittāni gopālakān vā paśupālakān vā sīmā vā ārāmasaṃpado vā vanasaṃpado vā,
K05bsu049_u:4684: yairnimittairgrāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamo va sūcyeta /
K05bsu049_u:4685: tasya tāni pūrvanimittāni dṛṣṭaivaṃ bhavati - yathemāni pūrvanimittāni dṛśyante,
K05bsu049_u:4686: tathā āsanno me grāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamo vā iti /
K05bsu049_u:4689: evameva bhagavan yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upavartate,
K05bsu049_u:4692: nāpi tenotrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na bhetavyaṃ śrāvakabhūmervā pratyekabuddhabhūmervā /
K05bsu049_u:4694: tathā hi asyemāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante yadutemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
K05bsu049_u:4698: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan iha kaścideva puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:4700: yathā yathā ca sa gacchenmahāsamudraṃ darśanāya,
K05bsu049_u:4701: tathā tathā sacetpaśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā (Vaidya 108)
K05bsu049_u:4703: tenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ dūre tāvadito mahāsamudra iti /
K05bsu049_u:4704: sacenna bhūyaḥ paśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā,
K05bsu049_u:4705: tenaivaṃ veditavyam - abhyāsanna ito mahāsamudra iti /
K05bsu049_u:4708: na mahāsamudrasyābhyantare kaścitstambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā parvatanimittaṃ veti /
K05bsu049_u:4709: kiṃcāpi sa na mahāsamudraṃ sākṣātpaśyati cakṣuṣā,
K05bsu049_u:4710: atha ca punaḥ sa niṣṭhāṃ gacchati - abhyāsanno'smi mahāsamudrasya,
K05bsu049_u:4712: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvatā veditavyam - kiṃcāpyahaṃ taistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairna saṃmukhaṃ vyākṛtaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:4715: tathā hyenāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāyeti /
K05bsu049_u:4716: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan vasante pratyupasthite śīrṇaparṇapalāśeṣu nānāvṛkṣeṣu nānāpallavāḥ prādurbhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:4717: pallaveṣu prādurbhūteṣvāttamanaskā bhavanti jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ tāni pūrvanimittāni vaneṣu dṛṣṭvā nacirādvanapuṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca prādurbhaviṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:4719: tathā hi imāni pūrvanimittāni stambeṣu dṛśyanta iti /
K05bsu049_u:4720: evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo labhate imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
K05bsu049_u:4722: tadā paripakvakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ - tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlenopanāmiteyaṃ tasmai gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:4724: tāḥ pramuditā bhavanti prītisaumanasyajātāḥ - paurvakāṇāmapi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimānyeva pūrvanimittānyabhūvannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervyākaraṇāya
K05bsu049_u:4725: nacireṇa batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
K05bsu049_u:4726: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan strī gurviṇī gurugarbhā /
K05bsu049_u:4737: paurvakeṇāyoniśomanasikāreṇāsevitena niṣevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāyena vedanāṃ pratyanubhavāmīti,
K05bsu049_u:4738: tadā veditavyamidaṃ bhagavan - yathāsyāḥ pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante,
K05bsu049_u:4739: tathā nacireṇa bateyaṃ strī prasoṣyate iti /
K05bsu049_u:4740: evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upavartate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
K05bsu049_u:4743: tadā veditavyamidaṃ bhagavan - nacireṇa batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //
K05bsu049_u:4744: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu śāriputra /
K05bsu049_u:4746: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsuparigṛhītāśca suparīttāśca suparīnditāśca ime bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena /
K05bsu049_u:4747: bhagavānāha - tathā hi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bahujanahitāya (Vaidya 109)
K05bsu049_u:4748: pratipannā bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
K05bsu049_u:4751: subhūtirāha - iha bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati?
K05bsu049_u:4752: bhagavānāha - yadi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasya vṛddhiṃ samanupaśyati,
K05bsu049_u:4754: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
K05bsu049_u:4759: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
K05bsu049_u:4776: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ko'tra bhagavan adhimokṣayiṣyati evaṃgambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām?
K05bsu049_u:4777: bhagavānāha - yaḥ śāriputra caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyām,
K05bsu049_u:4779: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - kathaṃ bhagavan caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:4781: bhagavānāha - iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balāni na kalpayati,
K05bsu049_u:4790: evaṃ caritāvī śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kvaciccarati,
K05bsu049_u:4794: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:4797: āścaryaṃ bhagavan syādyadenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4798: pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4801: bahavaḥ subhūte antarāyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4802: pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4806: tathā hi subhūte imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4807: pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4809: tatra śīghraṃ likhatā sacenmāsena vā māsadvayena vā māsatrayeṇa vā likhyeta,
K05bsu049_u:4812: tathāpi likhitavyaiva khalu punaḥ subhūte bhavati tena kulaputreṇa kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:4814: evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati yanmahāratnānāṃ bahavo'ntarāyā utpadyante //
K05bsu049_u:4815: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - iha bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4817: svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyān bahuprakāramautsukyamāpatsyate,
K05bsu049_u:4819: bhagavānāha - kiṃcāpi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānudyogamāpatsyate antarāyakarmaṇaḥ asyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4822: atha ca punarna prasahiṣyate'cchidrasamādānasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyaṃ kartum //
K05bsu049_u:4823: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavan imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4824: dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4825: likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate antarāyakaraṇāya,
K05bsu049_u:4826: tadā kathametarhi bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:4829: kasya cānubhāvena bhagavaṃste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:4832: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - buddhānāṃ śāriputra bhagavatāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4833: tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanubhāvena te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4841: ye te'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:4842: te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhariṣyanti parigrahīṣyanti bhāṣyamāṇāmudgṛhyamāṇāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4846: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti ca,
K05bsu049_u:4850: tāṃśca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāhariṣyanti parigrahīṣyanti ca /
K05bsu049_u:4851: na hi śāriputra buddhasamanvāhṛtānāṃ buddhaparigṛhītānāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca śakyamantarāyaṃ kartum //
K05bsu049_u:4852: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ye'pi te bhagavan bodhisattvā
K05bsu049_u:4853: mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:4854: paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
K05bsu049_u:4858: sarve te bhagavan buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhaparigraheṇa ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4859: śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:4866: sarve te śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhaparigraheṇa
K05bsu049_u:4867: ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:4868: paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
K05bsu049_u:4876: ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:4882: śrutvo udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya
K05bsu049_u:4886: ye'pi śāriputra enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:4890: te na tathatvāya śikṣamāṇā na tathatvāya pratipadyamānā na tathatvāya yogamāpadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ sthāsyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05bsu049_u:4895: teṣāmapi śāriputra mahārthiko mahānuśaṃso mahāphalo mahāvipākaśca sa pariśramaḥ parispandaśca bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:4897: tathā hi prajñāpāramitā paramārthopasaṃhitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaprativedhāya pratyupasthitā sarvasattvānām /
K05bsu049_u:4898: (Vaidya 112) ime khalu punaḥ śāriputra ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrāntāstathāgatasyātyayena dakṣiṇāpathe pracariṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:4901: navamaṇḍaprāpte dharmavinaye saddharmasyāntardhānakālasamaye samanvāhṛtāste śāriputra tathāgatena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca /
K05bsu049_u:4902: tasmin kāle ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:4909: śāriputra āha - iyamapi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā evaṃgambhīrā paścime kāle paścime samaye vaistārikī bhaviṣyatyuttarasyāṃ diśi uttare digbhāge?
K05bsu049_u:4910: bhagavānāha - ye tatra śāriputra uttarasyāṃ diśyuttare digbhāge imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpatsyante,
K05bsu049_u:4913: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:4917: śāriputra āha - kiyantaste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti uttarasyāṃ diśi uttare digbhāge,
K05bsu049_u:4919: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
K05bsu049_u:4923: bhagavānāha - bahavaste śāriputra subahavaḥ uttarāpathe uttarasyāṃ diśyuttare digbhāge bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:4926: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
K05bsu049_u:4930: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāvaleṣyante na saṃleṣyante,
K05bsu049_u:4938: pūjitāśca taiḥ paurvakāstathāgatā arhanta samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca bodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:4944: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca mayaiva sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiva kathā kṛtā /
K05bsu049_u:4945: teṣāṃ jātivyativṛttānāmapi eta eva sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ samudācārā bhaviṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:4949: teṣu ca susthitāḥ samāhitāśca bhaviṣyanti asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām /
K05bsu049_u:4955: te ca kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca śrutvā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudāraṃ prītiprāmodyaprasādaṃ pratilapsyante /
K05bsu049_u:4956: bahujanasya ca te kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti yadutānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K05bsu049_u:4958: evaṃ hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca mamāntike saṃmukhaṃ vāgbhāṣitā - bahūni
K05bsu049_u:4959: prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni
K05bsu049_u:4960: bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K05bsu049_u:4961: bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto vayamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ
K05bsu049_u:4966: anumoditaṃ hi śāriputra mayā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ
K05bsu049_u:4967: ca cittena cittaṃ vyavalokya yairiyaṃ vāgbhāṣitā - bodhāya caranto vayaṃ bahūni prāṇiśatāni
K05bsu049_u:4968: bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi
K05bsu049_u:4969: bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K05bsu049_u:4974: evaṃ ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca udārādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:4976: yatra saṃmukhībhūtāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:4977: tatra saṃmukhībhūtānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikātpunarevaināṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vistareṇa śroṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:4978: teṣvapi te buddhakṣetreṣu bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi
K05bsu049_u:4979: bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni
K05bsu049_u:4984: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadidaṃ tathāgatenārhatā
K05bsu049_u:4985: samyaksaṃbuddhena atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu nāsti kiṃcidadṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ
K05bsu049_u:4987: na sa kaściddharmo yo na jñāto na sa kāciccaryā sattvānāṃ yā na vijñātā,
K05bsu049_u:4988: yatra hi nāma anāgatānāmapi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātā bodhicchandikānāmadhyāśayasaṃpannānāmārabdhavīryāṇām /
K05bsu049_u:4989: (Vaidya 114) ye tasmin kāle imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:4992: ye ca tasmin kāle āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya udyogamāpadya anveṣiṣyante paryeṣiṣyante,
K05bsu049_u:4994: teṣāṃ ca kulaputrānāṃ kṛladuhitṝṇāṃ ca anveṣamāṇānāṃ paryeṣamāṇānāṃ kecidgaveṣamāṇā bodhisattvā lapsyante,
K05bsu049_u:4999: nāsti kiṃcittathāgatasya atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣvadṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā avijñātaṃ vā /
K05bsu049_u:5000: tasmin khalu punaḥ śāriputra kāle tasmin samaye kecidbodhisattvā mārgayamāṇā paryeṣamāṇā gaveṣamāṇā api lapsyante imāṃ prajñāpāramitām /
K05bsu049_u:5003: tathā hi tairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato'pi anikṣiptadhurairmārgitā ca paryanviṣṭā ca /
K05bsu049_u:5004: te tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlacchandena enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmamārgayanto'pi aparyeṣamāṇā api agaveṣayanto'pi lapsyante /
K05bsu049_u:5005: yānyapi ca tato'nyānyapi sūtrāṇi enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmabhivadanti,
K05bsu049_u:5006: tāni caiṣāṃ svayamevopagamiṣyanti upapatsyante upanaṃsyante ca /
K05bsu049_u:5008: evametacchāriputra bhavati - ya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nikṣiptadhuro mārgayati ca paryeṣate ca,
K05bsu049_u:5009: sa jātivyativṛtto'pi janmāntaravyativṛtto'pi enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate /
K05bsu049_u:5010: tato'nyāni ca sūtrāṇi prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni tasya svayamevopagamiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:5012: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ime eva kevalaṃ bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrāntā upapatsyante upanaṃsyante, nānye?
K05bsu049_u:5013: bhagavānāha - ye cānye'pi śāriputra gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:5014: te'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca svayamevopapatsyante svayamevopanaṃsyante ca /
K05bsu049_u:5016: evaṃ hyetacchāriputra bhavati - ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K05bsu049_u:5017: prasthāpayiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti prabhāvayiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:5021: teṣāṃ śāriputra jātivyativṛttānāmapi ime gambhīrā gambhīrā anupalambhapratisaṃyuktāḥ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāśca sūtrāntāḥ
K05bsu049_u:5026: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - guṇā ime bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca bhagavatā parikīrtitāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5028: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - bahūni subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarmāṇyantarāyakarāṇyutpasyante /
K05bsu049_u:5030: bhagavānāha - teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ cireṇa pratibhānamutpatsyate /
K05bsu049_u:5032: tad api ca pratibhānaṃ jāyamānameva vikṣepsyate /
K05bsu049_u:5050: na vayamatra gādhaṃ nāsvādaṃ labhāmahe ityutthāyāsanātprakramiṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:5054: na no 'tra grāmasya vā nagarasya vā nigamasya vā nāmadheyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ yatra no janma,
K05bsu049_u:5055: na no 'tra nāma gotraṃ vā gṛhītam,
K05bsu049_u:5061: tairyāvadbhiścittotpādaistathā tathā tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsārasya punaḥ punaḥ parigrahīṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:5063: tatkasmāt? imāṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāmaśṛṇvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu na nirjāyante /
K05bsu049_u:5064: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:5065: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāṃ
K05bsu049_u:5066: vivarjya utsṛjya ye te sūtrāntā naiva sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāstān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante /
K05bsu049_u:5067: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:5068: yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte na laukikalokottareṣu śikṣitukāmā na laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu niryātukāmā iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣante /
K05bsu049_u:5070: evaṃ te parīttabuddhayo laukikalokottarāṇāṃ yathābhūtaparijñāyā mūlaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya praśākhāmadhyālambitavyāṃ maṃsyante /
K05bsu049_u:5071: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kukkuraḥ svāmino 'ntikātpiṇḍāṃśchorayitvā karmakarasyāntikātkavalaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta,
K05bsu049_u:5074: ye imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasya mūlaṃ chorayitvā śākhāpatrapalālabhūte śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne (Vaidya 116)
K05bsu049_u:5076: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:5078: na hi te 'lpabuddhayo jñāsyanti - prajñāpāramitā āhārikā sarvajñajñānasyeti /
K05bsu049_u:5079: te prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya chorayitvā tato 'nye sūtrāntā ye śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti,
K05bsu049_u:5084: na hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yathā śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante /
K05bsu049_u:5085: kathaṃ ca subhūte śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante?
K05bsu049_u:5086: teṣāṃ subhūte evaṃ bhavati - ekamātmānaṃ damayiṣyāmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5090: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:5091: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam - ātmānaṃ ca tathatāyāṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi sarvalokānugrahāya,
K05bsu049_u:5096: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo hastinamapaśyan hastino varṇasaṃsthāne paryeṣeta /
K05bsu049_u:5097: so 'ndhakāre hastinaṃ labdhvā yena prakāśaṃ tenopanidhyāyeta /
K05bsu049_u:5100: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ purūṣo bhavet?
K05bsu049_u:5102: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5103: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā aparipṛcchantastāṃ chorayitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti,
K05bsu049_u:5106: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:5107: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ratnārthikaḥ puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā nāvagāheta,
K05bsu049_u:5111: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:5113: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5114: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvāpyanavagāhamānā avijānantastakṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:5122: dṛṣṭa eva dharme anupādāya āsravebhyaścittaṃ vimocya parinirvāpayāmiti /
K05bsu049_u:5126: mahāyānasaṃprasthitā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhā bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:5130: lokapariṇāyakā hi bhavanti te satpuruṣā lokārthakarāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5132: ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte aparipakvakuśalamūlāḥ parīttakubuddhikā mṛdukādhyāśayā bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5133: te ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntānajānānā anavabuddhyamānā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ chorayitvā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmimabhivandanti,
K05bsu049_u:5135: idam api subhūte mārakarma veditavyaṃ teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām
K05bsu049_u:5136: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte palagaṇḍo vā palagaṇḍāntevāsī vā vaijayantasya prāsādasya
K05bsu049_u:5141: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte vaijayantaprāsādapramāṇaṃ prāsādaṃ kartukāmena nirmātukāmena sūryācandramasorvimānātpramāṇaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:5143: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5144: ye prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya
K05bsu049_u:5146: ye te sūtrāntā evamabhivadanti - ekamātmānaṃ damayiṣyāmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5152: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te paṇḍitajātīyāḥ bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:5154: bhagavānāha - idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:5155: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rājānaṃ ca cakravartinaṃ bhraṣṭukāmo bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:5157: dṛṣṭvā ca īdṛśo rājā cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena tejasā ṛddhyā ceti nimittaṃ gṛhītvā koṭṭarājaṃ paśyet /
K05bsu049_u:5158: sa tasya koṭṭarājasya varṇaṃ saṃsthānaṃ teja ṛddhiṃ ca nimittaṃ ca gṛhītvā apratibalo
K05bsu049_u:5159: viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ prati evaṃ vadet - īdṛśa eva sa rājā cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena
K05bsu049_u:5161: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyo yaścakravartinaṃ koṭṭarājena samīkartavyaṃ manyeta?
K05bsu049_u:5163: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5164: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya
K05bsu049_u:5166: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:5167: na khalu punarahaṃ subhūte ebhirevaṃrūpaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntairbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ vadāmi /
K05bsu049_u:5168: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yattathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmupāyakauśalyamākhyātam,
K05bsu049_u:5169: tatrāśikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na niryāsyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K05bsu049_u:5172: tasmāttarhi subhūte tathāgata enāmanuśaṃsāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ paśyan anekaparyāyeṇa
K05bsu049_u:5173: bodhisattvān mahāsattvānasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati
K05bsu049_u:5174: saṃpraharṣayati saṃniveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati - evaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā
K05bsu049_u:5176: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvāḥ pratibhānti,
K05bsu049_u:5177: ye avinivartanīyayānaṃ mahāyānamavāpya samāsādya punareva tadvivarjya vivartya hīnayānaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante?
K05bsu049_u:5179: bhagavānāha - tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bubhukṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ labdhvā hitavipākaṃ sukhavipākaṃ yāvadāyuḥparyantaṃ kṣutpipāsānivartakam,
K05bsu049_u:5181: ṣaṣṭikodanaṃ labdhvā śatarasaṃ bhojanamutsṛjya vivarjya taṃ ṣaṣṭikodanaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta /
K05bsu049_u:5182: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet?
K05bsu049_u:5184: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke bodhisattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5185: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñciṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:5189: chorayitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkṛtya tataḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante /
K05bsu049_u:5192: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:5194: bhagavānāha - idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:5195: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo 'nardhyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ labdhvā alpārdhyeṇa alpasāreṇa maṇiratnena sārdhaṃ samīkartavyaṃ manyeta /
K05bsu049_u:5196: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:5198: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5199: ya idaṃ gambhīraṃ prabhāsvaraṃ prajñāpāramitāratnaṃ labdhvā śrutvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānena samīkartavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K05bsu049_u:5200: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau ca sarvajñatāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
K05bsu049_u:5201: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:5203: bhagavānāha - idam api subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:5204: punaraparaṃ subhūte asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāsyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:5205: vācyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāmantaśo likhyamānāyām api bahūni pratibhānānyutpatsyante,
K05bsu049_u:5207: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:5208: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - śakyā punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitā likhitum?
K05bsu049_u:5210: ye kecitsubhūte prajñāpāramitāṃ lipyakṣarairlikhitvā prajñāpāramitā likhiteti maṃsyante,
K05bsu049_u:5213: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam //

K05bsu049_u:5240: ityetāṃścānyāṃś ca subhūte manasikārān māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃhariṣyati asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:5246: punaraparaṃ subhūte utpatsyante rājamanasikārāḥ kumāramanasikārāhastimanasikārā aśvamanasikārā rathamanasikārā gulmadarśanamanasikārāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5247: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:5248: punaraparaṃ subhūte utpatsyante agnimanasikārā icchāmanasikārā dhanadhānyasamṛddhimanasikārāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5249: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:5256: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ
K05bsu049_u:5257: deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāmantaśo likhatāṃ ye te gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ
K05bsu049_u:5259: tān māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣaṇopasaṃkramya upasaṃhariṣyati - iha śikṣasva,

K05bsu049_u:5266: kiṃ cāpi subhūte teṣu sūtrānteṣu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāṣitāni, (Vaidya 120)

K05bsu049_u:5276: dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca kilāsī vā bahukṛtyo vā bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:5277: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam /

K05bsu049_u:5279: gatimāṃś ca matimāṃś ca smṛtimāṃś ca bhaviṣyati /

K05bsu049_u:5285: dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca deśāntaraṃ prasthito bhaviṣyati noddhaṭṭitajño vā na vā vipañcitajño 'nabhijño vā bhaviṣyati /

K05bsu049_u:5290: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam /

K05bsu049_u:5325: punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ vā kaścideva tatrāgatya devānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate - evaṃsukhitā
K05bsu049_u:5330: tad api ca sarvaṃ prajñatā vimṛśya sarvaiva duḥkhopapattiriti /
K05bsu049_u:5331: uktaṃ hīdaṃ bhagavatā - acchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakamapyahaṃ bhikṣavo bhavābhinirvṛttiṃ na varṇayāmi /
K05bsu049_u:5332: sarvaṃ hi saṃskṛtamanityaṃ sarvaṃ bhayāvagataṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5333: tadevaṃ sarvamaśāśvatamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharmakaṃ viditvā paṇḍitairihaiva srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptavyam,
K05bsu049_u:5336: mā no bhūyastābhiḥ saṃpattivipattibhirduḥkhabhūyiṣṭhābhiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhūditi /
K05bsu049_u:5338: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:5339: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye 'pi te bhikṣavo dharmabhāṇakāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5342: te 'pi dharmabhāṇakā evaṃ vakṣyanti - ye māmanuvartsyanti,
K05bsu049_u:5346: evaṃ te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca arthikatayā chandikatayā dharmagauraveṇa taṃ dharmabhāṇakamanuvartsyanti,
K05bsu049_u:5351: yena yena durbhikṣaś ca ayogakṣemaś ca jīvitāntarāyaś ca bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:5352: te ca dhārmaśravaṇikāḥ parebhyaḥ śroṣyanti - asau pradeśo (Vaidya 122)
K05bsu049_u:5355: sa ca dharmabhāṇakastān kulaputrānevamabhivyāhariṣyati - amuṣmin kulaputrāḥ pradeśe durbhikṣabhayam /
K05bsu049_u:5356: kaccitkulaputrā yūyamāgamiṣyatha mā paścādvipratisāriṇo bhaviṣyatha durbhikṣabhayaṃ praviṣṭāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:5357: evaṃ te tena dharmabhāṇakena sūkṣmeṇopāyena pratikṣepsyate /
K05bsu049_u:5358: te ca nirviṇṇarūpā evaṃ jñāsyanti - pratyākhyānanimittānyetāni,
K05bsu049_u:5361: iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyām
K05bsu049_u:5362: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:5363: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako yena jantubhayaṃ yena vyālabhayaṃ yenāmanuṣyabhayaṃ tena saṃprasthito bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:5364: sa tena caran viharan yena vyālakāntāraṃ sarīsṛpakāntāraṃ corakāntāraṃ pānīyakāntāraṃ durbhikṣakāntāraṃ tena prakramiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:5365: sa tān dhārmaśravaṇikānevaṃ vakṣyati - yatkhalu kulaputrā jānīdhvaṃ yasmin pradeśe
K05bsu049_u:5366: jantubhayaṃ vyālabhayaṃ kravyādabhayaṃ sarīsṛpakāntāraṃ corakāntāraṃ pānīyakāntāraṃ
K05bsu049_u:5368: jānīdhvaṃ kulaputrāḥ - śakyatha yūyametāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavitum?
K05bsu049_u:5373: ayam api subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāmantarāya utpatsyate uddiśyamānāyāḥ svādhyāyyamānāyāḥ yāvallikhyamānāyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5374: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:5377: sa tayā abhīkṣṇāvalokanatayā bahukṛtyatayā tān dhārmaśravaṇikān pratyākhyāsyati - asti tāvanme kiṃcidavalokayitavyam,
K05bsu049_u:5379: iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyām /
K05bsu049_u:5380: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:5381: iti hi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyāṃstaistaiḥ prakāraistathā tathā ceṣṭiṣyate,
K05bsu049_u:5394: tāni sarvāṇi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarmāṇīti boddhavyāni,
K05bsu049_u:5396: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kimatra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yadiha māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ mahāntamudyogamāpatsyate?
K05bsu049_u:5399: na kaścidudgrahīṣyati na dhārayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyati na pravartayiṣyati na deśayiṣyati nopadekṣyati noddekṣyati na svādhyāsyati na lekhayiṣyati na likhiṣyati?
K05bsu049_u:5400: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā /
K05bsu049_u:5403: prahīṇakleśānāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate /
K05bsu049_u:5405: ataḥ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyāṃ mahatā saṃvegena mahāntamudyogamāpadyate /
K05bsu049_u:5407: yathā na kaścidimāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhedvā paryavāpnuyādveti //
K05bsu049_u:5408: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣepsyati /
K05bsu049_u:5409: evaṃ ca navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrā vivecayiṣyanti naiṣā prajñāpāramitā yāmāyuṣmantaḥ śṛṇvanti /
K05bsu049_u:5412: ityevaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān saṃśayaṃ prakṣepsyati /
K05bsu049_u:5413: evaṃ ca punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣipya navayānasaṃprasthitān
K05bsu049_u:5416: te saṃśayaprāptā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgrahīṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti na vācayiṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:5417: na paryavāpsyanti na pravartayiṣyanti na deśayiṣyanti nopadekṣyanti noddekṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:5418: na svādhyāsyanti na lekhayiṣyanti na likhiṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:5419: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:5420: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣūnnirmāya buddhaveṣeṇāgatya evaṃ mārakarmopasaṃhariṣyati - yo bodhisattvo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu carati,
K05bsu049_u:5424: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:5425: evaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānevamādikāni subahūni anyāny api mārakarmāṇyutpādayiṣyati asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyām /
K05bsu049_u:5438: evameva bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prāyeṇa bahavo 'ntarāyā utpatsyante /
K05bsu049_u:5448: na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ na paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ na deśayitavyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:5449: nopadeṣṭavyāṃ noddeṣṭavyāṃ na svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyām api maṃsyante //
K05bsu049_u:5450: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:5452: navayānasaṃprasthitāś ca te subhūte bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:5457: na ca teṣāmudārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ prakramiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:5459: na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ na paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ nopadeṣṭavyāṃ noddeṣṭavyāṃ na svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyām api maṃsyante //
K05bsu049_u:5462: atha ca subhūte ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītavyāṃ maṃsyante dhārayitavyāṃ vācayitavyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:5466: buddhaparigraheṇodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti lekhayiṣyantyantaśo likhiṣyantīti /
K05bsu049_u:5473: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - tadyathāpi nāma subhūte striyā bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5474: pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā /
K05bsu049_u:5475: sarve te māturglānāyā udyogamāpadyeran - kathamasmākaṃ māturjīvitāntarāyo na bhavediti,
K05bsu049_u:5481: na cāsyā asparśavihāraḥ amanaāpaḥ kāye utpadyeta /
K05bsu049_u:5484: duṣkarakārikaiṣā asmākaṃ jīvitasya dātrī lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrī /
K05bsu049_u:5485: iti te putrāstāṃ mātaraṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sudhṛtāṃ dhārayeyuḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5487: sukelāyitāṃ kelāyeyuḥ - mā khalvasyāḥ kācidduḥkhā vedanā duḥkho vā sparśa utpadyeta,
K05bsu049_u:5488: cakṣuṣo vā śrotrato vā ghrāṇato vā jihvāto vā kāyato vā manasto vā vātato vā pittato
K05bsu049_u:5489: vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā daṃśato vā maśakato vā sarīsṛpato vā manuṣyato vā amanuṣyato
K05bsu049_u:5490: vā āpātato vā utpātato vā aniṣṭanipātaḥ śarīre nipatet /
K05bsu049_u:5491: evaṃ te putrāstāṃ mātaraṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ samanvāhṛtya kelāyeyurmamāyeyurgopāyeyuḥ - eṣāsmākaṃ mātā janayitrī,
K05bsu049_u:5494: evameva subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharanti /
K05bsu049_u:5495: ye 'pi te likhanti udgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti paryavāpnuvanti pravartayanti deśayantyupadiśantyuddiśanti svādhyāyanti,
K05bsu049_u:5496: sarve te tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyānubhāvena adhiṣṭhānena samanvāhāreṇa /
K05bsu049_u:5497: ye 'pi te 'nyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya,
K05bsu049_u:5498: hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
K05bsu049_u:5503: kimityasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā likhyamānāyāḥ śikṣyamāṇāyā māraḥ pāyīyān mārakāyikā vā devatā antarāyaṃ na kuryuriti /
K05bsu049_u:5504: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kelāyanti mamāyanti gopāyanti /
K05bsu049_u:5506: eṣā hi mātā janayitrī tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
K05bsu049_u:5507: asyāḥ sarvajñatāyā darśayitrī lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrī /
K05bsu049_u:5508: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5509: prajñāpāramitā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya sarvajñajñānasya janayitrī darśayitrī,
K05bsu049_u:5511: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatā /
K05bsu049_u:5512: ye 'pi kecitsubhūte atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5513: te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5514: ye 'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ (Vaidya 126)
K05bsu049_u:5516: te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
K05bsu049_u:5517: ye 'pi te subhūte etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā
K05bsu049_u:5518: daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai
K05bsu049_u:5520: hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
K05bsu049_u:5522: te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5523: aham api subhūte etarhi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5524: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ janayitrī,
K05bsu049_u:5526: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrīti,
K05bsu049_u:5527: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī?
K05bsu049_u:5529: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - pañca subhūte skandhāḥ tathāgatena loka ityākhyātāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5531: yaduta rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam /
K05bsu049_u:5532: ime subhūte pañca skandhāstathāgatena loka ityākhyātāḥ //
K05bsu049_u:5533: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitayā pañca skandhā darśitāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:5535: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - na lujyante na pralujyante iti subhūte pañca skandhā loka iti tathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitayā darśitāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:5536: tatkasya hetoḥ na lujyante na pralujyante iti darśitāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:5539: na ca subhūte śūnyatā lujyate vā pralujyate vā /
K05bsu049_u:5540: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī /
K05bsu049_u:5541: na ca subhūte ānimittaṃ vā apraṇihitaṃ vā anabhisaṃskāro vā anutpādo vā abhāvo vā dharmadhāturvā lujyate vā pralujyate vā /
K05bsu049_u:5542: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhata samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī //
K05bsu049_u:5543: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5545: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:5547: sattvāsvabhāvatayā subhūte aprameyāḥ sattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K05bsu049_u:5548: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K05bsu049_u:5549: yāny api tāni subhūte aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ cittacaritāni,
K05bsu049_u:5550: tāny api subhūte tathāgataḥ sattvāsadbhāvatayaiva prajānāti /
K05bsu049_u:5551: evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitāmāgamya tathāgato 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni cittacaritāni ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
K05bsu049_u:5552: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī //
K05bsu049_u:5553: (Vaidya 127) punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni saṃkṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K05bsu049_u:5554: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni saṃkṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ
K05bsu049_u:5555: sa saṃkṣepaṃ kṣayataḥ kṣayaṃ ca akṣayato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K05bsu049_u:5556: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni saṃkṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //
K05bsu049_u:5557: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K05bsu049_u:5558: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ
K05bsu049_u:5560: alakṣaṇāni hi tāni cittāni akṣīṇānyavikṣīṇānyavikṣiptāni tāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
K05bsu049_u:5561: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti //
