K05bsu049_u:6001: evamaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamā iti subhūte samasaṃkhyāpramāṇoparamatvādaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāstathāgatadharmāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6002: ākāśasamāsaṃkhyeyāprameyatayā asamasamā asaṃkhyeyā aprameyā ete dharmāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6010: asyāṃ khalu punaracintyatāyāmatulyatāyāmaprameyatāyāmasaṃkhyeyatāyāmasamasamatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni
K05bsu049_u:6011: viṃśateś ca bhikṣuṇīśatānām anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni,
K05bsu049_u:6014: viṃśatyā ca bodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt /
K05bsu049_u:6015: te ca bhagavatā ihaiva bhadrakalpe vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K05bsu049_u:6016: ye 'pi te upāsakā upāsikāś ca yeṣāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham,
K05bsu049_u:6019: (Vaidya 140) atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:6021: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:6028: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya yāni tāni rājakṛtyāni,
K05bsu049_u:6033: evameva subhūte ye kecidbuddhadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā śrāvakadharmā vā,
K05bsu049_u:6036: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa mahākṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā rūpasyāparigrahāya anabhiniveśāya /
K05bsu049_u:6043: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan sarvajñatāyā aparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
K05bsu049_u:6044: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvamarhattvaṃ yatra parigrahaṃ vā abhiniveśaṃ vā kuryāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:6046: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaṃ parigṛhṇīyāmabhiniveśeyaṃ vā arhattvamiti /
K05bsu049_u:6048: aham api subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
K05bsu049_u:6049: so 'haṃ subhūte tathāgatatvamasamanupaśyan na parigṛhṇāmi nābhiniveśe /
K05bsu049_u:6052: mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ parīttakuśalamūlā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
K05bsu049_u:6053: api tu khalu punarbhagavan ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā hetusaṃpannāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā dīrgharātrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:6054: ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:6056: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
K05bsu049_u:6061: te sarve śraddhānusāribhūmau kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā careyuḥ yaśceha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmekadivasam api kṣāntiṃ rocayedgaveṣeta cintayettulayedupaparīkṣeta
K05bsu049_u:6064: rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayāmāsa - yadi devaputrāḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāt,
K05bsu049_u:6066: na tveva teṣāṃ śraddhānusāribhūmau kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā caratām /
K05bsu049_u:6067: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:6068: ityuktvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikād gamiṣyāma ityārocya prakrāntāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6075: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05bsu049_u:6076: sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimucyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
K05bsu049_u:6077: nāvatiṣṭhate na dhandhāyati na vicikitsati na kāṅkṣati,
K05bsu049_u:6080: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:6081: prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimokṣyate nāvaleṣyate na saṃleṣyate nāvasthāsyate na dhandhāyiṣyati
K05bsu049_u:6087: chandaṃ janayiṣyatyudgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayitum,
K05bsu049_u:6090: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte taruṇavatsā gaurnotsṛjati vatsam,
K05bsu049_u:6091: evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā tāvanna prahāsyati dharmabhāṇakaṃ yāvadasyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kāyagatā vā bhaviṣyati pustakagatā vā,
K05bsu049_u:6092: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyebhya eva cyuto manuṣyeṣvevopapannaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:6093: subhūtirāha - syādbhagavan etaireva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:6094: bhagavānāha - syātsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo 'nyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchya paripraśnīkṛtya tebhyaścyuta
K05bsu049_u:6096: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastuṣitebhyo devebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6098: yena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paryupāsitaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ paripṛcchitaḥ paripraśnīkṛtaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya,
K05bsu049_u:6100: yena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutā,
K05bsu049_u:6103: tasya punar api manuṣyeṣvevopapannasya asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam,
K05bsu049_u:6109: tathā hi asyāṃ asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam,
K05bsu049_u:6112: punaraparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato 'pi śrutā bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:6113: paryupāsitā paripṛṣṭā paripṛcchitā paripraśnīkṛtā ca bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:6114: ekaṃ vā dinaṃ dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā pañca vā dināni,
K05bsu049_u:6119: evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati - yena pūrvaṃ na saṃparipṛṣṭā bhavatīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
K05bsu049_u:6123: tasya kaṃcitkālaṃ chando 'nuvartate asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śravaṇāya,
K05bsu049_u:6129: navena yānenāgataḥ sa bodhisattvastāṃ śraddhāṃ taṃ prasādaṃ taṃ chandaṃ prahāsyati,
K05bsu049_u:6130: yadutaināṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nānugrahīṣyati nānuvartiṣyate nānuparivārayiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:6131: tasya dvayorbhūmyoranyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
K05bsu049_u:6132: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ te tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā na gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā,
K05bsu049_u:6134: veditavyam etat - aprāptā evaite pāramudake kālaṃ kariṣyantīti /
K05bsu049_u:6135: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā,
K05bsu049_u:6140: evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvaḥ śraddhāmātrakeṇa prasādamātrakeṇa premamātrakeṇa chandamātrakeṇa samanvāgataḥ sa ca prajñāpāramitāṃ nādhyālambate,
K05bsu049_u:6142: aprāpta eva sarvajñatāṃ śrāvakatve pratyekabuddhatve vā sthāsyatīti /
K05bsu049_u:6143: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasti śraddhā,
K05bsu049_u:6159: evaṃ teṣāṃ sā śraddhā sā kṣāntiḥ sā rūciḥ sa cchandaḥ tadvīryaṃ so 'pramādaḥ sādhimuktiḥ
K05bsu049_u:6160: so 'dhyāśayaḥ sa tyāgaḥ tadgauravaṃ sā prītiḥ tatprāmodyaṃ sa prasādaḥ tatprema sā
K05bsu049_u:6162: te ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prāpya sarvajñatāyāṃ sthāsyanti /
K05bsu049_u:6163: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī va puruṣo vā aparipakvena ghaṭenodakaṃ parivahet,
K05bsu049_u:6170: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti rūciḥ asti chandaḥ asti vīryam astyapramādaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6177: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca aparigṛhīto bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:6178: veditavyametatsubhūte ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyata iti /
K05bsu049_u:6179: kaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasyāntarā vyadhvani vyavasādaḥ - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā?
K05bsu049_u:6180: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā suparipakvena ghaṭena nadīto vā sarasto vā taḍāgato vā udapānādvā tato 'nyebhyo vā udakādhārebhya udakaṃ parivahet,
K05bsu049_u:6185: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6194: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:6195: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyate /
K05bsu049_u:6197: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvamanākoṭitāmaparikarmakṛtāṃ cirabandhanabaddhāmudake 'vatārya samāropitabhāṇḍāṃ paripūrṇāṃ bhārārtāmabhirūḍhaḥ syāt,
K05bsu049_u:6202: evaṃ sa sārthavāho 'nupāyakuśalo dauṣprajñena mahatā arthaviyogena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:6204: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6215: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:6216: veditavyametatsubhūte aprāpta evāyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāratnākaramantarā saṃsatsyati,
K05bsu049_u:6221: kā punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya antarā vyadhvani saṃsīdanā?
K05bsu049_u:6223: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paṇḍitajātīyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvaṃ subaddhāṃ bandhayitvā
K05bsu049_u:6224: svākoṭitāmākoṭayitvā suparikarmakṛtāṃ kṛtvā udake 'vatārya bhāṇḍamāropya pūrṇāṃ kṛtvā
K05bsu049_u:6225: samaṃ yojayitvā yuktena vātenābhipretāṃ diśamanupūrveṇa gacchet,
K05bsu049_u:6229: mahālābhena cāyaṃ sārthavāhaḥ saṃyokṣyate yaduta laukikai ratnairiti /
K05bsu049_u:6230: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruci chandaḥ asti vīryam,
K05bsu049_u:6239: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena cāvirahito bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:6240: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
K05bsu049_u:6244: evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati - yato 'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā,
K05bsu049_u:6258: ete cāsya dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena cāvirahitā na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pratipatsyante /
K05bsu049_u:6260: tenaite dharmā abhimukhāḥ saṃprasthitāḥ tato 'syā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāya bhaviṣyantīti /
K05bsu049_u:6261: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:6262: tasya kaścideva śarīre vyādhirutpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā /
K05bsu049_u:6263: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣo 'parigṛhīto mañcāduttiṣṭhet?
K05bsu049_u:6265: bhagavānāha - sacetpunaḥ subhūte sa puruṣo mañcāduttiṣṭhet,
K05bsu049_u:6266: atha ca punarna pratibalo 'rdhakrośāntaram api prakramitum /
K05bsu049_u:6267: sa tayā jarayā tena ca vyādhinā kṣapito yady api mañcāduttiṣṭhet,
K05bsu049_u:6269: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā,
K05bsu049_u:6283: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:6285: atha ca punaḥ subhūte evaṃ veditavyam - ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
K05bsu049_u:6287: yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā sthāsyatīti /
K05bsu049_u:6289: yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītatvādupāyakauśalyena ca virahitatvāt /
K05bsu049_u:6290: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sa eva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:6291: tasya śarīre kaścideva vyādhirūtpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā,
K05bsu049_u:6293: tamenaṃ dvau balavantau puruṣau vāmadakṣiṇābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ svadhyālambitamadhyālambya
K05bsu049_u:6294: suparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhya evaṃ vadetām - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi yāvaccākāṅkṣasi gantum,
K05bsu049_u:6299: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā,
K05bsu049_u:6314: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
K05bsu049_u:6320: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ādikarmikeṇa bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ
K05bsu049_u:6321: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - iha subhūte ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena
K05bsu049_u:6322: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni /
K05bsu049_u:6325: tānyeva cāsya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
K05bsu049_u:6326: evaṃ cāsmai prajñāpāramitāyā arthamupadekṣyanti - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyasva,
K05bsu049_u:6327: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyasva /
K05bsu049_u:6330: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6331: evaṃ mā vedanāto mā saṃjñāto mā saṃskārebhyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6332: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vijñānataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6335: evaṃ yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra śīlaṃ rakṣasi..........peyālaṃ..............yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntyā saṃpādayasi,
K05bsu049_u:6338: yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoṣi,
K05bsu049_u:6340: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6341: evaṃ mā vedanāto mā saṃjñāto mā saṃskārebhyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6342: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vijñānataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6345: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā spṛhāṃ kārṣīriti /
K05bsu049_u:6346: evaṃ hi subhūte ādikarmiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupūrveṇa kalyāṇamitraiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmavatārayitavyaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:6354: evaṃrūpāṃ prajñāmāgamya svādhīne 'pi parinirvāṇe necchanti parinirvātum /
K05bsu049_u:6355: api tu paramaduḥkhitaṃ sattvadhātumabhisamīkṣya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ saṃsārānnotrasyanti /
K05bsu049_u:6356: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:6357: duṣkarakārakāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ye lokahitāya saṃprasthitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6368: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti?
K05bsu049_u:6369: yāni tāni subhūte saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni lokasya,
K05bsu049_u:6373: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:6374: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā santo lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhavanti?
K05bsu049_u:6375: ye subhūte sattvā jātidharmiṇo jarādharmiṇo vyādhidharmiṇo maraṇadharmiṇaḥ śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmiṇaḥ
K05bsu049_u:6377: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:6378: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya layanaṃ bhavanti?
K05bsu049_u:6379: yatsubhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sattvebhyo 'śleṣāya dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K05bsu049_u:6380: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya layanaṃ bhavanati /
K05bsu049_u:6404: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvadharmā asaṃśliṣṭā asaṃbaddhā iti jñānadarśanādaśleṣo bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:6405: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya layanaṃ bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:6406: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti?
K05bsu049_u:6408: yathā ca subhūte pāraṃ tathā rūpam /
K05bsu049_u:6411: yathā ca subhūte pāraṃ tathā vijñānam /
K05bsu049_u:6416: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ pāraṃ tathā sarvadharmāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6417: nanu bhagavan bodhisattvairmahāsattvairabhisaṃbuddhā evaṃ bhavanti sarvadharmāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6423: idam api subhūte paramaduṣkaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
K05bsu049_u:6427: evaṃ ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya enān dharmān deśayiṣyāmaḥ prakāśayiṣyāma ityupanidhyāyanti /
K05bsu049_u:6428: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:6429: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ (Vaidya 148)
K05bsu049_u:6431: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ye pradeśā udakaparicchinnā bhavanti nadīṣu vā mahodadhiṣu vā,
K05bsu049_u:6443: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya dvīpā bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:6444: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā santo lokasya ālokā bhavanti?
K05bsu049_u:6445: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo
K05bsu049_u:6448: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya ālokā bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:6449: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya pariṇāyakā bhavanti?
K05bsu049_u:6450: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo rūpasya prakṛtyanutpādānirodhāya dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K05bsu049_u:6459: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya pariṇāyakā bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:6460: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya gatirbhagavanti?
K05bsu049_u:6461: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya ākāśagatikaṃ rupamiti dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K05bsu049_u:6464: evameva subhūte sarvadharmā ākāśagatikā anāgatikā agatikā ākāśasamāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6466: evameva subhūte sarvadharmā anāgatā āgatā ākṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā asthitā asaṃsthitā avyavasthitā anutpannā aniruddhā ākāśakalpatvādavikalpāḥ
K05bsu049_u:6469: na sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
K05bsu049_u:6472: na sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
K05bsu049_u:6474: na sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
K05bsu049_u:6516: ataś ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā santa ākāśagatikāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K05bsu049_u:6517: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya gatirbhavanti //
K05bsu049_u:6518: subhūtirāha - ke bhagavan imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmājñāsyanti?
K05bsu049_u:6519: bhagavānāha - ye subhūte caritāvino bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti paurvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike paripakvakuśalamūlāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6520: te subhūte bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ ye imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmājñāsyanti /
K05bsu049_u:6521: subhūtirāha - kiṃsvabhāvā bhagavaṃste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:6523: bhagavānāha - vainayikaviviktasvabhāvaste subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:6525: subhūtirāha - kiṃ bhagavan evaṃgatikā eva te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti?
K05bsu049_u:6528: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:6529: evaṃgatikā eva te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:6530: enāmeva gatimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānām enāmeva gatiṃ deśayiṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:6532: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ gatirbhaviṣyanti //
K05bsu049_u:6533: subhūtirāha - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yenāyaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti /
K05bsu049_u:6534: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:6535: duṣkarakārakaḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yenāyaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ - aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti /
K05bsu049_u:6537: saṃnāho bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya na rūpasaṃbaddho na rūpasyārthāya saṃbaddhaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6544: sarvadharmāsaṃnaddho batāyaṃ subhūte saṃnāho bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya //
K05bsu049_u:6545: subhūtirāha - asya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya evaṃ gambhīrārāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratastrīṇi sthānāni na pratikāṅkṣitavyāni /
K05bsu049_u:6548: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamaṃ tvaṃ subhūte arthavaśaṃ
K05bsu049_u:6549: saṃpaśyannevaṃ vadasi - asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya
K05bsu049_u:6550: evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratastrīṇi sthānāni na pratikāṅkṣitavyāni /
K05bsu049_u:6553: asthānaṃ subhūte hyetadanavakāśo 'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
K05bsu049_u:6554: api tu buddhabhūmirevāsya pratikāṅkṣitavyā yenāyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:6563: na hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kaściddharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6570: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:6571: ato hi subhūte gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05bsu049_u:6575: kaccidbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parasya śraddhayā gacchati /
K05bsu049_u:6576: kaccitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:6577: na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati na dhandhāyate avagāhate 'dhimucyate 'bhinandati prajñāpāramitāyā darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca /
K05bsu049_u:6580: tathā hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate //
K05bsu049_u:6581: (Vaidya 151) subhūtirāha - yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:6582: katamena bhagavan ākāreṇa tena prajñāpāramitā vyavacāritā bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:6583: bhagavānāha - sarvajñatānimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā vyavacāritā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:6584: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan sarvajñatānimnā saṃtatirvyavacāritā bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:6585: bhagavānāha - ākāśanimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā ākāśapravaṇayā ākāśaprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā sarvajñatānimnā saṃtatirvyavacāritā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:6586: yā khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvajñatānimnayā saṃtatyā vyavacāraṇā,
K05bsu049_u:6592: na tadrūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na prāptirnābhisamayo nādhigamo
K05bsu049_u:6593: na mārgo na mārgaphalaṃ na jñānaṃ na vijñānaṃ notpattirna vināśo notpādo na vyayo
K05bsu049_u:6594: na nirodho na bhāvanā na vibhāvanā,
K05bsu049_u:6595: nāpi kenacitkṛtaṃ nāpi kutaścidāgataṃ nāpi kvacid gacchati nāpi kvaciddeśe nāpi kvacitpradeśe sthitam,
K05bsu049_u:6600: na rūpeṇa na vedanayā na saṃjñayā na saṃskārairna vijñānena na dānapāramitayā na
K05bsu049_u:6601: śīlapāramitayā na kṣāntipāramitayā na vīryapāramitayā na dhyānapāramitayā na prajñāpāramitayā
K05bsu049_u:6608: śīlapāramitaiva kṣāntipāramitaiva vīryapāramitaiva dhyānapāramitaiva prajñāpāramitaiva hi subhūte sarvajñatā //
K05bsu049_u:6609: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarairdevaputrairbrahmāpi sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ rūpāvacarairdevaputrairyena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K05bsu049_u:6610: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthau /
K05bsu049_u:6611: ekānte sthitaś ca śakro devendraḥ kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:6616: bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya alpotsukatāyāṃ cittamavanataṃ na dharmadeśanāyām //
K05bsu049_u:6617: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ kāmāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān brahmāṇaṃ ca sahāpatiṃ rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:6623: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhamātrasya bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya alpotsukatāyāṃ cittamavanataṃ na dharmadeśanāyām - gambhīro batāyaṃ mayā dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti,
K05bsu049_u:6624: yatra na kaścidabhisaṃbuddho na kaścidabhisaṃbhotsyate na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate /
K05bsu049_u:6630: evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ kāmāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
K05bsu049_u:6633: anugrahāya ca bhagavan dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmo deśyate /
K05bsu049_u:6638: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - sarvadharmānupalambho batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmo deśyate /
K05bsu049_u:6640: apratihatalakṣaṇo batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ ākāśasamatayā sarvapadānupalabdhitaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6646: atha khalu devānāmindro brahmā sahāpatiste ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - anujāto batāyaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ śrāvaka āryasubhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6648: tathā hi bhagavan yaṃ yameva ayamāryasubhūtiḥ sthaviro dharmaṃ deśayati,
K05bsu049_u:6650: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca sahāpatiṃ tāṃś ca kāmāvacarān
K05bsu049_u:6651: rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - yaddevaputrā evaṃ vadatha - anujāto 'yaṃ
K05bsu049_u:6678: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastayā tathatayā avikāro nirvikāro 'vikalpo nirvikalpastathāgatasyānujātaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6679: yathā ca tathāgatatathatā avikārā nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā,
K05bsu049_u:6681: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā avikārā nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā,
K05bsu049_u:6701: evameva ca tathāgatatathatayābhinirmitaḥ subhūtiśceti dvayamapyaluptametadabhinnaṃ bhedakānupalabdhitaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6711: yathā tathāgatatathatā nātītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā,
K05bsu049_u:6712: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā /
K05bsu049_u:6713: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastāṃ tathatāmanujātastathāgatamanujāta ityucyate /
K05bsu049_u:6722: iti hi subhūtitathatā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannatathatā ca tathāgatatathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
K05bsu049_u:6723: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā ca subhūtitathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
K05bsu049_u:6727: yayā tathatayā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ san tathāgata iti nāmadheyaṃ labhate /
K05bsu049_u:6728: asyāṃ khalu punastathātagatathatāyāṃ nirdiśyamānāyāmiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ ṣaḍvikāramaṣṭādaśamahānimittamakampat,
K05bsu049_u:6736: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - evaṃ hi devaputrāḥ subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:6737: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro na rūpamanujāto na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān
K05bsu049_u:6738: na vijñānamanujāto na srotaāpattiphalamanujāto na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ na anāgāmiphalaṃ
K05bsu049_u:6739: na arhattvaphalamanujāto na pratyekabuddhatvamanujāto na buddhatvamanujātaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6741: tathā hi te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante yairanujāyeta,
K05bsu049_u:6744: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīracaryeyaṃ bhagavan yaduta tathatā /
K05bsu049_u:6745: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evametacchāriputra, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:6747: asmin khalu punastathatānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne trayāṇāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
K05bsu049_u:6748: pañcānāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham,
K05bsu049_u:6749: pañcabhiś ca devaputrasahasraiḥ pūrvaparikarmakṛtairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
K05bsu049_u:6752: viditvā bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadeteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni?
K05bsu049_u:6753: bhagavānāha - etaiḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaiḥ pañcabuddhaśatāni paryupāsitāni,
K05bsu049_u:6754: sarvatra ca dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣityaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryamārabdhaṃ dhyānānyutpāditāni /
K05bsu049_u:6755: te khalu punarime prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena ca virahitā abhūvan /
K05bsu049_u:6756: kiṃcāpi śāriputra eteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmasti mārgaḥ śūnyatā vā ānimittacaryā vā apraṇihitamanasikāratā vā,
K05bsu049_u:6760: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra pakṣiṇaḥ śakuneryojanaśatiko vā dviyojanaśatiko vā triyojanaśatiko vā caturyojanaśatiko vā pañcayojanaśatiko vā ātmabhāvo bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:6761: sa trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu vartamāno jambūdvīpamāgantavyaṃ manyeta /
K05bsu049_u:6762: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra pakṣī śakunirajātapakṣo vā bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:6765: sa trāyastriṃśato devanikāyādātmānamutsṛjet - iha jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti manyeta /
K05bsu049_u:6766: atha tasya pakṣiṇaḥ śakunestataḥ patataḥ ākāśe antarīkṣe sthitasya antarā cittasyaivaṃ bhavet - aho batāhaṃ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratiṣṭheyamiti
K05bsu049_u:6767: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakuniḥ pratibalaḥ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratiṣṭhātum?
K05bsu049_u:6768: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
K05bsu049_u:6769: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarevaṃ cintayet - aho batāhamakṛto 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭheyamiti /
K05bsu049_u:6770: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakunirakṛto 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhet?
K05bsu049_u:6772: kṛtaś ca sa bhagavan upahataś ca bhavejjambūdvīpe ca patitaḥ san maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham /
K05bsu049_u:6774: evaṃ hyetadbhagavan bhavati - yadasya mahāṃścātmabhāvo bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:6777: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evametacchāriputra, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:6778: kiṃ cāpi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
K05bsu049_u:6786: sacedayaṃ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:6787: evaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati //
K05bsu049_u:6789: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tacchīlaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ tāṃ prajñāṃ tāṃ vimuktiṃ tadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ samanvāharati,
K05bsu049_u:6791: na sa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śīlaṃ na jānāti na paśyati /
K05bsu049_u:6792: na samādhiṃ na prajñāṃ na vimuktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ jānāti, na paśyati /
K05bsu049_u:6795: taṃ śabdaṃ nimittīkṛtya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumicchati /
K05bsu049_u:6796: tato veditavyam etat - sthāsyatyayaṃ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau veti /
K05bsu049_u:6798: evaṃ hyetacchāriputra bhavati - yatprajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati //
K05bsu049_u:6799: śāriputra āha - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi - yo bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahitaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6800: kiṃcāpi sa bahunāpi puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaś ca bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:6802: tasmāttarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
K05bsu049_u:6804: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evametacchāriputra, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:6807: kiṃcāpi sa bahunā puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaś ca bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:6809: tasmāttarhi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
K05bsu049_u:6811: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6812: brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
K05bsu049_u:6815: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān sahāpatimahābrahmapramukhān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:6819: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6826: na sa kaściddharmaḥ saṃvidyate yo dharmaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum /
K05bsu049_u:6828: yasyāpi bhagavan dharmasya prahāṇāya dharmo deśyate,
K05bsu049_u:6835: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa mamaivaṃ bhavati - svabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhuṃ na durabhisaṃbhaveti /
K05bsu049_u:6836: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - asaṃbhavatvātsubhūte durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6841: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - śūnyamityanenāpyāyuṣman subhūte paryāyeṇa durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ
K05bsu049_u:6844: na hyāyuṣman subhūte ākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati - ahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti /
K05bsu049_u:6845: evaṃ ca āyuṣman subhūte ime dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6848: yadi cāyuṣman subhūte svabhisaṃbhavā bhavedanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6849: na tvevaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivarterannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6850: yasmāttarhyāyuṣman subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivartante 'nuttarayāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6851: tasmādāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vijñāyate - durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6853: evamukte āyuṣman subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
K05bsu049_u:6855: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6858: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
K05bsu049_u:6860: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo 'nyatra vijñānāt sa dharmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6863: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā rūpatathatā,
K05bsu049_u:6866: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā,
K05bsu049_u:6870: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6873: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6877: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim?
K05bsu049_u:6879: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim?
K05bsu049_u:6885: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6889: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā anuttarāṃ saṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
K05bsu049_u:6891: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
K05bsu049_u:6893: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6896: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6900: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K05bsu049_u:6902: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K05bsu049_u:6904: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6907: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6908: anyatra vijñānātsa dharmaḥ yo boddhavyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ?
K05bsu049_u:6910: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā boddhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K05bsu049_u:6912: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā boddhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K05bsu049_u:6914: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6917: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6921: subhūtirāha - tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatā vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
K05bsu049_u:6923: subhūtirāha - tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatāyāṃ sa dharmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6926: subhūtirāha - tatkatamaḥ punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa dharmo yo vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
K05bsu049_u:6928: katamo vā punaḥ sa śāriputra dharmo yā tathatā?
K05bsu049_u:6931: subhūtirāha - evamāyuṣman śāriputra satyataḥ sthitito 'nupalabhyamānānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ sa dharmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6934: subhūtimetadavocat - yayā dharmanayajātyā āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro nirdiśati,
K05bsu049_u:6935: tayā na sa kaściddharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6936: ye ca khalu punarime āyuṣman subhūte trayo bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāstathāgatenākhyātāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6938: ekameva hi yānaṃ bhavati yaduta buddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānaṃ yathā āyuṣmataḥ subhūternirdeśaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:6939: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman
K05bsu049_u:6940: śāriputra āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ ekam api bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchati śrāvakayānikaṃ
K05bsu049_u:6943: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punastvamāyuṣman
K05bsu049_u:6944: subhūte ekam api bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchasi śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā?
K05bsu049_u:6945: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā tathatāyāstathatā,
K05bsu049_u:6946: tatra tathatāyāmekam api bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyasi śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā?
K05bsu049_u:6950: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra tathatā ekenāpyākāreṇopalabhyate?
K05bsu049_u:6952: subhūtirāha - kaccitpunastvamāyuṣman śāriputra tathatāyāmekam api bodhisattvadharmaṃ samanupaśyasi?
K05bsu049_u:6954: subhūtirāha - evamāyuṣman śāriputra satyataḥ sthititastasya bodhisattvadharmasyānupalabhyamānasya kutastavaivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ śrāvakayānikaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6958: nirviśeṣatāṃ nirnānākaraṇatāṃ śrutvā yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate
K05bsu049_u:6960: veditavyam etat - niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhyā iti //
K05bsu049_u:6961: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
K05bsu049_u:6963: pratibhāti te subhūte yathāpi nāma tathāgatānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānenedaṃ vadasi /
K05bsu049_u:6964: evameteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathatāyāṃ pravibhāvyamānānāmaviśeṣatāṃ nirviśeṣatāṃ nirnānākaraṇatāṃ
K05bsu049_u:6965: śrutvā yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na pṛṣṭhībhavati,
K05bsu049_u:6966: veditavyam etat - niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhyā iti /
K05bsu049_u:6967: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - katamayā bhagavan bodhyā niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:6968: bhagavānāha - anuttarayā śāriputra samyaksaṃbodhyā niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:6969: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - anuttarāyāṃ bhagavan samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
K05bsu049_u:6970: bhagavānāha - anuttarāyāṃ subhūte samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattveṣu samaṃ sthātavyam /
K05bsu049_u:6980: sarvasattveṣu mātṛsaṃjñāmupasthāya pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ copasthāpya pare ālambitavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:6981: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmantike sthātavyam,
K05bsu049_u:6984: dānaṃ dātavyaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayitavyaṃ vīryamārabdhavyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpattavyaṃ prajñāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaṃ,
K05bsu049_u:6986: anyeṣām api tatra samādāpakena tadvarṇavādinā tatsamanujñena ca bhavitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:6987: evaṃ satyeṣu yāvadbodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntau sattvaparipācane ca sthitvā anyeṣām api tatra samādāpakena tadvarṇavādinā tatsamanujñena ca bhavitavyam
K05bsu049_u:6988: tasyaivaṃ spṛhayata evaṃ śikṣamāṇasya anāvaraṇaṃ rūpaṃ yāvaddharmasthitiranāvaraṇā bhaviṣyatīti //
K05bsu049_u:6992: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - avinivartanīyasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ke ākārāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:6995: kathaṃ vā bhagavan vayaṃ jānīyāma ayamavinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti?
K05bsu049_u:7001: sarvāścaitāstathatāyā advayā advaidhīkārā avikalpā nirvikalpā iti tāṃ tathatāṃ tāṃ dharmatāmavataranti /
K05bsu049_u:7002: tathatāyāṃ sthitastathatāṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati,
K05bsu049_u:7004: evamavatīrṇo yathātathatāṃ śrutvāpi tato 'pi cāpakramya na kāṅkṣati na vimatiṃ karoti,
K05bsu049_u:7011: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:7012: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nānyeṣāṃ śramaṇānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vā mukhamullokayati - ime bhagavantaḥ śramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā jñeyaṃ jānanti,
K05bsu049_u:7015: na cānyebhyo devebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭāṃ vā patākāṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dātavyaṃ manyate,
K05bsu049_u:7017: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ
K05bsu049_u:7018: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāpāyeṣūpapadyate,
K05bsu049_u:7020: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate /
K05bsu049_u:7043: evaṃ khalu subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svayaṃ ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate,
K05bsu049_u:7044: parān api ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dṛḍhīkaroti /
K05bsu049_u:7045: sa svapnāntaragato 'pi daśakuśalān karmapathānekaikato vā bāhulyato vā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ nādhyāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:7047: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svapnāntaragatasyāpi daśakuśalāḥ karmapathā āmukhībhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:7048: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ
K05bsu049_u:7049: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaṃ yaṃ dharmaṃ paryavāpnoti,
K05bsu049_u:7052: dadāti ca - imamahaṃ dharmaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya paryavāpnomi dadāmi ca,
K05bsu049_u:7055: anayā dharmadeśanayā dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ paripūryantāmiti /
K05bsu049_u:7057: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ
K05bsu049_u:7058: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu na kāṅkṣati,
K05bsu049_u:7066: so 'bhikrāman vā pratikrāman vā na bhrāntacitto 'bhikrāmati vā,
K05bsu049_u:7075: na ca sahasā pādaṃ bhūmau nikṣipati,
K05bsu049_u:7077: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre cīvaraparibhogo na yūkilo bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:7081: yāni khalu punaranyeṣāṃ sattvānāmaśītiḥ kṛmikulasahasrāṇi kāye saṃbhavanti,

K05bsu049_u:7456: tathā saṃpādayamānastathopanidhyāyaṃstathopaparīkṣamāṇastathā prayujyamānastathā ghaṭamānastathā vyāyacchamāna ekadivasamapyatra yogamāpadyate
K05bsu049_u:7458: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:7459: tasya puruṣasya rāgacaritasya vitarkacaritasya striyā abhirūpayā prāsādikayā darśanīyayā saha saṃketaḥ kṛto bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:7463: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte kiṃpratisaṃyuktāstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran?
K05bsu049_u:7464: subhūtirāha - strīpratisaṃyuktā eva bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran - iyamāgacchati, iyamāgatā /
K05bsu049_u:7469: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya kiyanto vitarkā utpadyeran?
K05bsu049_u:7470: subhūtirāha - bahavo bhagavan divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya vitarkā utpadyeran /
K05bsu049_u:7471: bhagavānāha - yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya divasasyātyayena vitarkā utpadyeran,
K05bsu049_u:7472: iyataḥ subhūte kalpān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaśchorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti saṃsārādvyantīkaroti,
K05bsu049_u:7473: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathājñaptaṃ yathākhyātaṃ yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ tiṣṭhati śikṣate pratipadyate upanidhyāyati yogamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:7476: evaṃ hi subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyogamanuyuktaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7479: yaś ca prajñāpāramitāvirahito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
K05bsu049_u:7480: ayameva tato viśiṣyate yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamekadivasam api prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate //
K05bsu049_u:7481: punaraparaṃ subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpannebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
K05bsu049_u:7488: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathaiva yogamāpadyeta ekadivasam api /
K05bsu049_u:7489: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvadbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
K05bsu049_u:7490: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
K05bsu049_u:7493: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikārādvyutthāya dharmaṃ deśayet,
K05bsu049_u:7494: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
K05bsu049_u:7495: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
K05bsu049_u:7499: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikāradvyutthāya dharmadānaṃ dadyāt,
K05bsu049_u:7500: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
K05bsu049_u:7501: (Vaidya 172) punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt
K05bsu049_u:7503: ārabdhavīryaḥ san dhyāneṣu bodhipakṣeṣu ca dharmeṣu yogamāpadyeta,
K05bsu049_u:7505: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
K05bsu049_u:7506: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
K05bsu049_u:7507: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
K05bsu049_u:7509: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
K05bsu049_u:7510: pariṇāmya ca pratisaṃlāne na punareva yogamāpadyeta /
K05bsu049_u:7511: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānameva dadyāt,
K05bsu049_u:7513: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tāvatpuṇyaṃ prasavati,
K05bsu049_u:7514: yāvadya evaṃ dharmadānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratisaṃlāne ca punareva yogamāpadyamānaḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītastatpratisaṃlānamavirahitaṃ karoti prajñāpāramitayā,
K05bsu049_u:7515: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
K05bsu049_u:7516: subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan abhisaṃskāro vikalpa ityuktaṃ bhagavatā,
K05bsu049_u:7518: bhagavānāha - so 'pīdānīṃ subhūte puṇyābhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śūnyaka ityevākhyāyate,
K05bsu049_u:7522: yathā yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmān pratyavekṣate,
K05bsu049_u:7523: tathā tathā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā /
K05bsu049_u:7524: yathā yathā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā,
K05bsu049_u:7526: subhūtirāha - aprameyasya ca bhagavan asaṃkhyeyasya ca kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā,
K05bsu049_u:7529: asaṃkhyeyamiti subhūte yanna śakyaṃ saṃkhyayāpi kṣapayitum //
K05bsu049_u:7533: bhagavānāha - yatsubhūtirevamāha - syādbhagavan paryāyo yadrūpamaprameyaṃ bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:7543: (Vaidya 173) subhūtirāha - kiṃ śūnyatāyā eva bhagavan kevalametadadhivacanamaprameyamiti,
K05bsu049_u:7546: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte nanu mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ityākhyātāḥ?
K05bsu049_u:7552: tasmāttarhi subhūte eṣāṃ dharmāṇāmarthato viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate /
K05bsu049_u:7553: abhilāpā ete subhūte tathāgatenākhyātāḥ abhilapitāḥ - aprameyamiti vā,
K05bsu049_u:7566: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadiyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā deśitā,
K05bsu049_u:7579: dānapāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:7584: prajñāpāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:7585: sacedbhagavan āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7586: kathaṃ bhagavan vivardhamānānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ balena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
K05bsu049_u:7588: na ca bhagavan apratipūrayan pāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:7590: na khalu punaḥ subhūte pāramitārthasya kācidvṛddhirvāsti parihāṇirvā vidyate /
K05bsu049_u:7591: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ dānapāramitā vivardhate,
K05bsu049_u:7593: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dānapāramiteti /
K05bsu049_u:7594: sa dānaṃ dadat tān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
K05bsu049_u:7596: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ śīlapāramitā
K05bsu049_u:7599: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta śīlapāramiteti /
K05bsu049_u:7600: sa śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
K05bsu049_u:7602: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā
K05bsu049_u:7604: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta kṣāntipāramiteti /
K05bsu049_u:7605: sa kṣāntyā saṃpādayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
K05bsu049_u:7607: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ vīryapāramitā
K05bsu049_u:7609: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta vīryapāramiteti /
K05bsu049_u:7610: sa vīryamārabhamāṇastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati /
K05bsu049_u:7612: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā
K05bsu049_u:7614: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dhyānapāramiteti /
K05bsu049_u:7615: sa dhyānāni samāpadyamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
K05bsu049_u:7617: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
K05bsu049_u:7619: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta prajñāpāramiteti /
K05bsu049_u:7620: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati
K05bsu049_u:7622: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kā punareṣā bhagavan anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
K05bsu049_u:7624: na ca subhūte tathatā vivardhate, vā,
K05bsu049_u:7629: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /
K05bsu049_u:7631: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇām api subhūte na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /
K05bsu049_u:7632: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhirevaṃrūpairmanasikārairviharan āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //
K05bsu049_u:7636: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ punarbhagavan prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
K05bsu049_u:7640: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlānāmupacayo bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:7641: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tailapradyotasya jvalato 'rciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā,
K05bsu049_u:7644: na hi bhagavan arciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā /
K05bsu049_u:7645: na ca prathamābhinipātamanāgamya arciṣā sā vartirdagdhā /
K05bsu049_u:7646: na ca bhagavan paścimābhinipātenārciṣā sā vartirdagdhā,
K05bsu049_u:7647: na ca paścimābhinipātamanāgamya arciṣā sā vartirdagdhā /
K05bsu049_u:7648: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sā vartirdagdhā?
K05bsu049_u:7651: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte na ca prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
K05bsu049_u:7657: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīro 'yaṃ bhagavan pratītyasamutpādaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:7658: na ca nāma bhagavan prathamacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
K05bsu049_u:7659: na ca nāma prathamacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
K05bsu049_u:7660: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
K05bsu049_u:7661: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
K05bsu049_u:7662: na ca nāma taiścittotpādairna cānyatra tebhyaścittotpādebhyo 'bhisaṃbudhyate /
K05bsu049_u:7664: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittaṃ niruddham,
K05bsu049_u:7682: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvaniruddha eva,
K05bsu049_u:7685: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā nirotsyate?
K05bsu049_u:7687: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā?
K05bsu049_u:7688: āha - tathaiva bhagavan sthāsyati yathā tathatā /
K05bsu049_u:7689: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yadi tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā,
K05bsu049_u:7692: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte gambhīrā tathatā?
K05bsu049_u:7696: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte cittaṃ tathatā?
K05bsu049_u:7702: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ya evaṃ carati sa gambhīre carati?
K05bsu049_u:7706: tathā hyasya te samudācārā na pravartante,
K05bsu049_u:7708: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ carati,
K05bsu049_u:7711: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramārthe carati,
K05bsu049_u:7714: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tasya nimittamavibhāvitam?
K05bsu049_u:7716: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato nimittaṃ vibhāvitaṃ bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:7717: subhūtirāha - na sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ prayujyate - kathamahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ carannihaiva nimittaprahāṇamanuprāpnuyāmiti
K05bsu049_u:7723: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo
K05bsu049_u:7724: mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragatastrīṇi vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayati - śūnyatāmānimittamapraṇihitaṃ ca,
K05bsu049_u:7729: avikalpo hi āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaś ca divasaścokto bhagavatā /
K05bsu049_u:7730: sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitālābhī divase divase prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05bsu049_u:7731: tato 'sya prajñāpāramitābhyāsataḥ svapnāntaragatasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāvaipulyena bhavitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:7732: śāriputra āha - yatpunarāyuṣman subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā svapnāntaragataḥ karma śubhamaśubhaṃ vā karoti,
K05bsu049_u:7733: kiṃ bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā?
K05bsu049_u:7734: subhūtirāha - yathā svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā uktā bhagavatā,
K05bsu049_u:7735: tathā na tasya karmaṇo bhavatyācayo vā upacayo vā /
K05bsu049_u:7736: atha punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati, (Vaidya 177)
K05bsu049_u:7737: bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā /
K05bsu049_u:7738: kathaṃ ca āyuṣman śāriputra vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati?
K05bsu049_u:7739: sacetsvapnāntaragataḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kṛtvā prativibuddhaḥ sannevaṃ vikalpayati - aho hataḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7744: śāriputra āha - sacedāyuṣman subhūte sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati - aho hataḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7748: bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā?
K05bsu049_u:7750: tasyāpi karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā bhavet?
K05bsu049_u:7754: tadyathāpi nāma ākāśameva āyuṣman śāriputra nānārambaṇaṃ karmotpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:7763: tasmāttarhi āyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā,
K05bsu049_u:7765: śāriputra āha - yadāyuṣman subhūte sarvārambaṇāni viviktāni ākhyātāni bhagavatā,
K05bsu049_u:7766: tadā kasmādāyuṣman subhūte sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā?
K05bsu049_u:7767: subhūtirāha - nimittīkṛtya āyuṣman śāriputra vidyamānamevārambaṇamārambaṇīkṛtya sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:7776: śāriputra āha - yadāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato dānaṃ dadyāt,
K05bsu049_u:7779: subhūtirāha - ayamāyuṣman śāriputra maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:7784: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ayamāyuṣman maitreya subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha - mayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:7787: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadāyuṣmān subhūtirevamāha - ayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05bsu049_u:7789: kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yadetannāmadheyaṃ maitreya iti?
K05bsu049_u:7801: yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte rūpasya śūnyatā,
K05bsu049_u:7804: yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte vijñānasya śūnyatā,
K05bsu049_u:7814: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kaccitpunarāyuṣman maitreya tvayā ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7816: maitreya āha - na mayā āyuṣman śāriputra ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7823: api tu khalu punarāyuṣman śāriputra na kāyena spṛśyeta,
K05bsu049_u:7827: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7828: yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritāvī nirdiśati //
K05bsu049_u:7829: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma - kutaste śāriputra etadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva
K05bsu049_u:7830: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ śāriputra taṃ dharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa samanvāgato 'rhanniti prabhāvyate?
K05bsu049_u:7832: bhagavānāha - evameva śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05bsu049_u:7843: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyālakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,
K05bsu049_u:7847: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaṃ parityaktavyaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya /
K05bsu049_u:7848: tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - yadi cenmāṃ vyālā bhakṣayeyuḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7853: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ tiryagyonigatāḥ sattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra me buddhakṣetre na
K05bsu049_u:7856: punaraparaṃ śāriputra corakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,
K05bsu049_u:7862: utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktasarvapariṣkāropakaraṇena /
K05bsu049_u:7863: tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - sacenmama sattvāḥ sarvapariṣkāropakaraṇāni hareyuḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7867: teṣām api ca mayā na kāyena na vācā na manasā aparāddhavyam /
K05bsu049_u:7868: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:7872: yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataścorakāntārāṇy api tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:7875: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:7877: punaraparaṃ śāriputraṃ pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
K05bsu049_u:7880: evaṃ cānena cittamutpādayitavyam - sarvasattvānāṃ mayā sarvatṛṣṇācchedāya śikṣitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:7886: api tu khalu punaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike mahākaruṇācittamutpādayitavyam - aho bata alpapuṇyā amī sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7890: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:7894: tathā ca dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7895: yathā vīryapāramitā ca me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti //
K05bsu049_u:7896: punaraparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
K05bsu049_u:7897: evaṃ cānena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ - tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye,
K05bsu049_u:7899: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:7901: sukhitā eva te sattvā bhaviṣyanti sukhasamaṅginaḥ sarvasukhasamarpitāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:7903: yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yo ya evābhiprāyo bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:7905: tattadeva prādurbhaviṣyati tadyathāpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasaiva sarvamutpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:7906: yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ manasaiva sarvaṃ prādurbhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:7909: yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:7912: tathā ca svacittapariśuddhaye vyāyaṃsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7913: yathā dhyānapāramitā ca me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti //
K05bsu049_u:7914: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyādhikāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
K05bsu049_u:7915: evaṃ cānenopaparīkṣitavyaṃ cintayitavyaṃ tulayitavyam - neha sa kaściddharmo yo vyādhyā bādhyate,
K05bsu049_u:7918: na cotrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
K05bsu049_u:7919: na ca śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
K05bsu049_u:7923: evaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na duṣkarasaṃjñotpādayitavyā - bahvī dīrghā caiṣā apūrvā koṭiriti,
K05bsu049_u:7925: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam
K05bsu049_u:7926: yaḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhyaścānyebhyaś ca dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na
K05bsu049_u:7927: jñātavyamidaṃ śāriputra bhavyo 'yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhumiti /
K05bsu049_u:7928: evaṃ ca śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ - tathā kariṣyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:7930: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarvasattvānāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvavyādhayo na bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:7934: tathā ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parijayaṃ kariṣyāmi sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:7935: yathā prajñāpāramitāpi me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti //
K05bsu049_u:7936: atha khalu tatra parṣadi anyatarā strī saṃnipatitā saṃniṣaṇṇābhūt /
K05bsu049_u:7937: sā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
K05bsu049_u:7938: yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ahaṃ bhagavan atra sthāne notrasiṣyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:7941: anutrastā ca asaṃtrastā ca sarvasattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti /
K05bsu049_u:7942: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ suvarṇavarṇasmitaṃ prādurakarot /
K05bsu049_u:7943: tadanantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā spharitvā yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata eva mūrdhni antaradhīyata /
K05bsu049_u:7944: samanantaraṃ prāduṣkṛte ca bhagavatā tasmin smite atha khalu sā strī suvarṇapuṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ suvarṇapuṣpairabhyavākiradabhiprākirat
K05bsu049_u:7945: atha khalu tāni suvarṇapuṣpāṇyasaktāni antarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitānyabhūvan //
K05bsu049_u:7946: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
K05bsu049_u:7947: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat -
K05bsu049_u:7950: nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti /
K05bsu049_u:7951: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - iyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī anāgate
K05bsu049_u:7952: 'dhvani suvarṇapuṣpo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
K05bsu049_u:7953: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
K05bsu049_u:7956: seyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī strībhāvaṃ vivartya puruṣabhāvaṃ pratilabhya itaścyutvā
K05bsu049_u:7957: akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre abhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate /
K05bsu049_u:7958: tatra copapannā akṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:7959: tataścyutā satī buddhakṣetrādbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati avirahitā tathāgatadarśanena /
K05bsu049_u:7962: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda rājā cakravartīṃ prāsādātprāsādaṃ saṃkrāmet,
K05bsu049_u:7964: sa yāvanmaraṇāvasthāyāṃ bhūmitalaṃ pabhdyāmanākramya kālaṃ kuryāt,
K05bsu049_u:7965: evameva ānanda iyaṃ gaṅgadevā bhaginī buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:7966: tatra ca avirahitā bhaviṣyati buddhairbhagavadbhiryāvannānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate //
K05bsu049_u:7967: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhūt - ye tatrākṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:7969: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmata ānandasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - evametadānanda, evam etat
K05bsu049_u:7971: ye akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
K05bsu049_u:7973: tasya khalu punarānanda suvarṇapuṣpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na pramāṇabaddhaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:7975: tāvanto hyānanda tatra śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti yeṣāṃ nāsti pramāṇam /
K05bsu049_u:7976: api tvaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā ityevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gamiṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:7977: tena khalu punarānanda kālena tena samayena tasmin buddhakṣetre na vyālakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:7978: na caurakāntārāṇi na pānīyakāntārāṇi na vyādhikāntārāṇi na durbhikṣakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:7979: etāni cānyāni ca ānanda asātakāntārāṇi tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:7981: suvarṇapuṣpasya khalu punarānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ
K05bsu049_u:7985: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - anayā bhagavan gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā katamasya tathāgatasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamanuttarāyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:7986: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - anayā ānanda gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya (Vaidya 182)
K05bsu049_u:7989: sa ca dīpaṃkarastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ suvarṇapuṣpairevāvakīrṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayamānayā /
K05bsu049_u:7991: anutpattikeṣu ca mayā dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
K05bsu049_u:7992: tato 'haṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K05bsu049_u:7993: - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavaka anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
K05bsu049_u:7994: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca
K05bsu049_u:7996: tadā etasyā bhaginyā mama vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā evaṃ cittamudapādi - aho bata ahamapyevaṃ vyākriyeya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yathāyaṃ māṇavako vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K05bsu049_u:7997: evaṃ ca ānanda etasyā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamabhūdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K05bsu049_u:7998: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ bhagavan kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K05bsu049_u:8000: evam etat yathā vadasi - kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti //
K05bsu049_u:8004: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃścaratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8006: bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti pratyavekṣitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:8009: tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyamavikṣiptayā cittasaṃtatyā yathā pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpamiti tāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na samanupaśyet /
K05bsu049_u:8010: tāṃ ca asamanupaśyan dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkuryādbhūtakoṭim /
K05bsu049_u:8011: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā sākṣātkartavyeti /
K05bsu049_u:8012: kathaṃ bhagavan tasmin samādhau sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāṃ na sākṣātkaroti?
K05bsu049_u:8013: bhagavānāha - yataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākāravaropetāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
K05bsu049_u:8019: asamāhita evārambaṇe cittamupanibadhnāti - prajñāpāramitā ca me parigṛhītā bhaviṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:8021: atrāntarā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate bodhipakṣairdharmaiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8024: yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati,
K05bsu049_u:8025: tasmin samaye bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ānimittena ca samādhinā vihartavyam,
K05bsu049_u:8028: evamārūḍhakuśalamūladharmasamanvāgato hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ - paripākasyāyaṃ kālaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8030: prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti /
K05bsu049_u:8031: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ paramaśūraś ca bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:8050: supariniṣpannatayā sarveṣveva ca śilpasthāneṣu paramagatiko bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:8063: bahujanasya ca priyo manaāpaś ca bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:8068: tena mahālābhena samanvāgataḥ san bahujanaṃ saṃvibhajet,
K05bsu049_u:8073: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣastatonidānaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā āttamanasko bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:8078: bhagavānāha - sa khalu punaḥ subhūte puruṣastayā mahāsaṃpattyā samanvāgato mātāpitṛputradārān
K05bsu049_u:8079: gṛhītvā kenacideva kāraṇasāmagrīyogena mahāṭavīkāntāraṃ pratipanno bhavet mahāpratibhayaṃ
K05bsu049_u:8081: sa tatra praviṣṭaḥ saṃstān mātāpitṛputradārānabhayenābhinimantrayet - mā bhaiṣṭa,
K05bsu049_u:8085: tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte aṭavīkāntāre tasya puruṣasya bahavaḥ pratyarthikāḥ bahavaḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8086: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa śūraḥ puruṣastaiḥ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrairabhyutthitairavinivartyo
K05bsu049_u:8092: ādhyātmikaś ca bāhyaś ca balavān saṃbhāraḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8093: tasya tatra aṭavīkāntāre bahutarakāś ca śūratarakarāś ca dṛḍhapraharaṇatarakarāś
K05bsu049_u:8094: ca teṣāṃ pratyarthikānāṃ pratyamitrāṇāmanye udāratarakāḥ pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāstiṣṭhanti rakṣanti /
K05bsu049_u:8095: te tasya pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ na lapsyante /
K05bsu049_u:8097: ca tato mahābhayabhairavādaṭavīkāntārācchaktaḥ kṣemeṇa svastinā śīghramapakrāmayituṃ
K05bsu049_u:8098: yāvadgrāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā anuprāptaḥ syāt //
K05bsu049_u:8099: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05bsu049_u:8100: sarvasattvahitānukampī maitrīvihārī karuṇāvihārī muditāvihārī upekṣāvihārī upāyakauśalyena
K05bsu049_u:8101: prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ kuśalamūlāni samyagbuddhānujñātayā pariṇāmanayā pariṇāmya
K05bsu049_u:8106: tathā hyasya balavattamā dṛḍhatamāś ca parigrāhakāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8109: tenaiṣa pratibalaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
K05bsu049_u:8110: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike maitrīcittamārambaṇīkṛtya tān paramayā maitryā paribadhnāti,
K05bsu049_u:8111: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kleśapakṣaṃ mārapakṣaṃ cātikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya tatra samādhāvavatiṣṭhate
K05bsu049_u:8112: aprāptaś ca sa subhūte āsravakṣayaṃ paramapāramitāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoti /
K05bsu049_u:8113: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati,
K05bsu049_u:8114: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na cedānīṃ nānimittena samādhinā viharati /
K05bsu049_u:8115: na cānena ānimittaḥ samādhiḥ sākṣātkṛto (Vaidya 185) bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:8116: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte pakṣī śakunirākāśe 'ntarīkṣe carati,
K05bsu049_u:8120: na ca tatrāpi niśrito na pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8121: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāvihāreṇa viharati,
K05bsu049_u:8127: na ca śūnyatāyāṃ vā ānimitte vā apraṇihite vā patatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8128: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte balavāniṣvastrācārya iṣvastraśikṣāyāṃ suśikṣitaḥ supariniṣṭhitaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8130: ūrdhvaṃ kāṇḍaṃ kṣiptvā tadanyaiḥ kāṇḍaistatkāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patat pratinivārayet,
K05bsu049_u:8132: tasya paurvakasya kāṇḍasya kāṇḍaparaṃparayā bhūmau patanaṃ na dadyāt,
K05bsu049_u:8134: yāvannākāṅkṣet - aho batedaṃ kāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patediti /
K05bsu049_u:8135: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran upāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ tāvattāṃ paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti,
K05bsu049_u:8136: yāvanna tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni suparipakvāni /
K05bsu049_u:8137: yadā tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni bhavanti suparipakvāni,
K05bsu049_u:8139: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evameteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gambhīradharmatā pratyavekṣitavyā
K05bsu049_u:8141: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8149: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:8151: paramaduṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati,
K05bsu049_u:8156: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8157: tasyeme evaṃrūpāḥ praṇidhānaviśeṣā bhavanti - mayaite sarvasattvāḥ parimocayitavyā iti /
K05bsu049_u:8158: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittamabhinirharati - sarvasattvā mamāparityaktāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8163: tadā upāyakauśalyasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ - nāyamantarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8166: sa caivāsya cittotpādo yattasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8167: sa evamanena cittotpādenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato 'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti //
K05bsu049_u:8168: punaraparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāni gambhīrāṇi sthānāni pratyavekṣate,
K05bsu049_u:8169: pratyavekṣitukāmo vā bhavati - tadyathā śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukham,
K05bsu049_u:8172: tenaivaṃ cittamabhinirhartavyam - dīrgharātramamī sattvāḥ sattvasaṃjñayā upalambhe caranti /
K05bsu049_u:8180: evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena cittotpādena anena copāyakauśalyena samanvāgato nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
K05bsu049_u:8181: na ca parihīyate maitrīsamādhito na karuṇāmuditopekṣāsamādhitaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8183: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śuklairdharmaiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8186: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā dharmasaṃjñayā upalambhe caranti /
K05bsu049_u:8188: so 'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate /
K05bsu049_u:8192: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8195: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā nimittasaṃjñayā nimitte caranti /
K05bsu049_u:8196: teṣāṃ nimittasaṃjñāprahāṇāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti /
K05bsu049_u:8197: sa ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8198: so 'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:8200: na ca parihīyate maitryāḥ karuṇāyā muditāyā upekṣāyāḥ sarvasamādhitaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8202: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8205: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā nityasaṃjñayā sukhasaṃjñayā ātmasaṃjñayā śubhasaṃjñayā ca viparyastāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8206: tathā kariṣyāmi yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya nityasaṃjñāyāḥ sukhasaṃjñāyāḥ
K05bsu049_u:8207: ātmasaṃjñāyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā viparyāsasya prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi - anityametatsarvaṃ na nityamiti /
K05bsu049_u:8211: so 'nena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti (Vaidya 187)
K05bsu049_u:8215: na ca parihīyate maitrīto vā karuṇāto vā muditāto vā upekṣāto vā /
K05bsu049_u:8217: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8220: yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ cittotpādamutpādayati,
K05bsu049_u:8221: ityapīme sattvā dīrgharātramupalambhe caritāvinaḥ etarhyupalambhe caranti /
K05bsu049_u:8222: nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
K05bsu049_u:8223: viparyāse caritāvinaḥ etarhy api viparyāse caranti /
K05bsu049_u:8224: piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
K05bsu049_u:8225: abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
K05bsu049_u:8226: mithyādṛṣṭau caritāvinaḥ etarhy api mithyādṛṣṭau caranti /
K05bsu049_u:8227: tathā kariṣyāmi yathaiṣāmete doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:8230: evaṃ ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena smṛtisamanvāhāreṇa anena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ
K05bsu049_u:8231: upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ evameteṣāṃ gambhīrāṇāṃ
K05bsu049_u:8232: dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ śūnyatāto vā ānimittato vā apraṇihitato vā anabhisaṃskārato
K05bsu049_u:8233: vā anutpādato vā ajātito vā abhāvato vā /
K05bsu049_u:8235: yatsa bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jñānasamanvāgato 'nabhisaṃskāre vā patet,
K05bsu049_u:8238: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripraṣṭavyo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena - katameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:8240: yāni cittānyabhinirharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śūnyatāṃ sākṣātkaroti,
K05bsu049_u:8248: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākaroti - śūnyataiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavyā
K05bsu049_u:8249: ānimittameva apraṇihitameva anabhisaṃskāra eva anutpāda eva ajātireva abhāva eva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavya iti /
K05bsu049_u:8252: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8263: subhūtirāha - syātpunarbhagavan paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo (Vaidya 188)
K05bsu049_u:8264: bhavet? bhagavānāha - syātsubhūte sa paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:8265: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā vā aśrutvā va evaṃ pratipadyeta,
K05bsu049_u:8266: evaṃ visarjayet - avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8267: subhūtirāha - tena hi bhagavan bahavo bodhāya caranti /
K05bsu049_u:8269: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye vyākṛtā avinivartanīyāyāṃ jñānabhūmau /
K05bsu049_u:8272: te te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā uttaptāvaropitakuśalamūlā veditavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8273: te te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃhāryāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena /
K05bsu049_u:8274: sacetpunaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti vyavalokayati,
K05bsu049_u:8276: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:8277: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā traidhātukāya ca spṛhāmanuśaṃsācittaṃ
K05bsu049_u:8278: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:8279: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pyanekaśatāyāḥ parṣado
K05bsu049_u:8281: niṣaṇṇaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvasaṃghapuraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
K05bsu049_u:8283: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:8284: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi vaihāyasamabhyudgamya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati,
K05bsu049_u:8287: ye 'nyāsu dikṣu gatvā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti,
K05bsu049_u:8289: evam api subhūte svapnāntaragatoa'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃjānīte /
K05bsu049_u:8290: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:8291: punaraparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo notrasyati,
K05bsu049_u:8294: grāmaghāte vā nagaraghāte vā nigamaghāte vā janapadaghāte vā rāṣṭraghāte vā agnidāhe
K05bsu049_u:8295: vā vartamāne vyālamṛgān vā tato 'nyān api vā kṣudramṛgajātīn dṛṣṭvā śiraśchede vā
K05bsu049_u:8296: pratyupasthite tato 'nyāny api vā mahābhayabhairavāṇi duḥkhadaurmanasyāni vā prāpya
K05bsu049_u:8297: tato 'nyeṣām api vā sattvānāṃ mahābhayabhairavāṇi duḥkhāni dṛṣṭvā nāsya bhayabhairavamutpadyate,
