K05bsu049_u:8299: tataś ca svapnāntarātprativibuddhasya samanantaravyutthitasyaivaṃ bhavati - svapnopamamidaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukam /
K05bsu049_u:8300: evaṃ ca mayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya samyagdeśayatā dharmo deśayitavya iti /
K05bsu049_u:8301: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:8302: (Vaidya 189) punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svapnāntaragatasya
K05bsu049_u:8303: nairayikān sattvān dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati - tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya
K05bsu049_u:8304: buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve 'pyapāyā na bhaviṣyantīti /
K05bsu049_u:8305: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya apāyapariśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:8306: tatra subhūte kathaṃ vijñāyeta asyāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K05bsu049_u:8307: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ
K05bsu049_u:8309: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi nirayagatāṃstiryakpretagatān vā sattvān dṛṣṭvā smṛtiṃ pratilabhate /
K05bsu049_u:8310: sa tāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabhya evaṃ cintayati - tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya
K05bsu049_u:8311: buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve 'pyapāyā na bhaviṣyantīti /
K05bsu049_u:8312: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya apāyapariśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:8313: idam api subhūte avivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:8314: punaraparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nagaradāhe vā grāmadāhe
K05bsu049_u:8315: vā vartamāne prativibuddhaḥ saṃstataḥ svapnādevaṃ samanvāharati yathā - mayā svapnāntaragatena
K05bsu049_u:8316: ye ākārāḥ yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni dṛṣṭāni,
K05bsu049_u:8318: te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni mama saṃvidyante /
K05bsu049_u:8319: etena satyena satyavacanena ayaṃ nagaradāho vā grāmadāho vā vartamāna upaśāmyatu,
K05bsu049_u:8322: sacetsubhūte grāmadāho vā nagaradāho vā upaśāmyati,
K05bsu049_u:8325: veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairavinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti
K05bsu049_u:8329: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
K05bsu049_u:8330: sacetpunaḥ subhūte so 'gnidāho 'tikramya gṛhādgṛhaṃ rathyāyā rathyāmanyatarānyatarāṃ rathyāṃ vā gṛhaṃ vā gacchati,
K05bsu049_u:8335: veditavyametatsubhūte dharmapratyākhyānaṃ duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena karmopacitam /
K05bsu049_u:8338: ityayaṃ subhūte heturayaṃ pratyayo 'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇatāyā iti /
K05bsu049_u:8339: ayam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:8346: bhagavānetadavocat - sacetsubhūte kaścideva puruṣo vā strī vā dārako vā dārikā vā (Vaidya 190)
K05bsu049_u:8348: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena upasaṃkramya evamadhiṣṭhānaṃ samanvāhartavyam /
K05bsu049_u:8357: ye 'pi te aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:8358: na teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ kiṃcidajñātaṃ vā adṛṣṭaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā asākṣātkṛtaṃ vā anabhisaṃbuddhaṃ vā /
K05bsu049_u:8359: yathā te buddhā bhagavanto jānanto mamādhyāśayam - ityapyahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti /
K05bsu049_u:8360: anena satyena satyavacanena iyaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā yena amanuṣyagraheṇa gṛhīto vā āviṣṭo vā,
K05bsu049_u:8362: sacetso 'manuṣyaḥ evaṃ bhāṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāpakrāmati,
K05bsu049_u:8363: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti
K05bsu049_u:8364: sacetpunaḥ subhūte evaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya so 'manuṣyo 'pakrāmati,
K05bsu049_u:8365: veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti
K05bsu049_u:8369: tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ bhāṣiṣyate - yena satyena satyavacanena
K05bsu049_u:8370: ahaṃ vyākṛtaḥ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05bsu049_u:8372: tatra subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate tasya amanuṣyasyāpakramaṇāya /
K05bsu049_u:8374: māro hyatra pāpīyāṃstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cirayānasaṃprasthitasyāntike balavattaraṃ tejovattaraṃ codyogamāpatsyate - kathamayamamanuṣyo 'pakrāmediti /
K05bsu049_u:8376: evaṃ ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati - mamaiṣo 'nubhāvena amanuṣyo 'pakrānta iti /
K05bsu049_u:8377: na punaḥ sa evaṃ jñāsyati - mārasyaiṣo 'nubhāvena amanuṣyo 'pakrānta iti /
K05bsu049_u:8379: sa tenautsukyena tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate uccagdhayiṣyati ullāpayiṣyati
K05bsu049_u:8380: kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati - ahaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ
K05bsu049_u:8382: sa tena tāvanmātrakeṇa bhūyo mānaṃ janayiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:8391: sa tena mānena atimānena mānātimānena mithyāmānena abhimānena dūrīkariṣyati sarvajñatām,
K05bsu049_u:8397: ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān dṛṣṭvā abhimānamutpādya avamanyamānastathārūpāṇi kalyāṇamitrāṇi na seviṣyate,
K05bsu049_u:8402: tasya dve bhūmī pratikāṅkṣitavye - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
K05bsu049_u:8403: evaṃ subhūte satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyānacirayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya
K05bsu049_u:8406: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārakarma veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:8407: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:8408: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpedeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati?
K05bsu049_u:8409: iha subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ nāmāpadeśenāpi nāmādhiṣṭhānenāpi māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:8410: anyatarānyatareṇa veṣeṇopasaṃkramya evaṃ vakṣyati - tairvyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K05bsu049_u:8418: yāvadāsaptamaṃ mātāmahapitāmahayugasya nāmadheyamudīrayiṣyati - amuṣyāṃ diśi tvaṃ jātaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8419: amuṣmin janapade amuṣmin grāme vā nagare vā (Vaidya 192)
K05bsu049_u:8422: tamenamevaṃ vakṣyati - pūrvam api tvameva mṛduko 'bhūḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8424: tatastamevaṃ vakṣyati - pūrvam api tvaṃ tīkṣṇendriyo 'bhūḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8440: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃstena tena dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇa guṇenādekṣyati - pūrvam api tvamanena cānena ca guṇena samanvāgato 'bhūḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8441: niyatastaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau /
K05bsu049_u:8443: tathā hi te amī evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante /
K05bsu049_u:8445: evaṃ sa tena paurvakeṇa nāmāpadeśena nāmādhiṣṭhānena pratyutpannadhutaguṇasaṃlekhena ca manyanāmutpādayiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:8446: tasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati - vyākṛto 'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05bsu049_u:8448: taṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ vakṣyati - avinivartanīyastvaṃ vyākṛtastathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K05bsu049_u:8450: tathā hi tava ete evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇā saṃvidyante /
K05bsu049_u:8451: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāyīyān kadācidbhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:8462: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati - vyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau
K05bsu049_u:8464: tathā hi te evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:8466: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ guṇā ākhyātāḥ ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni cākhyātāni,
K05bsu049_u:8468: veditavyametatsubhūte tato 'nyairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ - mārādhiṣṭhito batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti /
K05bsu049_u:8470: ye ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
K05bsu049_u:8472: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena nāmādhiṣṭhānena abhimānamutpādayiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:8473: abhimānamutpādya mānābhibhūtaḥ stambhābhibhūto mārādhiṣṭhānenābhibhūtastadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate uccagghayiṣyati ullāpayiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:8474: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmādhiṣṭhānena mārakarma veditavyam //
K05bsu049_u:8475: (Vaidya 193) punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena mārakarma veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:8476: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena mārakarma veditavyam?
K05bsu049_u:8477: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vyākariṣyati
K05bsu049_u:8478: - tavānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
K05bsu049_u:8479: yadeva tena cittenānuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritaṃ bhavati - aho bata me 'nuttarāṃ
K05bsu049_u:8482: tatra duṣprajñajātīyasya anupāyakuśalasya bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati - yathā mayā nāmadheyamanuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritam,
K05bsu049_u:8483: aho bata me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhavediti,
K05bsu049_u:8486: yacca tena māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhinirmitena mārādhiṣṭhitena vā bhikṣuṇā nāmadheyamudīritam,
K05bsu049_u:8487: tadubhayaṃ tulayitvā yathā ca mama cittotpāda utpannaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8488: yathā ca anena bhikṣuṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ sameti nāmnā,
K05bsu049_u:8489: nāmavyākṛto 'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti maṃsyate /
K05bsu049_u:8490: yāni ca mayā subhūte avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmākārā liṅgāni nimittāni ākhyātāni,
K05bsu049_u:8493: sa manyanāmutpādya tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate - ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K05bsu049_u:8495: evaṃ sa tena mānena atimānena mānātimānena abhimānena mithyāmānena ca tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamanyamāno dūrīkariṣyati sarvajñatām,
K05bsu049_u:8500: sacetpunaściraṃ suciraṃ saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmo bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:8510: tāvadgurutaraṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mananāpattisthānam /
K05bsu049_u:8511: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bhikṣoḥ śrāvakayānikasya śrāvakabhūmau catasro mūlāpattayo gurvyo bhavanti,
K05bsu049_u:8515: yaduta nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvamānanayā mahānakuśalaścittotpāda utpannaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8520: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśena mānasahagataścittotpāda utpannaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8521: ayaṃ tebhyaḥ pañcabhya ānantaryebhyaḥ karmabhyo gurutaraścittotpādo veditavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8522: iti hi subhūte anenāpi nāmāpadeśena sūkṣmasūkṣmāṇi mārakarmāṇyutpatsyante /
K05bsu049_u:8526: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati smārayiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:8527: kathaṃ ca subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati smārayiṣyati?
K05bsu049_u:8528: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:8529: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati - vivekasya tathāgato varṇavādī araṇyavanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādiṣu vihartavyamiti /
K05bsu049_u:8530: na cāhaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃvidhaṃ vivekaṃ vadāmi,
K05bsu049_u:8531: yaduta āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni,
K05bsu049_u:8533: subhūtirāha - katamaḥ punaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyo viveko
K05bsu049_u:8534: yadi vā āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni vividhāni vanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādīni?
K05bsu049_u:8537: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto bhavati śrāvakapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8539: evaṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto viharati /
K05bsu049_u:8540: grāmānte 'pi hi viharan prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ sarvasattvamaitrīmahākaruṇāvihāreṇa viharet /
K05bsu049_u:8541: anena vihāreṇa viharan vivikta eva sa viharati /
K05bsu049_u:8542: ayaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktamanasikāraviveko 'nujñātaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8543: anena vivekena viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdivānyatināmayati,
K05bsu049_u:8547: yaṃ punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekamupadekṣyati araṇyavanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānaprāntaśayanāsanavihārān,
K05bsu049_u:8548: sa tena vivekena śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ saṃkīrṇa eva san prajñāpāramitāyāmanabhiyujyamāno na sarvajñajñānaṃ paripūrayati
K05bsu049_u:8549: evaṃ sa saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa viharan so 'pariśuddhena manasikāreṇa viharan apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ eva bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:8550: apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmānta eva saṃstato 'nyān api bodhisattvān mahāsattvān grāmāntavihāriṇo
K05bsu049_u:8552: araṇye 'pi viharan so 'pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ san saṃkīrṇavihāryeva bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:8560: kiṃcāpi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yojanaśatikeṣvaṭavīkāntāreṣu viharedapagatavyālamṛgapakṣisaṃgheṣu
K05bsu049_u:8562: varṣaṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīṃ vā varṣakoṭīśataṃ vā varṣakoṭīsahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā,
K05bsu049_u:8564: imaṃ ca vivekaṃ mayopadiṣṭaṃ na jānīyāt,
K05bsu049_u:8568: naiva me subhūte etāvatā sa bodhisattvaścittamārādhayati /
K05bsu049_u:8570: yaḥ subhūte viveko bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mayā ākhyātaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8571: tena vivekena viharannasmin viveke na saṃdṛśyate /
K05bsu049_u:8572: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramya uparyantarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitvā evaṃ vakṣyati - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K05bsu049_u:8573: eṣa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatena viveka ākhyātaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8576: sa tato vivekātpunareva araṇyādgrāmāntamavatīrya tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
K05bsu049_u:8579: sa evaṃ vakṣyati - saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa bateme āyuṣmanto viharanti,
K05bsu049_u:8583: ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā viviktavihāreṇa viharanti,
K05bsu049_u:8594: eṣa subhūte vihāro yenāhaṃ vihāreṇa viharāmi /
K05bsu049_u:8606: tajjātīyaḥ khaluḥ punaḥ subhūte pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8608: abhimānapatitā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8611: aviśuddhadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalāḥ veditavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8612: anāryā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8613: anāryadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8614: yasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparityaktāḥ sarvasattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8617: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmarthaṃ kartukāmena tajjātīyāḥ pudgalā na sevitavyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8620: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvasattvānāmarthāya abhyutthitena eteṣāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ
K05bsu049_u:8623: tatrāpi tāvanmaitrāyamāṇena karuṇāyamānena mahākaruṇāmutpādya anukampāmupādāya samyakpratipanneṣu
K05bsu049_u:8625: - tathā kariṣyāmi yathā sarve mārakarmadoṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra
K05bsu049_u:8631: ayam api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svayamabhijñāya parākramo veditavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8632: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vivekaguṇena mārakarma veditavyamiti //
K05bsu049_u:8636: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - iha subhūte bodhisattvena
K05bsu049_u:8638: ādita evaṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni /
K05bsu049_u:8639: subhūtirāha - katamāni tāni punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
K05bsu049_u:8640: yāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayasaṃprasthitena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ādita eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni
K05bsu049_u:8641: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - buddhā eva subhūte bhagavantaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8642: ye ca te 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvacaryākuśalāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8645: imāni tāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
K05bsu049_u:8646: prajñāpāramitaiva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:8647: sarvā eva ca subhūte ṣaṭ pāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
K05bsu049_u:8660: ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃvartante /
K05bsu049_u:8662: atra hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā pariniṣṭhitā bhavati yaduta ṣaṭpāramitāsu /
K05bsu049_u:8663: ye 'pi te subhūte atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya parinirvṛtāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8666: ye 'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante,
K05bsu049_u:8669: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvaparimāṇeṣvacintyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti,
K05bsu049_u:8675: aham api subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8679: āsu hi subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā antargatāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8684: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭ pāramitā eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
K05bsu049_u:8697: ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya sarvajñatāyai anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhiprāptaye saṃvartante /
K05bsu049_u:8700: āsu khalu punaḥ subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K05bsu049_u:8701: iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā
K05bsu049_u:8703: arthataś ca dharmataś ca nayataścopaparīkṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā paripraṣṭavyā paripraśnayitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:8705: eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyikā saṃdarśikā avadarśikā janayitrī dhatrī /
K05bsu049_u:8707: prajñāpāramitāvirahitā hi pañca pāramitā na prajñāyante,
K05bsu049_u:8709: tasmāttarhi subhūte aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam
K05bsu049_u:8711: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - asaṅgalakṣaṇā subhūte prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:8712: subhūtirāha - syādbhagavan paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa yenaivāsaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
K05bsu049_u:8715: syātsubhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa yenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
K05bsu049_u:8720: tasmāttarhi subhūte yenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā viviktā śūnyā,
K05bsu049_u:8730: na ca bhagavan viviktaṃ vā śūnyaṃ vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
K05bsu049_u:8735: kathaṃ vā vayaṃ bhagavan asya bhāṣitasyārthamājānīmaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:8738: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase dīrgharātraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāre mamakāre caranti?
K05bsu049_u:8742: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu ahaṃkāramamakārau śūnyau?
K05bsu049_u:8745: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ahaṃkāreṇa mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti?
K05bsu049_u:8748: ahaṃkāreṇa mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti /
K05bsu049_u:8749: bhagavānāha - evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaḥ prajñāyate /
K05bsu049_u:8756: evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvasattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate /
K05bsu049_u:8760: evaṃ khalu subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
K05bsu049_u:8761: evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate /
K05bsu049_u:8762: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadidaṃ sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate /
K05bsu049_u:8763: evaṃ ca bhagavaṃścaran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
K05bsu049_u:8764: evaṃ hi caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
K05bsu049_u:8765: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
K05bsu049_u:8767: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'navamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena /
K05bsu049_u:8768: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ caryāmabhibhavati,
K05bsu049_u:8771: anabhibhūtaṃ hi bhagavan buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam /
K05bsu049_u:8772: anenāpi bhagavan manasikāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdinānyatināmayet,
K05bsu049_u:8775: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:8776: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
K05bsu049_u:8777: evaṃ hi caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
K05bsu049_u:8778: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
K05bsu049_u:8780: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'navamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena /
K05bsu049_u:8781: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ caryāmabhibhavati,
K05bsu049_u:8784: anabhibhūtaṃ hi subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam /
K05bsu049_u:8785: anenāpi subhūte manasikāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdinānyatināmayet,
K05bsu049_u:8788: sacetkhalu punaḥ subhūte ye jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8792: yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhanto yāvajjīvaṃ sarvatathāgatān satkuryurgurukuryurmānayeyuḥ pūjayeyurarcayeyurapacāyeyuḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8795: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ?
K05bsu049_u:8798: bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K05bsu049_u:8801: yathā yathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai rātriṃdivaṃ viharati,
K05bsu049_u:8804: tathā hi subhūte nāsti tadanyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tādṛśaṃ maitrīsahagataṃ cittam,
K05bsu049_u:8810: acintyadharmasamanvāgatā hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ //
K05bsu049_u:8811: kathaṃ ca subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tāvattatpuṇyamabhinirharati?
K05bsu049_u:8812: tādṛśyā subhūte prajñayā samanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:8813: yādṛśyā prajñayā samanvāgato vadhyagatāniva sarvasattvān paśyati /
K05bsu049_u:8815: sa divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokayan aprameyānasaṃkhyeyānaparimeyānaparimāṇān sattvānānantaryakarmasamanvāgatān paśyati,
K05bsu049_u:8816: akṣaṇaprāptāṃś ca vihanyamānāṃś ca dṛṣṭijālapraticchannāṃś ca mārgamapratilabhamānān /
K05bsu049_u:8819: tasya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahān saṃvega utpadyate /
K05bsu049_u:8820: te cāsya sarvasattvāstayā mahāmaitryā tayā ca mahākaruṇayā sphāritvā manasikṛtā bhavanti - ahameteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:8822: na ca tena vā anyena vā nimittena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati /
K05bsu049_u:8823: ayam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahān prajñāloko 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
K05bsu049_u:8824: anena hi subhūte vihāreṇa viharanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvalokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ parigṛhṇanti,
K05bsu049_u:8826: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca paribhuñjate cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān,
K05bsu049_u:8828: teṣāṃ dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca dānadakṣiṇāṃ viśodhayanti /
K05bsu049_u:8830: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena amoghaṃ rāṣṭraṃ piṇḍaṃ paribhoktukāmena
K05bsu049_u:8831: sarvasattvānāṃ mārgamupadeṣṭukāmena vipulamavabhāsaṃ kartukāmena saṃsāragatān sattvān
K05bsu049_u:8840: tathā ca kartavyaṃ yathāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai rātriṃdivāni kṣapayet /
K05bsu049_u:8841: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kenacideva puruṣeṇa maṇiratnajñāne vartamānena maṇiratnajātijñena apratilabdhapūrvaṃ mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet
K05bsu049_u:8842: sa tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabhya mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:8845: tasya satatasamitaṃ tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ prati saṃyuktā eva manasikārāḥ pravarteran - aho batāhaṃ tena (Vaidya 201)
K05bsu049_u:8846: mahāmaṇiratnena viprayukta iti hi sa puruṣastasya mahāmaṇiratnasya na vismaret yāvat tadvā anyadvā tadguṇaṃ tajjātikaṃ tena mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:8850: yāvatsā vā anyā vā pratilabdhā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:8852: subhūtirāha - yatpunarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ sarvamanasikārāḥ svabhāvena virahitāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
K05bsu049_u:8853: tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairavirahito bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:8854: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ manasi karoti - sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena viviktāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8862: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
K05bsu049_u:8863: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vivardhamānayā prajñāpāramitayā bodhaye samudāgacchati,
K05bsu049_u:8865: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate vā parihīyate vā /
K05bsu049_u:8867: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
K05bsu049_u:8872: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
K05bsu049_u:8878: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate na saṃsīdati,
K05bsu049_u:8880: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitā carati prajñāpāramitāyām?
K05bsu049_u:8882: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan yā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā,
K05bsu049_u:8885: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra prajñāpāramitāśūnyatāyāḥ sa kaściddharma upalabhyate,
K05bsu049_u:8888: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatā carati prajñāpāramitāyām?
K05bsu049_u:8890: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyāṃ sa kaściddharma upalabhyate yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
K05bsu049_u:8892: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatā carati śūnyatāyām?
K05bsu049_u:8894: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan rūpaṃ carati prajñāpāramitāyām? (Vaidya 202)
K05bsu049_u:8896: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8899: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ kaścidupalabhyate,
K05bsu049_u:8902: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8906: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ punarbhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
K05bsu049_u:8907: evamukte - bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
K05bsu049_u:8909: bhagavānāha - samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yatra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati?
K05bsu049_u:8911: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmo 'nupalambhaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8913: api nu sa eva dharma utpanno vā utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā,
K05bsu049_u:8914: niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā?
K05bsu049_u:8916: bhagavānāha - evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntirevaṃrūpā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:8917: evaṃrūpayā ca subhūte kṣāntyā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K05bsu049_u:8918: iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya vaiśāradyapratipad yāṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05bsu049_u:8919: evaṃ caran evaṃ ghaṭamānaḥ evaṃ vyāyacchamāno 'nuttaraṃ buddhajñānaṃ sarvajñajñānaṃ
K05bsu049_u:8924: subhūtirāha - kathamasyedānīṃ bhagavan dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K05bsu049_u:8925: bhagavānāha - kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K05bsu049_u:8927: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo vyākṛto vyākariṣyate vyākriyate vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K05bsu049_u:8933: sarvadharmeṣu bhagavan anupalabhyamāneṣu na me evaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ dharmo 'bhisaṃbudhyate,
K05bsu049_u:8939: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
K05bsu049_u:8940: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:8942: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:8948: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:8949: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:8950: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:8951: na te kauśika sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:8953: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:8956: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu te sattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ?
K05bsu049_u:8959: bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K05bsu049_u:8961: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:8962: asya kauśika puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakāṇāṃ jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ śīlamayaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
K05bsu049_u:8963: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
K05bsu049_u:8964: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate,
K05bsu049_u:8965: yena kuśalamūlena sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:8967: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati //
K05bsu049_u:8968: atha khalvanyataro bhikṣuḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - abhibhūto 'si kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:8969: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:8970: evamukte śakro devānāmindrastaṃ bhikṣumetadavocat - ekacittotpādenaiva ahamārya tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā abhibhūtaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8971: kaḥ punarvādo ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:8972: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati (Vaidya 204)
K05bsu049_u:8974: kaḥ punarvādo ye śrutvā udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya likhitvā tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
K05bsu049_u:8977: te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8978: na kevalaṃ te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:8980: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8981: na kevalaṃ srotaāpannān sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhataḥ pratyekabuddhānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:8982: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahādānapatayaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8983: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8984: na kevalaṃ tān mahādānapatīn bodhisattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:8985: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā pariśuddhaśīlā akhaṇḍena śīlaskandhenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa
K05bsu049_u:8986: paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8987: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8988: na kevalamakhaṇḍenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:8989: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣāntisaṃpannā upaśamasaṃpannā apratihatacittā antato dagdhasthūṇāyāmapyāghātacittaṃ notpādayanti prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8990: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8992: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ārabdhavīryā anikṣiptadhurā akusīdā anavalīnakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8993: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8995: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānārāmā dhyānaratā dhyānabalino dhyānabalavanto dhyānapratiṣṭhitā dhyānavaśinaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:8996: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:8997: yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuralokaṃ sarvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānanupāyakuśalāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9000: yo hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05bsu049_u:9002: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñavaṃśasyānupacchedāya sthito bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:9004: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ pratipadyamāno nacirādgamiṣyati bodhimaṇḍam /
K05bsu049_u:9005: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sattvān kleśapaṅke saṃsīdamānānuddhariṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:9006: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:9009: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ (Vaidya 205)
K05bsu049_u:9010: catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣasva,
K05bsu049_u:9012: imāni te catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena pratigrahītavyānīti /
K05bsu049_u:9013: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kevalaṃ catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K05bsu049_u:9016: tathāgatair api so 'rhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairnityameva samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9017: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yāni kānicillaukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramikāṇi vā anyāni vā utpadyeran,
K05bsu049_u:9018: tānyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ notpatsyante /
K05bsu049_u:9019: ayam api bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhavati //
K05bsu049_u:9020: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhavat - kimayaṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ svakena pratibhānena bhāṣate,
K05bsu049_u:9022: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - buddhānubhāvo 'yamāryānanda veditavyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9026: evam etat yathā śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa bhāṣitam /
K05bsu049_u:9033: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - yasmin khalu punarānanda samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:9036: tasmin ānanda samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9037: te sarve saṃśayitā bhavanti - kimayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā,
K05bsu049_u:9039: punaraparamānanda tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ śokaśalyaviddhā bhavanti yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati
K05bsu049_u:9040: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05bsu049_u:9043: tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya viheṭhāmupasaṃharanti,
K05bsu049_u:9046: digdāhānupadarśayanti - apyeva nāma ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valīyeta vā romaharṣo vā asya bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:9048: tatra ānanda na sarvasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9051: ānanda āha - kiyadrūpasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upasaṃkrāmati māraḥ pāpīyān viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:9052: bhagavānāha - yena ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmadhimukticittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9053: asya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9055: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ saṃśayaprāpto bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9058: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9060: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9062: sa gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na śṛṇoti,
K05bsu049_u:9065: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9067: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saddharmaparigrāhakamālīno bhavati - eṣa mama sahāyakaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9069: bahavo 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mamānye 'pi sahāyakāḥ santi /
K05bsu049_u:9071: ayaṃ tu mayā pratirūpaḥ sahāyo labdhaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9073: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9075: (Vaidya 207) punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmanyaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ vadet - gambhīrā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:9077: na hyevamatra yujyamānamanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitam /
K05bsu049_u:9081: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9083: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyān bodhisattvānavamanyate - ahaṃ vivekavihāreṇa viharāmi,
K05bsu049_u:9086: tasminnānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9090: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā dhutaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ vā bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9091: evaṃ sa tāvanmātrakeṇa tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān kalyāṇadharmaṇo 'vamanyate /
K05bsu049_u:9092: te ca tasya guṇā na saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9093: ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ guṇāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9094: te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tasya na saṃvidyante /
K05bsu049_u:9097: parān paṃsayati - na khalvete teṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyante,
K05bsu049_u:9099: tatra mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmevaṃ bhavati - na śūnyāni mārabhavanāni bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:9101: mahānirayāstiryañcaḥ pretaviṣayā āsurāś ca kāyā utsadā bhaviṣyantīti /
K05bsu049_u:9103: yathā te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ pravṛttā adhyākrāntā lābhasatkāreṇa bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:9106: teṣāṃ ca sa mahājanaḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyate /
K05bsu049_u:9111: evaṃ te na tathatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā na tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānāḥ saṃkleśaṃ vivardhayiṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:9112: evaṃ te viparyastayā cittasaṃtatyā yadyadeva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
K05bsu049_u:9117: imamapyānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati //
K05bsu049_u:9118: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayati,
K05bsu049_u:9120: samaye mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavati - dūrīkariṣyati batāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvajñatām,
K05bsu049_u:9121: atidūre sthāsyati sarvajñatāyāḥ sacetpunarbodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'nyena bodhisattvayānikena
K05bsu049_u:9122: pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośati paribhāṣate vyāpadyate doṣamutpādayati,
K05bsu049_u:9123: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān bhūyasyā mātrayā tuṣṭo bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9125: evaṃ cāsya bhavati - ubhāvapyetau bodhisattvau dūre sthāsyataḥ sarvajñatāyā iti //
K05bsu049_u:9126: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛto 'vyākṛtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ kalahāyet vivadet vigṛhṇīyāt ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayet,
K05bsu049_u:9128: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittotpāde tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9130: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ kiṃcinniḥsaraṇam,
K05bsu049_u:9131: utāho tāvata eva kalpānavaśyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:9132: bhagavānāha - saniḥsaraṇamānanda mayā dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānām /
K05bsu049_u:9133: tatra ānanda yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya na pratideśayati,
K05bsu049_u:9138: avaśyaṃ tena ānanda pudgalena punareva tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9139: yaḥ punarānanda bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya
K05bsu049_u:9141: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayati - yena mayā sarvasattvānāṃ vigrahā vivādā virodhā utsārayitavyā nidhyāpayitavyāḥ praśamayitavyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9146: so 'haṃ pareṣu tvamity api vācaṃ bhāṣe,
K05bsu049_u:9147: paruṣaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vā prativaco dadāmi /
K05bsu049_u:9150: parato duruktāni durāgatāni durbhāṣitāni bhāṣyamāṇāni śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:9155: yadahaṃ pareṣa doṣāntaram api śrotavyaṃ manye /
K05bsu049_u:9161: na ca mayā svaparāddheṣv api pareṣu vyāpattavyam /
K05bsu049_u:9165: na ca mayā jīvitāntarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9169: evaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikānām api pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam,
K05bsu049_u:9172: kathaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena apareṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam?
K05bsu049_u:9174: ete mama bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śāstāra ityevaṃ sthātavyam /
K05bsu049_u:9187: evaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyo na bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9192: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kva punarbhagavan śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate?
K05bsu049_u:9193: bhagavānāha - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:9195: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau /
K05bsu049_u:9198: subhūtirāha - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām,
K05bsu049_u:9199: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām?
K05bsu049_u:9200: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām
K05bsu049_u:9201: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāmiti?
K05bsu049_u:9202: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
K05bsu049_u:9208: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
K05bsu049_u:9209: api nu sā utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā jāyate vā bhavati vā vibhavati vā vivicyate vā rajyate vā virajyate vā ākāśībhavati vā dharmībhavati vā?
K05bsu049_u:9211: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
K05bsu049_u:9214: bhagavānāha - tasmāttarhi subhūte evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ na tathatā kṣīyate ityevaṃ śikṣate /
K05bsu049_u:9215: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām /
K05bsu049_u:9222: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāmanuprāpsyati /
K05bsu049_u:9223: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyo māreṇa vā māraparṣadā vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhimarditum /
K05bsu049_u:9225: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣatsyati /
K05bsu049_u:9226: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake gocare carati /
K05bsu049_u:9227: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate nāthakarakeṣu dharmeṣu,
K05bsu049_u:9232: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate triparivartasya dvādaśākārasya dharmacakrasya pravartanāya /
K05bsu049_u:9233: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadhātuṃ nonīkariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
K05bsu049_u:9234: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatavaṃśasyānupacchedāya śikṣate /
K05bsu049_u:9235: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'mṛtadhātudvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
K05bsu049_u:9238: na hi alpasthāmnā śakyamasyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitum /
K05bsu049_u:9245: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nirayeṣūpapadyate,
K05bsu049_u:9254: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāndho bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9276: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prāṇātipātī bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9287: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate,
K05bsu049_u:9292: asti hi tasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
K05bsu049_u:9293: tatpunaḥ subhūte upāyakauśalyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya katamat?
K05bsu049_u:9296: yathā anyenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:9298: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
K05bsu049_u:9302: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā evaṃ prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9303: tatkatamasya bhagavan dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
K05bsu049_u:9307: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:9310: evaṃ subhūte prakṛtipariśuddheṣu sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya yā asaṃsīdanatā anavalīnatā,
K05bsu049_u:9312: evaṃ subhūte bālapṛthagjanā enān dharmānajānanto 'paśyanto dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ na jānanti,
K05bsu049_u:9317: vayamevamapaśyakān sattvān paśyayiṣyāmaḥ ityatra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante /
K05bsu049_u:9318: atra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā balānyanuprāpnuvanti,
K05bsu049_u:9321: evaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cittacaritavispanditāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti /
K05bsu049_u:9323: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakāste mahāpṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpradeśāḥ ye 'pagatapāṣāṇāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9324: yatra suvarṇaṃ vā jātarūpaṃ vā rajataṃ votpadyate /
K05bsu049_u:9327: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9329: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9331: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9333: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9335: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9338: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9340: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9342: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9344: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9346: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9348: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9350: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9352: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9354: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9356: tasmāttarhi subhūte alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9360: (Vaidya 213) tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpatarakebhyastathatvāya pratipadyamānebhyo 'lpatamāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyante /
K05bsu049_u:9361: tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpatamebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānebhyo 'lpatamāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9363: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ya ete 'lpatamebhyo 'lpatamā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9364: teṣu gaṇanāṃ gantukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K05bsu049_u:9366: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya na khilasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:9374: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitā saṃgṛhītā bhavanti,
K05bsu049_u:9378: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭau dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatānyantargatāni bhavanti,
K05bsu049_u:9379: evameva subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasyāṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:9380: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye pravartamāne sarvāṇīndriyāṇyantargatāni bhavanti,
K05bsu049_u:9381: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya sarvakuśalā dharmā antargatā bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:9382: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvāṇīndriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti,
K05bsu049_u:9383: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ajñāne niruddhe sarve 'kuśalā dharmā niruddhā bhavanti,
K05bsu049_u:9384: sarvāś ca tadanyāḥ pāramitā antargatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:9385: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:9386: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmagratāyāṃ śikṣate /
K05bsu049_u:9389: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhyamāṇāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9391: subhūtirāha - jāmbūdvīpakā eva tāvadbhagavan bahavaḥ sattvā bhavanti,
K05bsu049_u:9392: kaḥ punarvādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9393: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte eko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhaṃstān sarvasattvān cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
K05bsu049_u:9394: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
K05bsu049_u:9397: bhagavānāha - ataḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K05bsu049_u:9400: evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā /
K05bsu049_u:9401: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
K05bsu049_u:9405: lokadhātau dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:9406: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāhaṃ tāṃ saṃpattiṃ samanupaśyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:9408: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śrāvakasaṃpattir api tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:9409: bhagavānāha - śrāvakasaṃpattir api subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:9410: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakasaṃpatyāṃ sthāsyāmīti śikṣate,
K05bsu049_u:9416: na ca prativahati - mayāpyete śrāvakaguṇā deśayitavyāḥ prakāśayitavyā iti śikṣate /
K05bsu049_u:9417: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati /
K05bsu049_u:9418: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāṃstato 'nyān dakṣiṇīyān śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān pratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktāṃścābhibhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9420: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati,
K05bsu049_u:9422: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'parihāṇadharmā aparihāṇadharmeti veditavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9426: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā imāṃ sarvajñatāmāhariṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:9429: atha tām api prajñāpāramitāṃ na saṃjānīte - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā,
K05bsu049_u:9431: evam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte,
K05bsu049_u:9438: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - caranneva tāvadayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānabhibhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9439: kaḥ punarvādo yadā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:9444: spṛhaṇīyāste sattvā ye sattvasārā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante //
K05bsu049_u:9445: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya puṣpāṇāmañjaliṃ kṛtvā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhyavākirat,
K05bsu049_u:9446: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - yairbodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam - anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmahe,
K05bsu049_u:9447: abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān mahatā saṃsārārṇavenohyamānān same pārime tīre pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
K05bsu049_u:9454: yatte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahākaruṇayā samanvāgatā vivarteran anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
K05bsu049_u:9455: na me bhagavan ekacittotpādo 'pyutpadyate yatte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9457: iti yadbhūyasyā mātrayā praṇidhiṃ janayiṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9459: tayā mahākaruṇayā arthakāmā hitakāmā hi te sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyānukampakāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9460: ye imairevaṃrūpaiścittotpādaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kimiti vayaṃ tīrṇāḥ sattvāṃstārayema,
K05bsu049_u:9465: yasteṣāṃ bhagavan prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cittotpādānanumodate,
K05bsu049_u:9468: kiyatsa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
K05bsu049_u:9469: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sumeroḥ parvatarājasya palāgreṇa tulyamānasya pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
K05bsu049_u:9470: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
K05bsu049_u:9471: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
K05bsu049_u:9472: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
K05bsu049_u:9473: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
K05bsu049_u:9474: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
K05bsu049_u:9476: dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
K05bsu049_u:9477: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
K05bsu049_u:9478: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
K05bsu049_u:9479: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum //
K05bsu049_u:9480: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mārādhiṣṭhitāste bhagavan sattvā veditavyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9481: ye bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāmevamaprameyamanumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyamiti na śṛṇvanti,
K05bsu049_u:9487: mārabhavanebhyaś ca te bhagavan sattvāścyutā bhaviṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:9490: mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi tairbhagavan ime cittotpādā abhinirhṛtāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9499: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:9504: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittopādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
K05bsu049_u:9509: yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
K05bsu049_u:9519: na ca te amanaāpāni rūpāṇi drakṣyanti [NOTE:
K05bsu049_u:9520: Conze translates “nor hear any unpleasant sounds“] /
K05bsu049_u:9521: na ca te amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti /
K05bsu049_u:9522: na ca te amanaāpān rasān paribhokṣyante /
K05bsu049_u:9523: na ca te amanaāpāni spraṣṭavyāni sprakṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:9528: sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni yair api bhagavaṃśchandamutpādya bodhaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ
K05bsu049_u:9536: yena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9537: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ
K05bsu049_u:9538: tāṃścittotpādānanumodya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni bhavanti,
K05bsu049_u:9540: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ ca bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
K05bsu049_u:9541: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyopamaṃ cittam?
K05bsu049_u:9543: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyām?
K05bsu049_u:9545: nāhaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ nāpi māyāṃ samanupaśyāmi /
K05bsu049_u:9546: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yanna māyāṃ nāpi māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi,
K05bsu049_u:9547: tatkiṃ tvamanyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
K05bsu049_u:9549: nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:9551: so 'haṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmasamanuśyan katamaṃ dharmamupadekṣyāmi astīti vā nāstīti vā?
K05bsu049_u:9553: na so 'stīti vā nāstīti vā upaiti /
K05bsu049_u:9557: na hi bhagavan asaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
K05bsu049_u:9562: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tyantaviviktāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
K05bsu049_u:9566: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan viviktena viviktamabhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:9567: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
K05bsu049_u:9575: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
K05bsu049_u:9581: tathā gambhīre bhagavan arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9586: taṃ cārthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā //
K05bsu049_u:9590: tathā hi bhagavan sa eva dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt,
K05bsu049_u:9593: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
K05bsu049_u:9600: āsannā me 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti sacedevamati na samanupaśyati,
K05bsu049_u:9602: dūrīkṛtā me śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmirveti sacedasyaivam api na bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:9604: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya naivaṃ bhavati - kasyacidahamāsannaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9608: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarāṃ samyaksabodhirmamāsannā,
K05bsu049_u:9609: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
K05bsu049_u:9612: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati - māyākāro mamāsannaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9613: yaḥ punaranyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūra iti /
K05bsu049_u:9616: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
K05bsu049_u:9617: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
K05bsu049_u:9620: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati - yenārambaṇena pratibhāsa utpadyate tanmamāsanne,
K05bsu049_u:9621: ye tu khalu punaratra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūra iti /
K05bsu049_u:9624: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
K05bsu049_u:9625: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
K05bsu049_u:9628: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatasya kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā na saṃvidyate,
K05bsu049_u:9631: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate /
K05bsu049_u:9636: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena yo nirmitako nirmitaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9637: na tasyaivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre,
K05bsu049_u:9641: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre,
K05bsu049_u:9645: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9650: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
K05bsu049_u:9655: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā dārumayī strī vā puruṣo vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛto bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:9661: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
K05bsu049_u:9669: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati,
K05bsu049_u:9671: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati,
K05bsu049_u:9673: atha khalu saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāmetadabhavat - namaskartavyāste sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9678: anenāpi paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9681: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtisteṣāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāṃ cetasaiva
K05bsu049_u:9682: cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tāni saṃbahulāni kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇyāmantrayante
K05bsu049_u:9683: sma - nedaṃ devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaram,
K05bsu049_u:9685: idaṃ tu devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaraṃ caiva paramaduṣkaraṃ caiva,
K05bsu049_u:9686: yadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyānapramāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante /
K05bsu049_u:9687: te ca sattvā atyantatayā na saṃvidyante,
K05bsu049_u:9691: evaṃ ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ sattvān vineṣyāma iti,
K05bsu049_u:9692: ākāśaṃ sa devaputrā vinetavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ sattvān vinetavyān manyeta /
K05bsu049_u:9695: anena devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9697: ākāśena na sa devaputrāḥ sārdhaṃ veditavyaṃ manyeta,
K05bsu049_u:9698: yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhavyaṃ manyeta /
K05bsu049_u:9699: ayaṃ ca saṃnāho bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9703: sacedatraivaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
K05bsu049_u:9711: evaṃ devaputrāḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati /
K05bsu049_u:9714: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati?
K05bsu049_u:9717: anena bhagavan kāranena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati /
K05bsu049_u:9725: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne nirdiśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
K05bsu049_u:9735: evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti /
K05bsu049_u:9736: bhagavānāha - na kevalaṃ subhūte evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti,
K05bsu049_u:9737: ye 'pi te subhūte brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā
K05bsu049_u:9738: apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā
K05bsu049_u:9739: bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9740: te 'pi subhūte taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ evaṃ carantaṃ namasyanti /
K05bsu049_u:9741: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:9742: te 'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmevaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā paśyanti /
K05bsu049_u:9743: te ca subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamanugṛhṇanti,
K05bsu049_u:9745: ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanugṛhyante samanvāhriyante,
K05bsu049_u:9746: te te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9747: na ca teṣāmantarāyā utpatsyante mārato vā anyato vā /
K05bsu049_u:9751: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte /
K05bsu049_u:9752: te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9753: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvā mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9754: yāvanta subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9756: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte,
K05bsu049_u:9757: te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9758: dvābhyāṃ subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ
K05bsu049_u:9761: sarvadharmāś ca anena śūnyatāto vyavalokitā bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:9762: (Vaidya 222) ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ
K05bsu049_u:9763: aparābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9767: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9768: evaṃ carataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya devā apyupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
K05bsu049_u:9772: utsāhaṃ cāsya vardhayiṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /
K05bsu049_u:9773: tasmāttarhi kulaputra anenaiva vihāreṇa vihara yaduta prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
K05bsu049_u:9775: etenaiva hi tvaṃ kulaputra vihāreṇa viharan anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasi,
K05bsu049_u:9785: evaṃ te devaputrāstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyotsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:9787: etena hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye te 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:9788: te 'pi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharatastasya
K05bsu049_u:9789: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatasya yaduta prajñāpāramitāviharaṇaguṇaiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9790: buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K05bsu049_u:9792: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ahametarhi ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
K05bsu049_u:9793: śikhino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
K05bsu049_u:9794: udānaṃ codānayāmi apareṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
K05bsu049_u:9795: ya etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
K05bsu049_u:9796: evameva subhūte te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto ye etarhi iha mama buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
K05bsu049_u:9798: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K05bsu049_u:9800: subhūtirāha - kiṃ sarveṣāmeva bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K05bsu049_u:9803: na subhūte sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ (Vaidya 223)
K05bsu049_u:9805: kiṃ tarhi subhūte ye te 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasaṅgavigatāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9806: teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K05bsu049_u:9808: subhūtirāha - santi bhagavan avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā tato 'nye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9809: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K05bsu049_u:9811: bhagavānāha - santi subhūte pratipakṣabalino bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā,
K05bsu049_u:9812: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K05bsu049_u:9815: ye etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caranti,
K05bsu049_u:9817: ime te subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
K05bsu049_u:9818: sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ
K05bsu049_u:9821: ye 'pi te subhūte ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti,
K05bsu049_u:9823: ime 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
K05bsu049_u:9824: sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ
K05bsu049_u:9827: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvadharmā anutpattikā ityadhimuñcanti,
K05bsu049_u:9831: anenāpi subhūte vihāreṇa viharatāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K05bsu049_u:9833: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K05bsu049_u:9839: yeṣāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ te buddhā
K05bsu049_u:9840: bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ na rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K05bsu049_u:9843: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:9847: evametadyathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitamityadhimucya vistareṇa śroṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:9849: imāṃ vayaṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādvistareṇa śṛṇuyāmeti,
K05bsu049_u:9850: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ ye cāsya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
K05bsu049_u:9852: te 'pyenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmadhimucyamānā yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitā tathā cādhimokṣyante,
K05bsu049_u:9854: evaṃ subhūte bahukaraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇam api vadāmi,
K05bsu049_u:9858: tathatvāya sthitvā tathatvāya pratipadya tiṣṭhanti tathatāyām /
K05bsu049_u:9859: tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhantaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti //
K05bsu049_u:9860: subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavaṃstathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate,
K05bsu049_u:9861: tadā ko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ sthāsyati tathatāyām,
K05bsu049_u:9864: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi - yadā tathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate,
K05bsu049_u:9880: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:9884: na ca nāma bhagavan kaściddharmastathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati,
K05bsu049_u:9890: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9891: yeṣāmevaṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu na bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:9893: sarvadharmeṣu kauśika śūnyeṣu kasyātra kāṅkṣāyitatā vā bhavati dhandhāyitatā vā bhavati?
K05bsu049_u:9897: tadyathāpi nāma antarīkṣe iṣuḥ kṣipto naiva kvacitsajjati,
K05bsu049_u:9899: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kaccidahaṃ bhagavan subhūtiṃ sthaviramārabhya evaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ evaṃ nirdiśaṃstathāgatasyoktavādī bhavāmi dharmavādī ca,
K05bsu049_u:9902: tvaṃ kauśika evaṃ bhāṣase - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
K05bsu049_u:9903: evaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ evaṃ nirdiśaṃstathāgatasyoktavādī bhavasi dharmavādī ca,
K05bsu049_u:9906: yadyadeva hi kauśika subhūteḥ sthavirasya pratibhāti,
K05bsu049_u:9909: subhūtirhi kauśika sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitām api tāvanna samanupaśyati,
K05bsu049_u:9928: sarvadharmaviviktavihāreṇa sarvadharmānupalambhavihāreṇa hi kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviro viharati /
K05bsu049_u:9929: yaḥ khalu punarayaṃ kauśika subhūteḥ sthavirasya sarvadharmaviviktavihāraḥ sarvadharmānupalambhavihāraśca,
K05bsu049_u:9930: eṣa kauśika vihāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharataḥ śatatamīm api kalaṃ nopaiti /
K05bsu049_u:9931: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
K05bsu049_u:9932: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
K05bsu049_u:9933: tathāgatavihāraṃ hi kauśika sthāpayitvā tato 'nyān sarvān vihārānabhibhavatyayaṃ vihāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9934: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharato vihāraḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9947: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharato vihāraḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9948: tasmāttarhi kauśika sarvasattvānāmagratāṃ gantukāmena śreṣṭhatāṃ gantukāmena jyeṣṭhatāṃ
K05bsu049_u:9949: gantukāmena varatāṃ gantukāmena pravaratāṃ gantukāmena praṇītatāṃ gantukāmena uttamatāṃ
K05bsu049_u:9950: gantukāmena anuttamatāṃ gantukāmena niruttaratāṃ gantukāmena asamatāṃ gantukāmena
K05bsu049_u:9951: asamasamatāṃ gantukāmena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā anena vihāreṇa vihartavyam,
K05bsu049_u:9952: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ viharatāṃ vihāra iti //
K05bsu049_u:9956: atha khalu tasmin samaye 'nyataro devaputrastrāyastriṃśairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ māndāravāṇi mahāmāndāravāṇi ca puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K05bsu049_u:9957: ṣaṣṭhaṃ śataṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ tasminneva samaye tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaṃ cābhūt /
K05bsu049_u:9958: te utthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsānyuttarāsaṅgāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayāmāsuḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9959: teṣā bhikṣūṇāṃ buddhānubhāvena te 'ñjalipragrahā māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ paripūrṇā abhūvan /
K05bsu049_u:9963: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - vayaṃ bhagavan asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:9964: vayaṃ bhagavan anena anuttareṇa prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihāriṣyāma iti //
K05bsu049_u:9965: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarot /
K05bsu049_u:9966: dharmatā khalu punareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām - yadā smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti,
K05bsu049_u:9967: atha tadā nānāvarṇā anekavarṇā raśmayo bhagavato mukhadvārānniścaranti - tadyathā nīlapītalohitāvadātamāñjiṣṭhasphaṭikarajatasuvarṇavarṇāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9968: te niścarya anantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā avabhāsya yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhanyantardhīyante //
K05bsu049_u:9969: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
K05bsu049_u:9970: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocat
K05bsu049_u:9971: - nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti /
K05bsu049_u:9974: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - idamānanda bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ śatamanāgate 'dhvani tārakopame kalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
K05bsu049_u:9977: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ śāstāro loke bhaviṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:9978: teṣāṃ khalu punarānanda avakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ samaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:9979: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmavakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ samamevāyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati viṃśatikalpasahasrāṇi /
K05bsu049_u:9980: sarveṣāmeva caikaikasya vaistārikaṃ pravacanaṃ bhaviṣyati pṛthuvaipulyaprāptaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu /
K05bsu049_u:9983: sarve ca te yato yata eva grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīto 'bhiniṣkramiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:9985: pravartya ca yatra yatra ca vihariṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:9986: yato yataś ca yatra yatraiva ca pravekṣanti,
K05bsu049_u:9987: yena yena ca yato yata eva cābhiniṣkramiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:9988: tatastatastatra tatra teṣāṃ praviśatāmabhiniṣkrāmatāṃ viharatāṃ ca pañcavarṇikānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ puṣpavarṣāḥ pravartiṣyante /
K05bsu049_u:9989: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvairmahāsattvairuttamena vihāreṇa vihartukāmaiḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa (Vaidya 227)
K05bsu049_u:9992: ye hi kecidānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:9993: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - manuṣyebhya evaite cyutā bhaviṣyanti /
K05bsu049_u:9994: te ihopapannāstuṣitebhya eva vā devanikāyebhyaścyutā bhaviṣyanti manuṣyeṣvevopapannāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:9996: tathā hi manuṣyeṣu tuṣiteṣu ca deveṣu iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa pracariṣyatīti /
K05bsu049_u:9997: tathāgatāvalokitāḥ khalu punarānanda te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10000: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
K05bsu049_u:10002: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya
K05bsu049_u:10003: antaśo likhitvā bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavavadiṣyanti anuśāsiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti
K05bsu049_u:10005: avaropitakuśalamūlāste ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāstathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu /
K05bsu049_u:10006: na kevalaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmantike taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum,
K05bsu049_u:10007: niḥsaṃśayaṃ khalu punarānanda tathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10010: ye ca ānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
K05bsu049_u:10012: niṣṭhā ānanda tatra gantavyā - saṃmukhībhūtāste abhūvan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmiti /
K05bsu049_u:10021: kiṃcāpyānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike kuśalamūlamavaropitam,
K05bsu049_u:10022: evaṃ hi tanna śrāvakapratyekabuddhatvāya dāsyati vipākam /
K05bsu049_u:10023: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na visaṃvādayiṣyati praṇidhānam,
K05bsu049_u:10024: api tu khalu punarānanda prāyeṇa tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṛtajñena bhavitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatā /
K05bsu049_u:10025: tasmāttarhi te ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā
K05bsu049_u:10026: akṣarasaṃnipātādudgrahaṇāya dhāraṇāya vācanāya paryavāptaye pravartanāya cirasthitaye
K05bsu049_u:10028: sacettvamānanda yo mayā te dharmo deśitaḥ sākṣāt sthāpayitvā prajñāpāramitām,
K05bsu049_u:10031: na me tvamānanda etāvatā aparāddhaḥ syāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10032: yatkhalu punastvamānanda prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ vā padasāmantakaṃ vā nāśayeḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10041: na mānito na pūjito nārcito nāpacāyitaḥ syām /
K05bsu049_u:10042: ye 'pi (Vaidya 228) te ānanda atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10043: te 'pi tvayā ānanda na satkṛtā na gurukṛtā na mānitā na pūjitā nārcitā nāpacāyitā bhavanti /
K05bsu049_u:10050: uktametadānanda tathāgatena - prajñāpāramitā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī sarvajñatāyā āhāriketi /
K05bsu049_u:10051: tasmāttarhi ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi te imāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
K05bsu049_u:10064: sumanasikṛtā ca sudhṛtā ca suparyavāptā ca supravartitā ca tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kartavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10067: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ hi ānanda tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmakāyateti tāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya /
K05bsu049_u:10068: yathā tattvamānanda etarhi me tathāgatasya tiṣṭhato dhriyamāṇasya yāpayato hitaiṣitayā
K05bsu049_u:10069: premato vā gauravato vā kalyāṇato vā sparśavihārato vā kartavyaṃ vā dātavyaṃ vā samanvāhartavyaṃ vā manyase,
K05bsu049_u:10070: tathaiva tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā
K05bsu049_u:10071: pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā bhāvayitavyā
K05bsu049_u:10072: satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā,
K05bsu049_u:10073: tayā hitaiṣitayā tena premṇā tena gauraveṇa tayā guṇavattayā /
K05bsu049_u:10074: evaṃ tvayā ānanda ahaṃ pūjito bhavāmi,
K05bsu049_u:10076: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike prema ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ cotpāditaṃ bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:10077: yadi te ānanda ahaṃ priyo manaāpo 'parityaktastathāgataḥ,
