K05bsu049_u:10078: tataste ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā priyā manaāpā aparityajanīyā bhavatu,
K05bsu049_u:10079: yathā te ekapadam api na praṇaśyet,
K05bsu049_u:10081: bahv api te ānanda ahaṃ bhāṣeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parīndanāmāramya kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ
K05bsu049_u:10082: vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīṃ vā kalpakoṭīśataṃ
K05bsu049_u:10083: vā kalpakoṭīsahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā upari /
K05bsu049_u:10086: yādṛśāste atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya śāstāraḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10089: aparimāṇayā parīndanayā prajñāpāramitāṃ te parīndāmyanuparīndāmi sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya hitāya sukhāya /
K05bsu049_u:10097: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:10098: yo hi kaścidānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pralujyamānāmanuparigṛhṇīte,
K05bsu049_u:10099: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:10101: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10102: ye 'pi te ānanda abhūvannatīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10103: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhūt /
K05bsu049_u:10104: te 'pi te ānanda anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10105: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirbhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:10106: ye 'pi te ānanda aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:10107: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10108: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
K05bsu049_u:10109: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā
K05bsu049_u:10110: vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyopadeṣṭavyoddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10113: eṣā hi ānanda prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī /
K05bsu049_u:10114: ye 'pi kecidānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā niryātāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10116: sarve te ānanda prajñāpāramitāmāgamya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10117: te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu nirjātāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10119: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi ānanda sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ āhārikā bhavantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10120: tasmāttarhi ānanda bhūyasyā mātrayā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dvitīyakam api tṛtīyakam api parīndāmyanuparīndāmi te,
K05bsu049_u:10122: eṣā hi ānanda tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmakṣayo dharmakoṣaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10125: yo hi ānanda atīte 'dhvani anavarāgre saṃsāre sattvānāṃ buddhairbhagavadbhirdharmo deśitaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10128: ye 'pi te ānanda anāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavanto 'parimite saṃsāre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
K05bsu049_u:10129: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta ita eva dharmakoṣāt,
K05bsu049_u:10131: ye 'pi te ānanda etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:10133: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmita eva dharmakoṣātprabhāvanā bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:10135: tasmāttarhi ānanda akṣaya eṣa dharmakoṣo yaduta prajñāpāramitākoṣaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10136: sacettvamānanda śrāvakayāni śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśayes
K05bsu049_u:10137: tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve arhatvaṃ
K05bsu049_u:10138: sākṣāt kuryus tathāpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa dharmacakrapravartanānupravartanato dharmadeśayatā
K05bsu049_u:10139: śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt sacet punas tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya ekam
K05bsu049_u:10140: api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeḥ saṃprakāśayeḥ evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇa
K05bsu049_u:10141: dharmacakrapravartanānuvartanato dharmaṃ deśayanato ārādhitaḥ syān. na tu tayā paurvikayā
K05bsu049_u:10142: dharmadeśanayā yayā te trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasatvā arhatvaṃ prāpitās.
K05bsu049_u:10143: teṣāṃ cārhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu bhāvanāmayaṃ
K05bsu049_u:10144: puṇyakriyāvastu tat kiṃ manyase ānandāpi nu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ?” /
K05bsu049_u:10150: śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati. ato 'pi sa ānanda/
K05bsu049_u:10151: bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'parasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
K05bsu049_u:10152: antaśa ekadivasam api tiṣṭhatv ānandaikadivasam antaśaḥ purobhaktam api. tiṣṭhatv ānanda/
K05bsu049_u:10155: antaśa ekanālikām api ekanālikāntaram api vā tiṣṭhatv ānanda/
K05bsu049_u:10156: ekanālikāntaram antaśo muhūrtam api tiṣṭhatv ānanda/
K05bsu049_u:10157: muhūrtam antaśa ekalavam api tiṣṭhatv ānanda/
K05bsu049_u:10158: ekalavam antaśa ekakṣaṇasaṃnipātam api yo hy ānanda/
K05bsu049_u:10159: bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ aparasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya ekakṣaṇalavam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanty ayaṃ tato 'tibahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
K05bsu049_u:10161: tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlāny abhibhavati //
K05bsu049_u:10163: kuśalamūlasamanvāgato bodhisatvo mahāsatva evam etat kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam
K05bsu049_u:10164: etad ānandānavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher
K05bsu049_u:10166: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān
K05bsu049_u:10168: manuṣyāmanuṣyā vā sarve te buddhānubhāvenākṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ
K05bsu049_u:10174: atha khalu bhagavāṃstamṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ punareva pratisaṃharati sma /
K05bsu049_u:10175: pratisaṃhṛte ca bhagavatā tasmin ṛddhyabhisaṃskāre na bhūyaḥ sa bhagavānakṣobhyastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
K05bsu049_u:10178: tacca buddhakṣetraṃ tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ gandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ manuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāṃ ca na cakṣuṣa ābhāsaṃ bhūya āgacchanti sma /
K05bsu049_u:10180: pratisaṃhṛto hi tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10181: tena te sarve sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ na bhūyaścakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti sma //
K05bsu049_u:10182: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - evamānanda sarvadharmā na cakṣuṣo 'pyābhāsamāgacchanti,
K05bsu049_u:10190: nirīhakā hi ānanda sarvadharmā agrāhyā ākāśanirīhakatayā /
K05bsu049_u:10193: evaṃ caranta ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāścaranti prajñāpāramitāyam /
K05bsu049_u:10195: evaṃ śikṣamāṇā ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śikṣante prajñāpāramitāyām /
K05bsu049_u:10196: sarvaśikṣāparamapāramitāṃ mahābodhiṃ prāptukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:10209: sarvalokahitāvahā sarvalokasukhāvahā anāthānāṃ nāthakarī buddhānujñātā buddhapraśastā /
K05bsu049_u:10210: asyāmānanda prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atra śikṣāyāṃ sthitvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā
K05bsu049_u:10211: imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumekena padāṅguṣṭhenotkṣipya punareva nikṣipeyuḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10212: na ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmevaṃ syāt - utkṣipto vāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ nikṣipto veti /
K05bsu049_u:10215: asyāmānanda prajñāpāramitāśikṣāyāṃ śikṣitvā buddhā bhagavanto 'tītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣvasaṅgatāmanuprāptāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10217: sarvāsāṃ tāsāmānanda śikṣāṇāmiyameva prajñāpāramitāśikṣā agrā ākhyāyate,
K05bsu049_u:10234: ākāśasya hi sa ānanda pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā grahītavyaṃ manyetaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10235: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā grahītavyaṃ manyeta /
K05bsu049_u:10240: na mayā ānanda prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayo vā paryanto vā ākhyātaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10247: ānanda āha - kena punaḥ kāraṇena bhagavan bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ nākhyātam ?
K05bsu049_u:10248: bhagavānāha - akṣayatvādānanda prajñāpāramitāyāstathāgataḥ pramāṇaṃ na nirdiśati /
K05bsu049_u:10253: ye 'pi te ānanda atīte 'dhvanyabhūvaṃstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10255: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā vā parikṣīṇā vā /
K05bsu049_u:10256: ye 'pi te ānanda anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10258: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣeṣyate vā parikṣeṣyate vā /
K05bsu049_u:10259: ye 'pi te ānanda etarhyaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:10261: na ceyamānanda prajñāpāramitā kṣīyate vā parikṣīyate vā /
K05bsu049_u:10264: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣīyate vā parikṣīyate vā /
K05bsu049_u:10266: ākāśaṃ hi sa ānanda kṣayayitavyaṃ manyeta,
K05bsu049_u:10269: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteretadabhavat - gambhīramidaṃ sthānaṃ tathāgatena bhāṣitam /
K05bsu049_u:10271: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - akṣayā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā?
K05bsu049_u:10272: bhagavānāha - akṣayā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā yaduta ākāśākṣayatvātsarvadharmānutpādataḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10273: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā?
K05bsu049_u:10274: bhagavānāha - rūpākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10276: vijñānākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10277: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10278: avidyākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10279: evaṃ saṃskārākṣayatvena vijñānākṣayatvena nāmarūpākṣayatvena ṣaḍāyatanākṣayatvena sparśākṣayatvena (Vaidya 232)
K05bsu049_u:10283: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antadvayavivarjitā pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā /
K05bsu049_u:10284: evaṃ vyavalokayan subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyanutpādamanādyantamadhyaṃ taṃ vyavalokayati /
K05bsu049_u:10285: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāveṇiko dharmo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya,
K05bsu049_u:10287: evaṃ vyavalokayataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ sarvajñajñānapratilambho bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:10288: yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati,
K05bsu049_u:10289: sa na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā sthāsyati,
K05bsu049_u:10291: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10292: sacet imān manasikārānidaṃ copāyakauśalyamanāgamya na jānanti - kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā,
K05bsu049_u:10293: kathaṃ ca akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavya iti /
K05bsu049_u:10294: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivṛttā vivartante,
K05bsu049_u:10296: sarve te idamupāyakauśalyamanāgamya vivṛttā vivartante vivartsyante ca /
K05bsu049_u:10297: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā na vivṛttā na vivartante na vivartsyante ca,
K05bsu049_u:10298: sarve te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya na vivṛttā na vivartante na vivartsyante ca anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10299: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10300: evaṃ ca akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10301: evaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayan na kaṃciddharmamahetukamutpadyamānaṃ samanupaśyati,
K05bsu049_u:10302: na kaṃciddharmaṃ nityaṃ vā dhruvaṃ vā śāśvataṃ vā avipariṇāmadharmakaṃ vā samanupaśyati /
K05bsu049_u:10303: na kaṃciddharmaṃ kārakaṃ vā vedakaṃ vā samanupaśyati /
K05bsu049_u:10304: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharato 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā
K05bsu049_u:10305: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharan pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati,
K05bsu049_u:10306: tasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ samanupaśyati,
K05bsu049_u:10307: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
K05bsu049_u:10310: evaṃ na saṃskārānna vijñānaṃ na nāmarūpaṃ na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sparśaṃ na vedanāṃ na
K05bsu049_u:10311: tṛṣṇāṃ nopādānaṃ na bhavaṃ na jātiṃ na jarāmaraṇaṃ na śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsān samanupaśyati /
K05bsu049_u:10315: yena dharmeṇa idaṃ vā anyadvā buddhakṣetraṃ samanupaśyet /
K05bsu049_u:10316: iyaṃ sā subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā /
K05bsu049_u:10317: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05bsu049_u:10318: tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:10319: (Vaidya 233) tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo mātāpitṛṣu kālagateṣu paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:10320: evameva subhūte yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05bsu049_u:10321: tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati //
K05bsu049_u:10322: subhūtirāha - kimeka eva bhagavan māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati,
K05bsu049_u:10323: utāho bahavo mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti,
K05bsu049_u:10324: utāho ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ te 'pi sarve tasmin samaye paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti?
K05bsu049_u:10325: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati,
K05bsu049_u:10326: tasmin samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāṃ pāpīyāṃsaḥ te sarve paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti,
K05bsu049_u:10329: prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa hi viharato 'sya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuro loko 'vatāraṃ na labhate grahaṇāya,
K05bsu049_u:10331: yatrainaṃ gṛhītvā viheṭhayedvā vivartayedvā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10332: tasmāttarhiḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
K05bsu049_u:10334: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
K05bsu049_u:10335: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati /
K05bsu049_u:10336: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti,
K05bsu049_u:10338: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni kānicinmārakarmāṇyutpadyeran,
K05bsu049_u:10341: sarvopāyakauśalyāni subhūte parigrahītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
K05bsu049_u:10343: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K05bsu049_u:10345: tasmin samaye subhūte na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:10347: teṣām api itonirjātaiva sarvajñatā yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10348: evaṃ samanvāhṛtya tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena punarevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - ahamapyetān dharmānanuprāpsyāmi ye tairbuddhairbhagavadbhiranuprāptā iti /
K05bsu049_u:10349: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā ime cittotpādā utpādayitavyā abhinirhartavyā divasasyātyayena,
K05bsu049_u:10351: yaś ca subhūte aupalambhiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyāt,
K05bsu049_u:10353: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divasasyātyayena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhinirharet,
K05bsu049_u:10360: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā?
K05bsu049_u:10361: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nānyā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10372: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte gandhahastino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ya etarhyakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caratīti //
K05bsu049_u:10376: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā - sarvadharmāsaṅgataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10381: sarvadharmāś ca nāmamātreṇa vyavahāramātreṇābhilapyante iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10382: vyavahāraś ca na kvacinna kutaścinna kaścidvyavahāraḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10383: sarvadharmā avyavahārā avyāhārā avyavahṛtā avyāhṛtā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10396: ajānānā ajātā atyantājātita iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10398: sarvadharmā āryārhantaḥ prakṛtipariśuddhā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10404: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte adeśamapradeśaṃ prakṛītisvabhāvataḥ sarvadharmanirodhaprahlādanatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10408: rūpaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate /
K05bsu049_u:10410: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate prakṛtipariśuddhatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10411: sarvadharmā asaktāḥ saṅgāsaṅgavigatā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10415: sarvadharmā maitrīvihāriṇaḥ karuṇāvihāriṇo muditāvihāriṇa upekṣāvihāriṇa iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10416: sarvadharmā brahmabhūtā doṣānutpādanataḥ sarvadoṣānutpādanata iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10525: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā //
K05bsu049_u:10526: yadāyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmanugamiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:10527: vyavacārayiṣyati avatariṣyati avabhotsyate cintayiṣyati tulayiṣyati upaparīkṣiṣyate bhāvayiṣyati sarvamāyāśāṭhyavivarjitairmanasikāraiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10538: tadā nāsya durlabhā bhaviṣyati sarvaguṇānāṃ paripūriḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10545: ya etarhi bhīṣmagarjitanirghoṣasvarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ carati /
K05bsu049_u:10546: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā?
K05bsu049_u:10547: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sadāpraruditena subhūte bodhisattvena
K05bsu049_u:10548: mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa
K05bsu049_u:10550: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto 'bhūt - gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi /
K05bsu049_u:10561: mā ca kvaciccittaṃ praṇidhāḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā /
K05bsu049_u:10573: yathā na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārataḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10584: evamukte sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ nirghoṣametadavocat - evaṃ vai kariṣyāmi /
K05bsu049_u:10586: ahaṃ hi sarvasattvānāmālokaṃ kartukāmo buddhadharmān samudānetukāma iti /
K05bsu049_u:10587: evamukte sa nirghoṣaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra sadāprarudita //
K05bsu049_u:10588: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar api śabdamaśrauṣīt /
K05bsu049_u:10589: evaṃ cāśrauṣīt - śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu ca tvayā kulaputra sarvadharmeṣvadhimuktimutpādya prajñāpāramitā paryeṣṭavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10590: nimittaparivarjitena bhāvaparivarjitena sattvadṛṣṭiparivarjitena ca tvayā bhavitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:10592: kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca tvayā sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni,
K05bsu049_u:10593: yāni ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānutpādājātāniruddhābhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K05bsu049_u:10594: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra pratipadyamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi pustakagatāṃ vā dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ kāyagatām /
K05bsu049_u:10595: yasya ca tvaṃ kulaputra antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāḥ śāstṛsaṃjñā tvayā tatrotpādayitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10596: kṛtajñena ca tvayā bhavitavyaṃ kṛtavedinā ca - eṣa mama kalyāṇamitraṃ yasyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantikācchṛṇomi /
K05bsu049_u:10603: imāstvayā kulaputra anuśaṃsāḥ paritulayamānena dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau śāstṛsaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10604: na ca tvayā kulaputra lokāmiṣapratisaṃyuktayā cittasaṃtatyā dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10605: dharmārthikena ca tvayā dharmagauraveṇa dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10607: asti hi kulaputra māraḥ pāpīyān dharmabhāṇakasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpaśabdagandharasasparśānupasaṃharati sevituṃ bhaktuṃ paryupāsitum
K05bsu049_u:10609: tatra ca tvayā kulaputra dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau nāprasādacittamutpādayitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:10610: api tvevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - nāhaṃ tadupāyakauśalyaṃ jāne,
K05bsu049_u:10612: eṣa sattvavinayena sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlaparigrahamupādāya enān dharmān pratisevate bhajate paryupāste /
K05bsu049_u:10613: na hi kvacidbodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṅgo vā ārambaṇaṃ vā saṃvidyate /
K05bsu049_u:10614: tatkṣaṇaṃ ca tvayā kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10619: sarvadharmā hi niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10620: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmabhāṇakamanubadhnan nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niryāsyasi /
K05bsu049_u:10621: aparam api tvaṃ kulaputra mārakarma samanvāhareḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10624: tatra tvayā kulaputra na prativāṇiḥ kartavyā /
K05bsu049_u:10625: api tu dharmārthikenaiva dharmagauraveṇaiva anirviṇṇamānasena dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ //
K05bsu049_u:10626: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya nirghoṣasyāntikādimāmanuśāsanīṃ pratigṛhya yena pūrvā dik tena pratikrāmati sma /
K05bsu049_u:10627: aciraprakrāntasya cāsyaitadabhūt - na mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyamiti /
K05bsu049_u:10629: tatra rudan krandan śocan paridevamānaḥ evaṃ cintayati sma - asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe ekaṃ vā rātriṃdivamatināmayiṣyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:10645: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ ekaputrake kālagate mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena samanvāgato 'bhavat,
K05bsu049_u:10648: evameva subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasmin (Vaidya 240)
K05bsu049_u:10650: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmīti //
K05bsu049_u:10651: atha khalu subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathotkaṇṭhitasya tathāgatavigrahaḥ purataḥ sthitvā sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K05bsu049_u:10653: evaṃ hi kulaputra paurvakair api tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā,
K05bsu049_u:10655: tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra etenaiva vīryeṇa etenaivotsāhenaṃ etayaivārthikatayā etayaiva cchandikatayā anubadhya pūrvāmeva diśaṃ gaccha /
K05bsu049_u:10656: asti kulaputra itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairgandhavatī nāma nagarī saptaratnamayī,
K05bsu049_u:10661: ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca pañcabhirantarāpaṇavīthiśatairālekhyavicitrasadṛśairdarśanīyairnirviddhā
K05bsu049_u:10663: samantataḥ prākārāś ca tasyā nagaryāḥ saptaratnamayāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10664: teṣāṃ ca saptaratnamayānāṃ prākārāṇāṃ jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya khoḍakaśīrṣāṇi pramāṇavantyupodgatāni /
K05bsu049_u:10665: sarvasmiṃś ca khoḍakaśīrṣe saptaratnamayo vṛkṣo jāto nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ phalaiḥ phalavān /
K05bsu049_u:10666: sarvataś ca khoḍakavṛkṣādratnamayaṃ sūtraṃ dvitīyaṃ khoḍakavṛkṣāntaramavasaktam /
K05bsu049_u:10667: sarvāvatī ca sā nagarī sauvarṇena kiṅkiṇījālena praticchannā /
K05bsu049_u:10668: tasya ca kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteneritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyaḥ śabdo niścarati /
K05bsu049_u:10669: tadyathāpi nāma pañcāṅgikasya tūryasya sametya saṃgītyāṃ kuśalairgandharvaiḥ saṃpravāditasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati,
K05bsu049_u:10670: evameva tasya kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati /
K05bsu049_u:10671: tena ca śabdena te sattvāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
K05bsu049_u:10672: samantācca tasyā nagaryāḥ parikhā vāriparipūrṇā anusārivārivāhinyo vāriṇo nātiśītasya nātyuṣṇasya pūrṇāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10673: tasmiṃś ca vāriṇi nāvaḥ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ vicitrā darśanīyāsteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ pūrvakarmavipākenābhinirvṛttāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10674: yāsu te sattvā abhiruhya krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
K05bsu049_u:10676: anyaiś ca abhijātābhijātaiḥ sugandhagandhibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ saṃchāditam /
K05bsu049_u:10677: nāsti sā kācittrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau puṣpajātiryā tatra nāsti /
K05bsu049_u:10682: sarvāsu tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu saptaratnamayāni vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇi jātāni,
K05bsu049_u:10684: sarvāṇi ca tānyutpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāni śakaṭacakrapramāṇapariṇāhāni sugandhāni nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni,
K05bsu049_u:10691: yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatāṃ buddhanetrīcitrīkārānugatasugataśrutacittānāṃ sattvānāṃ dīrgharātraṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktānām
K05bsu049_u:10692: tatra ca kulaputra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ madhyeśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gṛhaṃ yojanaṃ samantāt /
K05bsu049_u:10697: aśokaṃ ca nāma śokavigataṃ ca nāma puṣpacitraṃ ca nāmodyānam /
K05bsu049_u:10698: ekaikasmiṃścodyāne 'ṣṭāvaṣṭau puṣkariṇyo yaduta bhadrā ca nāma,
K05bsu049_u:10706: tāsāṃ ca khalu puṣkariṇīnāmekaṃ pārśvaṃ sauvarṇamayaṃ dvitīyaṃ pārśvaṃ rūpyamayaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pārśvaṃ vaidūryamayaṃ caturthaṃ pārśvaṃ sphaṭikamayam
K05bsu049_u:10709: ekaikasyāṃ ca puṣkariṇyāmaṣṭāvaṣṭau sopānāni nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ sopānaphalakaiḥ pratimaṇḍitāni /
K05bsu049_u:10710: sarvasmiṃś ca sopānaphalakavivarāntare jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya kadalīvṛkṣo jātaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10712: samantācca tāsāṃ puṣkariṇīnāṃ nānācitrāḥ puṣpavṛkṣā jātāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10713: teṣāṃ puṣpavṛkṣāṇāṃ vāteneritāni puṣpāṇi puṣkariṇīṣu patanti /
K05bsu049_u:10714: sarvāsu ca tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu candanagandhikaṃ vāri,
K05bsu049_u:10716: tatra ca dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saparivāro 'ṣṭaṣaṣṭayā strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati / ye 'pi
K05bsu049_u:10719: te 'pi sarve nityapramuditā udyāneṣu puṣkariṇīṣu ca pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
K05bsu049_u:10720: sa khalu punardharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa tāvatkālaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati,
K05bsu049_u:10722: ye 'pi te sattvāstatra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ vāstavyāḥ te 'pi madhyenagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya āsanaṃ prajñapayanti,
K05bsu049_u:10723: suvarṇapādakaṃ vā rūpyapādakaṃ vā vaiḍūryapādakaṃ vā sphaṭikapādakaṃ vā,
K05bsu049_u:10728: upariṣṭāccāntarīkṣe cailavitānaṃ muktāvicitritaṃ samaṃ sahitā niratāḥ kimayaṃ saṃsthita iti susaṃsthitavicitravipākatayā dhārayanti /
K05bsu049_u:10729: samantācca taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ pañcavarṇikaiḥ kusumairabhyavakiranti saṃpravikiranti /
K05bsu049_u:10731: yathāpīdaṃ dharmāśayaviśuddhyā tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmagauraveṇa ca /
K05bsu049_u:10732: tatra dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niṣaṇṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayati /
K05bsu049_u:10734: śraddheyaśraddadhānatayā śraddhotpādanena te sattvā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvanti /
K05bsu049_u:10735: tatra ca bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ śṛṇvanti /
K05bsu049_u:10740: sarvaṃ ca te sattvā avinipātadharmāṇo 'vinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10741: tasya tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ gaccha /
K05bsu049_u:10743: sa hi tava kulaputra dīrgharātraṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃdarśakaḥ samādāpakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣako 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10746: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra rātriṃdivamadhiṣṭhitamanasikāramutpādayamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi //
K05bsu049_u:10747: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ idaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt /
K05bsu049_u:10748: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣaḥ saviṣeṇa śalyena viddho nānyaṃ manasikāramutpādayati,
K05bsu049_u:10749: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ śalyahartāraṃ vaidyaṃ lapsye yo mamedaṃ śalyamuddhariṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:10751: evameva sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye nānyaṃ kaṃciddharmaṃ manasi karoti,
K05bsu049_u:10752: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ taṃ kulaputraṃ drakṣyāmi yo māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrāvayiṣyati,
K05bsu049_u:10753: yanmama dharmaṃ śrutvā upalambhamanasikārāḥ prahāsyanta iti //
K05bsu049_u:10754: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe sthitaḥ tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayataḥ śṛṇoti sma /
K05bsu049_u:10820: sa eṣu samādhiṣu sthitaḥ san daśadiśi loke buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ prakāśayato bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10821: te ca tathāgatāḥ sādhukāraṃ dadati sma,
K05bsu049_u:10823: evaṃ cāvocan - asmābhir api kulaputra pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhirevameva prajñāpāramitā parigaveṣitā /
K05bsu049_u:10824: parigaveṣamāṇaiś ca ete eva samādhayaḥ pratilabdhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10826: enāṃś ca samādhīn pratilabhya gatiṃgatāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10828: te vayameteṣāmeva samādhīnāṃ prakṛtiṃ svabhāvaṃ vyavalokayantastaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmo yaḥ samāpadyate vā vyuttiṣṭhate vā,
K05bsu049_u:10839: sarvabuddhadharmaguṇapāramitā ca anuprāptā yasyā guṇapāramitāyā na śakyaṃ tathāgataireva tāvatpramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ paryanto vā nidarśayitum,
K05bsu049_u:10841: tasmāttarhi kulaputra eteṣveva tvayā dharmeṣu gauravamutpādayitavyaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā arthikatayā chandikatayā ca /
K05bsu049_u:10842: arthikasya hi kulaputra chandikasya ca na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10843: kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ gauravamutpādayitavyam,
K05bsu049_u:10846: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣiprameva anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante //
K05bsu049_u:10847: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃstathāgatānetadavocat - ko 'smākaṃ kalyāṇamitramiti?
K05bsu049_u:10848: ta enametadavocan - dīrgharātraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitaḥ parigṛhītaś ca /
K05bsu049_u:10850: sa tava kulaputra parigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
K05bsu049_u:10851: tattvayā kṛtajñatayā kṛtaveditayā ca satkṛtya tatkṛtaṃ dhārayitavyam /
K05bsu049_u:10853: mahāsattvamekaṃ vā kalpaṃ dvau vā kalpau trīn vā kalpān kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā uttare cailoṇḍukamiva śirasā
K05bsu049_u:10857: evam api tvayā kulaputra tasya kulaputrasya naiva kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ bhavet /
K05bsu049_u:10859: tasya hi kulaputra kulaputrasya anubhāvena tavaiṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ samādhīnāṃ pratilambhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10861: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samāśvāsya antarhitā abhūvan /
K05bsu049_u:10866: tasyaitadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ mama saṃparigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
K05bsu049_u:10868: yannvahametamarthaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhigamyopasaṃkramya paripṛccheyam - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10869: kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti //
K05bsu049_u:10870: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgate bodhisattve mahāsattve prema ca prasādaṃ ca citrīkāraṃ ca gauravaṃ ca upasthāpayati
K05bsu049_u:10871: upasthāpya evaṃ prācintayat - kiyadrūpayā nu khalvahaṃ satkriyayā taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam?
K05bsu049_u:10873: na ca me kiṃcittathārūpaṃ vastraṃ vā ratnaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā maṇayo vā muktā vā vaidūryaṃ
K05bsu049_u:10874: vā śaṅkhaśilā vā pravālaṃ vā rajataṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpo vā gandho vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ
K05bsu049_u:10875: vā cūrṇaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭā vā patākā vā saṃvidyate /
K05bsu049_u:10876: kenāhaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāṃ gurukuryām?
K05bsu049_u:10880: na ca me prītirvā prāmodhaṃ votpadyate //
K05bsu049_u:10881: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃrūpairguṇairgauravamanasikārairgacchan anupūrveṇa anyataraṃ nagaramanuprāpto 'bhūt /
K05bsu049_u:10882: tatra tasyāntarāpaṇamadhyagatasya etadabhūt - yannvahamimamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya tena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kuryām /
K05bsu049_u:10883: dīrgharātraṃ hi mamātmabhāvasahasrāṇi bhagnāni kṣīṇāni niruddhāni vikrītāni /
K05bsu049_u:10884: punaḥ punaraparimāṇe saṃsāre aparimāṇāni ca nirayaduḥkhāni mayā kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānamanubhūtāni /
K05bsu049_u:10885: na punarevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśa evaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā sattvānāṃ satkārāyeti /
K05bsu049_u:10886: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvontarāpaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdamanuśrāvayāmāsa,
K05bsu049_u:10890: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhūt - ayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K05bsu049_u:10891: dharmakāmatayā yadyātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ
K05bsu049_u:10893: prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca pariprakṣyati - kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣipramanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariniṣpatsyate
K05bsu049_u:10895: adhṛṣyaś ca bhaviṣyati māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10898: tāṃś ca mama viṣayādatikrāmayiṣyati anyāṃś ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya /
K05bsu049_u:10900: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃstān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃstathā pratyutthāpayāmāsa,
K05bsu049_u:10901: yathā te taṃ ghoṣaṃ nāśrauṣuḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya - kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10904: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā ātmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate,
K05bsu049_u:10907: evaṃ cāvocat - aho batāsmākaṃ durlabdhā lābhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10908: ye vayamātmabhāvasyāpi krāyakaṃ na labhāmahe - yadvayamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmeti //
K05bsu049_u:10909: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - yannvahaṃ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ
K05bsu049_u:10910: mahāsattvaṃ tulayeyam - kiṃ nvayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyāśayapratipanna
K05bsu049_u:10912: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamabhinirmāya yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10914: upasaṃkramya sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dīnadīnamanā utkaṇṭhitamānaso 'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:10917: taṃ māṇavakarūpī śakra āha - kasya punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāya ātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:10918: sadāpraruditastamāha - ahaṃ māṇavaka dharmakāmatayā imamātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmapūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10923: yena taṃ vikrīya prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjāṃ kuryām,
K05bsu049_u:10924: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmiti /
K05bsu049_u:10925: atha khalu māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na khalu mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam /
K05bsu049_u:10926: api tu khalu punaḥ piturbhe yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10930: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10931: pariniṣpannaṃ cātmabhāvaṃ jāne prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalye buddhadharmeṣu ca,
K05bsu049_u:10932: yanmayāyaṃ māṇavakaḥ krāyako labdhaḥ hṛdayasya rudhirasya ca asthimajjāyāśceti /
K05bsu049_u:10933: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittastaṃ māṇavakametadavocat - dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena yenaiva te iti ātmabhāvādarthaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10934: sa tametadavocat - kiṃ te kulaputra mūlyaṃ dadāmi?
K05bsu049_u:10935: sa tametadavocat - yatte māṇavaka parityaktam, taddehīti /
K05bsu049_u:10936: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvayati sma /
K05bsu049_u:10937: dakṣiṇaṃ coruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāmati sma /
K05bsu049_u:10939: sā adrākṣītsadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā rudhiraṃ niḥsrāvya ūruṃ nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntam
K05bsu049_u:10940: tasyā etadabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ kulaputra ātmanaivātmanaḥ īdṛśīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayati?
K05bsu049_u:10942: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntā /
K05bsu049_u:10943: upasaṃkramya sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputra evaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayasi?
K05bsu049_u:10944: kiṃ cānena rudhireṇa kariṣyasi tvamasthimajjābhyāṃ ca?
K05bsu049_u:10945: sadāprarudita āha - asya dārike māṇavakasyāntike idaṃ vikrīya prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:10946: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi //
K05bsu049_u:10947: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvatadavocat - kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirniṣpatsyate guṇaviśeṣo vā,
K05bsu049_u:10948: yattvamātmano hṛdayaṃ rudhiraṃ cāsthimajjānaṃ ca vikrīya taṃ kulaputraṃ satkartukāmaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:10949: sa tāṃ dārikāmetadavocat - sa dārike kulaputro 'smākaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ copadekṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:10951: tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10952: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya suvarṇavarṇaṃ ca kāyaṃ pratilapsyāmahe /
K05bsu049_u:10953: dvātriṃśacca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītiṃ cānuvyañjanāni vyāmaprabhatāṃ ca anantaraśmitāṃ ca mahāmaitrī ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca mahāmuditāṃ ca mahopekṣāṃ ca /
K05bsu049_u:10964: yena ca sarvasattvānāṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāma iti //
K05bsu049_u:10965: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - āścaryaṃ kulaputra yāvadudārāḥ praṇītāścāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
K05bsu049_u:10966: ekaikasyāpi tāvatkulaputra evaṃrūpasya dharmasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān api kalpānātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā bhaveyuḥ,
K05bsu049_u:10970: api nu khalu punaḥ kulaputra yena yenaivārthena te kṛtyam,
K05bsu049_u:10971: tattatte dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā maṇīn vā muktāṃ vā rajataṃ vā vaidūryaṃ vā musāragalvaṃ
K05bsu049_u:10972: vā lohitārkaṃ vā sphāṭikaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā mālyaṃ va vilepanaṃ
K05bsu049_u:10973: vā cūrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭāṃ vā patākāṃ vā dīpaṃ vā /
K05bsu049_u:10974: tena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi /
K05bsu049_u:10975: mā ca ātmana imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10980: (Vaidya 247) atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamantardhāpayitvā svakenātmabhāvena sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato
K05bsu049_u:10983: evaṃrūpayā ca dharmārthikatayā pūrvakair api tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ
K05bsu049_u:10984: pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paripṛcchadbhiranuttarā
K05bsu049_u:10990: api tu khalu punarahaṃ tvāmeva mīmāṃsitukāma ihāgataḥ /
K05bsu049_u:10993: sa tāmāha - anuttarān me śakra buddhadharmān dehīti /
K05bsu049_u:10994: devendra āha - na mamātra kulaputra viṣaye viṣayitā /
K05bsu049_u:10997: sadāprarudita āha - alpotsukastvaṃ devendra bhava atra sthāne mamātmabhāvaparipūrimupādāya /
K05bsu049_u:11001: tena devendra satyena satyavacanena mama yathāpaurāṇo 'yamātmabhāvo bhavatu /
K05bsu049_u:11002: atha khalu tatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhānubhāvena āśayapariśuddhyā ca yathāpaurāṇo 'sya kāyaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt,
K05bsu049_u:11004: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māraś ca pāpīyān niṣpratibhānaḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyottare pratibhānamapratipadyamānastatraivāntarhito 'bhūt //
K05bsu049_u:11005: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra /
K05bsu049_u:11010: taṃ cāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi,
K05bsu049_u:11012: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ tayā śreṣṭhadārikayā yenāsyāḥ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
K05bsu049_u:11014: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā svakaṃ niveśanaṃ praviśya svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caitadavocat
K05bsu049_u:11015: - amba tāta daddhvaṃ hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇaṃ ratnāni maṇīn vastrāṇi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11017: mām api sārdhamebhiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśatairyā mamopasthāyikā yuṣmabhireva dattāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11018: gamiṣyāmyaham api sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ tasya pūjārthaṃ ca /
K05bsu049_u:11021: atha khalu tau tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ dārikāmetadavocatām - kaḥ punareṣa dārike sadāprarudito nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11024: eṣa ca kulaputro 'dhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11028: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartukāmaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11030: alabhamānaḥ san duḥkhito durmanāḥ pradhyāyan dīnamanā aśrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11031: sa śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāyoktaḥ - kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra duḥkhī durmanāḥ pradhyāyan dīnamānaso 'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthita
K05bsu049_u:11034: māṇavakarūpī śakrastamāha - kasya punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāyātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ?
K05bsu049_u:11036: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi yaduta dharmakāmatayā /
K05bsu049_u:11037: tatra pratibaddhāś ca me buddhadharmā iti /
K05bsu049_u:11038: māṇavakarūpī śakrastamāha - na mama kulaputra tvayārthaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11039: api tu khalu punaḥ piturme yajño bhaviṣyati /
K05bsu049_u:11040: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena rūdhireṇa asthimajjābhyāṃ ca kṛtyamiti /
K05bsu049_u:11042: sa tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā ātmano bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvya ūruṃ ca nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntaḥ ekānte sthitvā asthi bhittvā majjānaṃ ca dāsyāmīti /
K05bsu049_u:11044: tasyā mamaitadabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ puruṣa ātmanaivātmana evaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayatīti?
K05bsu049_u:11045: tamenamahamupasaṃkramyaivamavocam - kimarthaṃ tvayā kulaputra ātmanaivātmana evaṃ kṣaradrūdhiraṃ śarīraṃ vikṛtaṃ kṛtam?
K05bsu049_u:11046: tata eṣa māmevamāha - asya dārike māṇavakasya lohitaṃ hṛdayamasthi majjānaṃ ca dāsyāmīti /
K05bsu049_u:11050: tamenamahamevamavocam - kiṃ punastvaṃ tena dhanena kariṣyasīti?
K05bsu049_u:11052: taṃ cāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi yaduta dharmakāmatayeti /
K05bsu049_u:11053: tamenamahamevamavocam - kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirbhaviṣyati guṇaviśeṣo veti?
K05bsu049_u:11054: tataḥ so 'cintyān me buddhaguṇān varṇayati saṃprakāśayati,
K05bsu049_u:11055: aprameyāṃś ca buddhadharmān - eṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ me tata āgamo bhaviṣyatīti /
K05bsu049_u:11056: tasya me mahattaraṃ prītiprāmodyamutpannaṃ tānacintyān buddhaguṇān śrutvā /
K05bsu049_u:11057: evaṃ ca me 'bhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvadduṣkarakārakaścāyaṃ kulaputro 'tīva dharmakāmaśca,
K05bsu049_u:11059: ayaṃ hi nāma kulaputro dharmakāmatayā ātmānaṃ parityajati /
K05bsu049_u:11061: evaṃrūpeṣu ca sthāneṣu praṇidhānaṃ na kartavyaṃ syāt,
K05bsu049_u:11062: yeṣāmasmākaṃ prabhūtā vipulāś ca bhogāḥ saṃvidyante iti /
K05bsu049_u:11063: sāhamenaṃ kulaputrametadavocam - mā mā tvaṃ kulaputra imāmevaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11064: ahaṃ te prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ dhanamanupradāpayiṣyāmi yena tavārthaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11065: tena tvaṃ tamāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi gurukariṣyasi /
K05bsu049_u:11066: aham api tvayaiva sārdhaṃ yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramiṣyāmi /
K05bsu049_u:11067: aham api tasya kulaputrasya pūjāṃ kariṣyāmi /
K05bsu049_u:11068: vayamapyevaṃrūpān dharmānniṣpādayiṣyāmo yaduta anuttarān buddhadharmān ye tvayā parikīrtitā iti /
K05bsu049_u:11071: yenāhametenaiva kulaputreṇa sārdhaṃ gatvā āryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ pūjayiṣyāmi //
K05bsu049_u:11072: (Vaidya 249) atha khalu tau tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ dārikāmetadavocatām - āścaryaṃ yāvadduṣkaraṃ ca tvametasya kulaputrasya sthānamācakṣe
K05bsu049_u:11078: yadāvām api gacchāvastvayaiva sārdhaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ pūjayituṃ ca //
K05bsu049_u:11079: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjārthaṃ satkārārthaṃ ca prasthitāṃ svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca viditvā etadavocat - amba tāta evaṃ kuruta,
K05bsu049_u:11082: ityuktvā evaṃ sā śreṣṭhidārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjārthaṃ satkārārthaṃ ca prasthitā babhūva //
K05bsu049_u:11083: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkārayāmāsa /
K05bsu049_u:11085: alaṃkṛtya nānāvarṇāni vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā nānāraṅgāṇi vastrāṇi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś
K05bsu049_u:11086: ca gṛhītvā nānāratnāni ca vicitrāṇi nānāratnamayāni ca vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā
K05bsu049_u:11087: prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ svādanīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā ekaṃ rathaṃ sadāpraruditena
K05bsu049_u:11088: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhamabhiruhya taiḥ pañcabhī rathaśataiḥ pañcadārikāśatābhirūḍhaiḥ
K05bsu049_u:11089: parivṛttā puraskṛtā mahatā ca parivāreṇa mātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamā yena pūrvā dik tena prakrāntā /
K05bsu049_u:11090: anupūrveṇa ca gacchan sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'drākṣīddūrādeva tāṃ gandhavatīṃ
K05bsu049_u:11091: nagarīṃ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ citrāṃ darśanīyāṃ saptabhiḥ prākāraiḥ saptaratnamayairanuparikṣiptāṃ
K05bsu049_u:11093: yojanāni vistāreṇa dvādaśa yojanānyāyāmena ṛddhāṃ sphītāṃ ca kṣemāṃ ca subhikṣāṃ
K05bsu049_u:11096: madhye ca nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya adrākṣīddharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmāsanagatamanekaśatayā
K05bsu049_u:11097: parṣadā anekasahasrayā anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛttaṃ puraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam /
K05bsu049_u:11098: sahadarśanenaiva ca tasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ saṃpratilabhate sma tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpanno bhikṣurekāgreṇa manasikāreṇa /
K05bsu049_u:11099: dṛṣṭvā cāsya etadabhūt - na mama pratirūpametadbhavet,
K05bsu049_u:11100: yadahaṃ rathagata eva dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam /
K05bsu049_u:11103: tāny api pañca dārikāśatāni śreṣṭhidārikayā saha rathebhyo 'vateruḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11104: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ
K05bsu049_u:11105: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto 'parimāṇapūjāvyūhena yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K05bsu049_u:11107: tena khalu punaḥ samayena dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ saptaratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kāritamabhūt lohitacandanālaṃkṛtaṃ muktājālaparikṣiptam /
K05bsu049_u:11112: yatra śuddhaṃ kṛṣṇāguru dhūpyate sma yaduta prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjārtham /
K05bsu049_u:11113: tasya ca kūṭāgārasya madhye saptaratnamayaḥ paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto 'bhūt /
K05bsu049_u:11115: yatra prajñāpāramitā prakṣiptā suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu likhitā vilīnena vaidūryeṇa /
K05bsu049_u:11117: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcadārikāśataiḥ taṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīdaparimāṇena pūjāvyūhena pratimaṇḍitam /
K05bsu049_u:11119: śakraṃ ca devānāmindraṃ divyairmāndāravapuṣpairdivyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca suvarṇacūrṇairdivyaiś ca rūpyacūrṇaistaṃ kūṭāgāramavakirantamabhyavakirantamabhiprakirantam
K05bsu049_u:11121: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat
K05bsu049_u:11122: - kimarthaṃ tvaṃ devendra anekairdevatāsahasraiḥ sārdhamidaṃ ratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ
K05bsu049_u:11125: imāni ca divyāni vādyāni devairuparyantarīkṣe pravāditāni?
K05bsu049_u:11126: evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na tvaṃ kulaputra jānīṣe?
K05bsu049_u:11127: eṣā hi sā prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā pariṇāyikā,
K05bsu049_u:11128: yatra śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvaguṇapāramitānugatān sarvabuddhadharmān sarvākārajñatāṃ ca kṣipramanuprāpnuvantīti /
K05bsu049_u:11129: evamukte sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kvāsau kauśika prajñāpāramitā,
K05bsu049_u:11131: śakra āha - eṣā kulaputra asya kūṭāgārasya madhye suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu vilīnena vaidūryeṇa
K05bsu049_u:11132: likhitvā āryeṇa dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saptabhirmudrābhirmudrayitvā sthāpitā /
K05bsu049_u:11134: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhai pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ samagrībhūtaiḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11135: yānyanena puṣpāṇi gṛhītāni mālyadāmāni ca vastraratnāni ca dhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś ca suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi,
K05bsu049_u:11137: anyatarānyataraṃ ca tataḥ pratyaṃśaṃ sthāpayāmāsuḥ yaduta dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkārāya //
K05bsu049_u:11138: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
K05bsu049_u:11140: ca puṣpairdivyaiś ca vādyaiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūrvaṃ pūjayitvā yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo
K05bsu049_u:11143: divyāni ca vādyāni saṃpravādayati sma dharmapūjāmevopādāya //
K05bsu049_u:11144: atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopariṣṭānmūrdhni puṣpakūṭāgāraṃ prātiṣṭhan /
K05bsu049_u:11145: tāni ca nānāvarṇāni puṣpāṇi suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi (Vaidya 251)
K05bsu049_u:11147: tāny api cīvarāṇi vastraratnāni ca antarīkṣe nānāratnamayo 'bhramaṇḍapa iva saṃsthito 'bhūt /
K05bsu049_u:11148: adrākṣītkhalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyedamevaṃrūpamṛddhiprātihāryam
K05bsu049_u:11149: dṛṣṭvā ca punareṣāmetadabhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvanmaharddhikaścāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvanmahānubhāvo yāvanmahaujaskaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11152: atha khalu tāni śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamāni pañca dārikāśatāni dharmodgate bodhisattve
K05bsu049_u:11153: mahāsattve spṛhāmutpādya sarvāstāḥ samagrībhūtā adhyāśayena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K05bsu049_u:11155: evaṃ cāvocan - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhavema /
K05bsu049_u:11156: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca vayaṃ carantya eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo bhavema,
K05bsu049_u:11157: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lābhī /
K05bsu049_u:11159: yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkaroti gurukaroti /
K05bsu049_u:11160: bahujanasya ca saṃprakāśayema yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃprakāśayati /
K05bsu049_u:11161: evameva ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgatā bhavema /
K05bsu049_u:11162: pariniṣpadyemahi ca yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ pariniṣpannaś ca //
K05bsu049_u:11163: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
K05bsu049_u:11164: dārikāśatāni prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayitvā dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkṛtya
K05bsu049_u:11165: dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sagauravāḥ
K05bsu049_u:11167: ekānte sthitaś ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ
K05bsu049_u:11168: mahāsattvametadavocat - ihāhaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ gaveṣamāṇo 'raṇyagato nirghoṣamaśrauṣam
K05bsu049_u:11171: so 'haṃ samyak taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yena pūrvā dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11172: tasya me etadabhūt - samyak ca mayā nirghoṣaḥ śrutaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11173: na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam,
K05bsu049_u:11174: kasya vā antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmi lapsye veti /
K05bsu049_u:11176: so 'haṃ tena daurmanasyena mahatīmutkaṇṭhāṃ paritapanaṃ cāpanno 'bhūvam /
K05bsu049_u:11179: api tu prajñāpāramitāmeva manasi karomi - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam,
K05bsu049_u:11181: na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ iti /
K05bsu049_u:11183: sa māmevamāha - gaccha kulaputra itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairanupūrveṇa gandhavatī nāma nagarī /
K05bsu049_u:11184: tatra drakṣyasi dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayantaṃ prakāśayantamiti /
K05bsu049_u:11186: so 'haṃ tenaiva mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena sphuṭastataḥ pṛthivīpradeśānna calitaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11188: tasya me śṛṇvato bahūni samādhimukhāni prādurbhūtāni /
K05bsu049_u:11189: (Vaidya 252) tatra sthitaṃ māṃ daśadiglokadhātusthitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samāśvāsayanti,
K05bsu049_u:11190: sādhukāraṃ ca dadati - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K05bsu049_u:11193: te māṃ tathāgatāḥ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya antarhitāḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11195: tasya me etadabhūt - kuto nu te tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11196: kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti?
K05bsu049_u:11197: tasya ca me etadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinākṛtādhikāro 'varopitakuśalamūlaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11200: yataste tathāgatā āgatā yatra vā te tathāgatā gatā iti /
K05bsu049_u:11201: so 'haṃ tasya tathāgatavigrahasya nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yathānuśiṣṭaṃ yena pūrvāṃ dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11205: so 'haṃ tvāṃ kulaputra pṛcchāmi - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11207: deśaya me kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca /
K05bsu049_u:11208: yathā vayaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca jānīma,
K05bsu049_u:11213: evamukte dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattva mahāsattvametadavocat - na khalu kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kutaścidāgacchanti vā gacchanti vā /
K05bsu049_u:11217: na hi kulaputra anutpāda āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
K05bsu049_u:11220: na hi kulaputra bhūtakoṭyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
K05bsu049_u:11223: na hi kulaputra śūnyatāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
K05bsu049_u:11226: na hi kulaputra yathāvattāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
K05bsu049_u:11229: na hi kulaputra virāgasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
K05bsu049_u:11232: na hi kulaputra nirodhasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
K05bsu049_u:11235: na hi kulaputra ākāśadhātorāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
K05bsu049_u:11238: na hi kulaputra anyatra ebhyo dharmebhyastathāgataḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11239: yā ca kulaputra eṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
K05bsu049_u:11247: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse 'bhigate madhyāhnakālasamaye marīcikāṃ paśyet syandamānām /
K05bsu049_u:11248: sa tena tena pradhāvet - atrodakaṃ pāsyāmi,
K05bsu049_u:11250: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kuta etadudakamāgataṃ kva vā tadudakaṃ gacchati,
K05bsu049_u:11251: pūrvaṃ vā mahāsamudraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ vā paścimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā?
K05bsu049_u:11252: sadāprarudita āha - na hi kulaputra marīcikāyāmudakaṃ saṃvidyate /
K05bsu049_u:11253: kiṃ punarasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate?
K05bsu049_u:11254: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyo marīcikāṃ dṛṣṭvā anudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
K05bsu049_u:11257: evameva kulaputra ye kecittathāgatarūpeṇa vā ghoṣeṇa vā abhiniviṣṭāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11258: te tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti /
K05bsu049_u:11259: ye ca tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:11260: sarve te bālajātīyā duṣprajñajātīyā iti vaktavyāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11261: tadyathāpi nāma sa eva puruṣo yo 'nudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
K05bsu049_u:11265: na ca kulaputra dharmatā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
K05bsu049_u:11266: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
K05bsu049_u:11267: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra māyākāranirmitasya hastikāyasya vā aśvakāyasya vā rathakāyasya vā pattikāyasya vā nāstyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā,
K05bsu049_u:11268: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
K05bsu049_u:11269: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragata ekaṃ vā tathāgataṃ paśyet,
K05bsu049_u:11270: dvau vā trīn vā caturo vā pañca vā ṣaḍvā sapta vā aṣṭau vā nava vā daśa vā viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ
K05bsu049_u:11272: sa prativibuddhaḥ san ekam api tathāgataṃ na paśyet /
K05bsu049_u:11273: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti?
K05bsu049_u:11274: sadāprarudita āha - na khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapne kasyaciddharmasya (Vaidya 254)
K05bsu049_u:11277: dharmodgata āha - evameva kulaputra sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamā uktā bhagavatā /
K05bsu049_u:11278: ye kecitkulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmāṃstathāgatena nirdeśitān yathābhūtaṃ na prajānanti,
K05bsu049_u:11279: te tathāgatān nāmakāyena vā rūpakāyena vā abhiniviśya tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti /
K05bsu049_u:11280: yathāpi nāma dharmatāmaprajānanto ye ca tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:11286: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmān svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti tathāgatena deśitān yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti,
K05bsu049_u:11287: na te kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:11289: ye ca na kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
K05bsu049_u:11293: na te tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti /
K05bsu049_u:11297: te ca bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ amoghaṃ rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjate /
K05bsu049_u:11299: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra mahāsamudre ratnāni na pūrvasyā diśa āgacchanti,
K05bsu049_u:11303: na vidigbhyo nādhastānnopariṣṭānna kutaściddeśebhyo digbhya āgacchanti,
K05bsu049_u:11304: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyupādāya mahāsamudre ratnānyutpadyante /
K05bsu049_u:11307: nirudhyamānāni ca tāni ratnāni ca kvaciddaśadiśi loke saṃkrāmanti /
K05bsu049_u:11308: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ tāni ratnāni prabhāvyante,
K05bsu049_u:11309: teṣāṃ pratyayānāmasatāṃ na teṣāṃ ratnānāṃ prabhāvanā bhavati /
K05bsu049_u:11310: evameva kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kāyapariniṣpattirna kutaściddaśadiśi lokādāgatā,
K05bsu049_u:11312: na ca ahetuko buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11315: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ kāyābhiniṣpattirbhavati,
K05bsu049_u:11317: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vīṇāyāḥ śabda utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
K05bsu049_u:11321: tadyathāpi nāma droṇīṃ ca pratītya carma ca pratītya tantrīś ca pratītya daṇḍaṃ ca
K05bsu049_u:11322: pratītya upadhānīś ca pratītya koṇaṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya ca tajjavyāyāmaṃ pratītya
K05bsu049_u:11323: evamayaṃ vīṇāyāḥ śabdo niścarati hetvadhīnaḥ pratyayādhīnaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11324: sa ca śabdo na droṇyā niścarati,
K05bsu049_u:11325: na carmaṇo na tantrībhyo na daṇḍānnopadhānībhyo na koṇānna puruṣasya tajjavyāyāmataḥ śabdo niścarati,
K05bsu049_u:11326: api tu khalu punaḥ sarveṣāṃ samāyogācchabdaḥ prajñapyate /
K05bsu049_u:11328: evameva kulaputra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaniṣpattirhetvadhīnā pratyayādhīnā anekakuśalamūlaprayogapariniṣpannā ca /
K05bsu049_u:11329: na caikato hetuto na caikataḥ pratyayato na caikataḥ kuśalamūlato buddhakāyaprabhāvanā /
K05bsu049_u:11333: evaṃ tvayā kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
K05bsu049_u:11336: yataḥ kulaputra tvamevaṃ tathāgatāṃś ca sarvadharmāṃś ca anutpannānaniruddhāṃś ca saṃprajñāsyasi,
K05bsu049_u:11339: asmin khalu punastathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe mahān bhūmicālo 'bhūt /
K05bsu049_u:11340: sarvaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāramahādaśamahānimittaṃ kampate prakampate saṃprakampate,
K05bsu049_u:11346: sarvāṇi ca mārabhavanāni saṃkṣobhitāni jihmībhūtāni cābhūvan /
K05bsu049_u:11348: te sarve yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena praṇatā abhūvan /
K05bsu049_u:11351: śakraś ca devānāmindraścatvāraś ca mahārājāno dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ divyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca puṣpairavākiran abhyavākiran abhiprākiran /
K05bsu049_u:11352: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
K05bsu049_u:11353: tava kulaputra anubhāvena adyāsmābhiḥ paramārthanirjātā kathā deśyamānā śrutā sarvalokavipratyanīkā,
K05bsu049_u:11355: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kaḥ punaḥ kulaputra atra hetuḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11356: kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya?
K05bsu049_u:11357: dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva āha - imaṃ kulaputra tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ
K05bsu049_u:11358: tava ca pṛcchato mama ca nirdiśato 'ṣṭānāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt /
K05bsu049_u:11360: catuḥṣaṣṭeś ca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajāṃsi vigatamalāni dharmeṣu dharmacakṣūṃṣi viśuddhāni //
K05bsu049_u:11361: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato 'bhūt - lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11362: yasya me prajñāpāramitāmimaṃ ca tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ paripṛcchataḥ iyatāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11363: etadevāsmākaṃ paryāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavedanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pariniṣpattaye /
K05bsu049_u:11364: na ca me bhūyo vicikitsā pravartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11366: sa tenaiva prītiprāmodyena samanvāgataḥ saptatālaṃ vihāyasamabhyudgamya saptatāle
K05bsu049_u:11367: sthitvā evaṃ cintayati sma - kenāhametarhi antarīkṣe sthitaḥ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ
K05bsu049_u:11369: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhyudgataṃ dṛṣṭvā cetasaiva cāsya cittamājñāya divyāni cāsmai māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyupanāmayati sma,
K05bsu049_u:11370: evaṃ cāvocat - ebhistvaṃ kulaputra divyaiḥ puṣpairdharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ (Vaidya 256)
K05bsu049_u:11373: tava hi kulaputra anubhāvena adya bahūnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11375: ye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān kalpānutsahante mahāntaṃ bhāramudvoḍhuṃ yathā tvayā utsoḍham //
K05bsu049_u:11376: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasyāntikānmāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamavākirat,
K05bsu049_u:11379: svakena ca kāyena dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhicchādayati sma /
K05bsu049_u:11380: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - eṣo 'haṃ kulaputra adyāgreṇa tavātmānaṃ niryātayāmi upasthānaparicaryāyai /
K05bsu049_u:11381: sa ātmānaṃ niryātya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvāsthāt //
K05bsu049_u:11382: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā tāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - etā vayam api kulaputra tavātmānaṃ
K05bsu049_u:11383: vayamapyanena kuśalamūlena eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo bhavema,
K05bsu049_u:11384: tvayaiva ca sārdhaṃ punaḥ punarbuddhāṃś ca bhagavato bodhisattvāṃś ca satkuryāma gurukuryāma /
K05bsu049_u:11386: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāṃ tāni ca pañca dārikāśatānyetadavocat - yadi me yūyaṃ dārikā adhyāśayamanuvartadhvam,
K05bsu049_u:11389: dārikā āhuḥ - anuvartiṣyāmahe tava vayamāśayenādhyāśayena ca /
K05bsu049_u:11391: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
K05bsu049_u:11392: dārikāśatāni sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāni kṛtvā tāni ca pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkṛtya sarvāṇi
K05bsu049_u:11393: ca tāni dharmodgatāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya niryātayati sma upasthānaparicaryāyaiḥ
K05bsu049_u:11395: imāni ca pañca rathaśatāni niryātayāmi paribhogāyeti //
K05bsu049_u:11396: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasmai kulaputrāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
K05bsu049_u:11398: evaṃrūpeṇa ca tyāgacittena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
K05bsu049_u:11399: evaṃ ca dharmabhāṇakāṇāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śakyaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca śrotum /
K05bsu049_u:11400: tair api kulaputra paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ
K05bsu049_u:11401: caradbhirevaṃrūpa eva tyāge sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ
K05bsu049_u:11403: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
K05bsu049_u:11404: dārikāśatāni pañca rathaśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalaparipūrimupādāya pratigṛhṇīte sma /
K05bsu049_u:11406: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanāt svakaṃ gṛhaṃ prāvikṣat sūryasya cāstaṃgamanakālo 'bhūt //
K05bsu049_u:11407: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - naitanmama sādhu pratirūpaṃ bhavet,
K05bsu049_u:11411: īryāpathābhyāṃ sthitvā sthānena caṃkrameṇa ca kālamatināmayeyam,
K05bsu049_u:11412: yāvaddharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakādgṛhānnirgato bhaviṣyati yaduta dharmasaṃprakāśanāyeti //
K05bsu049_u:11413: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sapta varṣāṇyekasamādhisamāpanna evābhūt /
K05bsu049_u:11415: sadāprarudito 'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattva sapta varṣāṇi dvābhyāmeva īryāpathābhyāṃ kālamatināmayan na styānamiddhamavakrāmayāmāsa /
K05bsu049_u:11419: api tu kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati,
K05bsu049_u:11420: yannu vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattva mahāsattvasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñapayiṣyāmaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11422: taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ susiktaṃ sumṛṣṭaṃ ca kariṣyāmo nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇam,
K05bsu049_u:11423: yatra pṛthivīpradeśe dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca saṃprakāśayiṣyatīti cintayāmāsa /
K05bsu049_u:11424: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya
K05bsu049_u:11427: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyaṃ nirghoṣamaśrauṣīt - itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati,
K05bsu049_u:11428: vyutthāya ca madhyenagarasya niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti /
K05bsu049_u:11429: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ divyaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa
K05bsu049_u:11430: udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayāmāsa sārdhaṃ
K05bsu049_u:11433: svakaṃ cottarāsaṅgaṃ kāyādavatārya tasyāsanasyopari prajñapayati sma /
K05bsu049_u:11434: atha khalu tā dārikāḥ svakasvakānuttarāsaṅgān kāyādavatārya pañcottarāsaṅgaśatāni
K05bsu049_u:11435: tatrāsane prajñapayāmāsuḥ atrāsane dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti /
K05bsu049_u:11436: evaṃ tāś ca sarvā dārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanamāstīrya tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasya jātā abhūvan //
K05bsu049_u:11437: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11441: apyeva nāma asya sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyodakamalabhamānasya cittaṃ khidyeta,
K05bsu049_u:11446: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvā imaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam /
K05bsu049_u:11449: mā rajodhāturito bhūpradeśāddharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāye nipatet /
K05bsu049_u:11454: api ca kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bahūni me ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni,
K05bsu049_u:11458: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvamasiñcat /
K05bsu049_u:11459: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañcadārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya
K05bsu049_u:11460: mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni sarvāṇi tāni tīkṣṇāni śastrāṇi gṛhītvā svakasvakāni śarīrāṇi
K05bsu049_u:11462: na ca sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāsāṃ vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyānyathātvamabhūt,
K05bsu049_u:11463: yatra sa māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ labhet kuśalamūlāntarāyakaraṇāya //
K05bsu049_u:11464: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvaddharmakāmaścāyaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11465: yāvaddṛḍhasamādānaś ca yāvanmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaś ca anapekṣaḥ kāye jīviteṣu bhogeṣu ca,
K05bsu049_u:11468: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastatsarvaṃ lohitodakaṃ divyaṃ candanodakamadhyatiṣṭhat,
K05bsu049_u:11469: samantācca tasya pṛthivīpradeśasya acintyaṃ paramodāraṃ gandhaṃ yasya divyasya candanodakasya paripūrṇam /
K05bsu049_u:11471: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
K05bsu049_u:11473: sādhvī ca te anuttarā dharmakāmatā dharmaparīṣṭiś ca /
K05bsu049_u:11474: evaṃrūpeṇa kulaputra adhyāśayena evaṃrūpeṇa vīryeṇa evaṃrūpayā ca dharmakāmatayā taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā //
K05bsu049_u:11475: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - prajñaptaṃ mayā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanam
K05bsu049_u:11476: ayaṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaḥ susiktaḥ susaṃmṛṣṭaś ca kṛtaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11479: dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane niṣaṇṇamabhyavakireyam?
K05bsu049_u:11480: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - imāni te kulaputra pratigṛhāṇa divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi
K05bsu049_u:11482: dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane niṣaṇṇamabhyavakira /
K05bsu049_u:11483: sa tasmai divyaṃ khārīsahasraṃ divyānāṃ māndāravapuṣpāṇāmupanāmayati sma /
K05bsu049_u:11484: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā anyataraiḥ puṣpaistaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇamakārṣīt,
K05bsu049_u:11486: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāmatyayena tataḥ samādhervyutthāya yena dharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat,
K05bsu049_u:11487: anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayāmāsa //
K05bsu049_u:11488: (Vaidya 259) atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanenaiva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratilabhate
K05bsu049_u:11490: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanāyaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā /
K05bsu049_u:11515: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāniṣaṇṇasyaiva tasyāṃ belāyāṃ sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhirājo jātaḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11540: evaṃpramukhāni ṣaṣṭiḥ samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇi sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratilabdhānyabhūvanniti //
K05bsu049_u:11544: sahapratilabdhānāṃ ca subhūte ṣaṣṭyāḥ samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi,
K05bsu049_u:11546: vidikṣu adha ūrdhvaṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu
K05bsu049_u:11547: lokadhātuṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtān
K05bsu049_u:11550: tadyathāpi nāma ahametarhi asminneva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau dharmaṃ deśayāmi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛto bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaḥ,
K05bsu049_u:11553: sarvāsu ca jātiṣu na jātu buddhavirahito 'bhūt /
K05bsu049_u:11554: yatra yatra buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃmukhībhūtā bhavanti,
K05bsu049_u:11560: tatra khalu punarbhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - tadanenāpi te ānanda
K05bsu049_u:11561: paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyam - ityapīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
K05bsu049_u:11563: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ pratilabdhukāmairasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
K05bsu049_u:11564: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyopadeṣṭavyoddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā /
K05bsu049_u:11565: tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena mahāpustake pravyaktapravyaktairakṣaraiḥ sulikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkartavyā
K05bsu049_u:11572: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda śāstā te tathāgataḥ?
K05bsu049_u:11575: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - śāstā te ānanda tathāgataḥ /
K05bsu049_u:11579: tasmāttarhi ānanda yathaiva tvayā mamaitarhi tiṣṭhato dhriyamāṇasya yāpayato 'smin samucchraye prema ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ ca kṛtam,
K05bsu049_u:11580: tathaiva tvayā ānanda mamātyayādasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kartavyam /
K05bsu049_u:11581: dvir api trir api te ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi enāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
K05bsu049_u:11587: avirahitāste ānanda sattvā buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena saṃghopasthānena ca veditavyam /
K05bsu049_u:11596: te ca maitreyapramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ āyuṣmāṃś ca subhūtirāyuṣmāṃś ca śāriputraḥ
K05bsu049_u:11597: āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ śakraś ca devānāmindraḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko
K05bsu049_u:11600: samāptā ceyaṃ bhagavatyā āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā sarvatathāgatajananī bodhisattvapratyekajinaśrāvakāṇāṃ mātā,
K05bsu049_u:11601: dharmamudrā dharmolkā dharmanābhirdharmabherī dharmanetrī dharmaratnanidhānam akṣayo
K05bsu049_u:11603: prajñāpāramitāṃ samyagudgṛhya paryavāpya ca dhārayitvā pravartya enāṃ viharantu sadārthina iti //
K05bsu049_u:11604: ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
K05bsu049_u:11605: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
